original: gtan tshigs kyi skyon brjod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi skyon brjod pa'i phyir te /
translated: because the fault of the reason is stated.

original: me'i ngo bo nyid rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid snang bar byed pa de ni gzhan gyi phyogs la yang med pa'i phyir dang / tha snyad du yang sreg par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: me'i ngo bo nyid rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid snang bar byed pa de ni gzhan gyi phyogs la yang med pa'i phyir dang / tha snyad du yang sreg par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The nature of fire, which illuminates itself and others, does not exist in the other position, and because it is not established as having the nature of burning even conventionally.

original: sreg pa zhes bya ba yang mes byas pa'i bud shing 'gyur ba yin pas //
analyzed: sreg pa zhes bya ba yang mes byas pa'i bud shing 'gyur ba yin pas //
translated: Moreover, “burning” is the transformation of fuel produced by fire.

original: de'i phyir me'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir me'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the nature of fire.

original: gzhan yang / lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang / lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: Moreover:

original: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //🔽song dang ma song bsgom pa yis //
analyzed: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin // song dang ma song bsgom pa yis //
translated: The example of fire is not able to prove seeing,

original: de ni lta bcas lan btab bo //
analyzed: de ni lta bcas lan btab bo //
translated: because it is refuted by the analysis of where one has gone, where one has not gone, and that being gone over.

original: lta bcas zhes bya ba ni lta ba dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: lta bcas zhes bya ba ni lta ba dang bcas pa'o //
translated: “Along with seeing” means “along with seeing.”

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: me'i dpe de'o //
analyzed: me'i dpe de'o //
translated: The example of fire.

original: ci zhig byas she na /
analyzed: ci zhig byas she na /
translated: What is done?

original: lan btab bo //
analyzed: lan btab bo //
translated: It is refuted.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bsgom pa dag gis te /
analyzed: song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bsgom pa dag gis te /
translated: By where one has gone, where one has not gone, and that being gone over.

original: ji ltar sngar don dam par song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bsgom pa dag la 'gro ba med de /
analyzed: ji ltar sngar don dam par song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bsgom pa dag la 'gro ba med de /
translated: Just as it was explained that in the ultimate sense, that being gone over does not have going, that not gone over does not have going, and that which is being gone over does not have going,

original: song zin pa'i phyir dang / ma song ba'i phyir dang / song ba dang / ma song ba ma gtogs par bsgom pa shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa de bzhin du don dam par mes kyang bud shing bsregs pa dang / ma bsregs pa dang /
analyzed: song zin pa'i phyir dang / ma song ba'i phyir dang / song ba dang / ma song ba ma gtogs par bsgom pa shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa de bzhin du don dam par mes kyang bud shing bsregs pa dang / ma bsregs pa dang /
translated: so in the ultimate sense, fire does not burn fuel that is already burned, that is not yet burned,

original: sreg pa dag sreg par mi byed de /
analyzed: sreg pa dag sreg par mi byed de /
translated: or that is being burned,🔽because it is already burned, because it is not yet burned, and because apart from that which is already burned and that which is not yet burned, that being burned is not apprehended.

original: bsregs pa'i phyir dang / ma bsregs pa'i phyir dang / bsregs pa dang / ma bsregs pa ma gtogs @79b par bsreg pa shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du don dam par mig kyang gzugs bltas pa dang /
analyzed: bsregs pa'i phyir dang / ma bsregs pa'i phyir dang / bsregs pa dang / ma bsregs pa ma gtogs @79b par bsreg pa shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du don dam par mig kyang gzugs bltas pa dang /
translated: So too, in the ultimate sense, the eye does not see visible forms that are already seen,

original: ma bltas pa dang / blta ba dag la lta bar mi byed de /
analyzed: ma bltas pa dang / blta ba dag la lta bar mi byed de /
translated: that are not yet seen, or that are being seen,🔽because they are already seen, because they are not yet seen, and because apart from that which is already seen and that which is not yet seen, that being seen is not apprehended.

original: bltas pa'i phyir dang / ma bltas ba'i phyir dang / bltas pa dang / ma bltas pa ma gtogs par blta ba shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes go rims bzhin du sbyor ba'i tshig dag brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bltas pa'i phyir dang / ma bltas ba'i phyir dang / bltas pa dang / ma bltas pa ma gtogs par blta ba shes par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes go rims bzhin du sbyor ba'i tshig dag brjod par bya'o //
translated: because it is seen, because it is not seen, and because apart from what is seen and what is not seen, seeing is not known.

original: 'di la gzhan dag ni pha rol pos me bzhin du lta ba la sogs pa 'grub ste /
analyzed: 'di la gzhan dag ni pha rol pos me bzhin du lta ba la sogs pa 'grub ste /
translated: Here, others argue that seeing and so on are established like fire.

original: dper na me ni sreg par byed pa yin yang /
analyzed: dper na me ni sreg par byed pa yin yang /
translated: For example, fire is a burner,

original: gzhan dag sreg par byed pa nyid yin gyi rang gi bdag nyid sreg par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag sreg par byed pa nyid yin gyi rang gi bdag nyid sreg par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it burns others and does not burn itself.

original: de bzhin du lta ba yang lta bar byed pa yin yang /🔽gzhan dag la lta bar byed pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du lta ba yang lta bar byed pa yin yang / gzhan dag la lta bar byed pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: Likewise, seeing is seeing,🔽but it sees others and does not see itself.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed pa ni ma yin no zhes smras pa'i lan du /🔽lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed pa ni ma yin no zhes smras pa'i lan du / lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: In response to this, it is said:🔽The example of fire

original: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
analyzed: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
translated: cannot establish seeing.🔽The response to this is given by the analogy

original: song dang ma song bsgom pa yis //🔽de ni lta bcas lan btab bo //
analyzed: song dang ma song bsgom pa yis //🔽de ni lta bcas lan btab bo //
translated: of where one has gone and where one has not gone.

original: de yang gzhan sreg par mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de yang gzhan sreg par mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: because it does not burn another.

original: gzhan dag na re de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Others say that this is not correct,

original: dpe tsam gyis phyogs snga ma shin tu snying po ma yin pas de 'gog pa'i rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: dpe tsam gyis phyogs snga ma shin tu snying po ma yin pas de 'gog pa'i rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: because the opponent’s position is not refuted by mere analogy, and because it is not correct to refute it.

original: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
translated: Others say:

original: mig la lta ba'i bya ba yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: mig la lta ba'i bya ba yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: The eye definitely has the activity of seeing,

original: sgra'i bstan bcos las de ltar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra'i bstan bcos las de ltar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is taught in the treatise on sound.

original: 'di na sgra'i bstan bcos las byed pa po la bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas lta ba bya ba byed pas lta ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di na sgra'i bstan bcos las byed pa po la bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas lta ba bya ba byed pas lta ba zhes bya ste /
translated: In the treatise on sound, the eye is said to see because it performs the action of seeing, having been stated as the agent of the action.

original: der gang ci bstan pa de ni de bzhin te /🔽dper na byed pa po la bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas thugs su chud par mdzad pa'am /
analyzed: der gang ci bstan pa de ni de bzhin te / dper na byed pa po la bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas thugs su chud par mdzad pa'am /
translated: Whatever is taught there is just so.

original: thugs su chud par gyur pas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: thugs su chud par gyur pas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, having been stated as the agent of the action, the Buddha is said to understand or to have understood.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: sgrub pa de tha snyad kyi bden pa'i khongs su ni yod mod kyi /
analyzed: sgrub pa de tha snyad kyi bden pa'i khongs su ni yod mod kyi /
translated: That proof exists within the domain of conventional truth.

original: don dam par ni med do //
analyzed: don dam par ni med do //
translated: But in reality, it does not.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'di nyid du mig lta ba bkag pa'i phyir dang / de'i skye ba bkag pa'i phyir lta ba dang bral ba yin pas /
analyzed: 'di nyid du mig lta ba bkag pa'i phyir dang / de'i skye ba bkag pa'i phyir lta ba dang bral ba yin pas /
translated: Because here, in this very text, seeing is refuted, and because the arising of seeing is refuted, seeing is devoid of seeing.

original: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
analyzed: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
translated: When it does not see even the slightest thing,

original: lta bar byed pa ma yin no //🔽gang gi tshe gtan pa'am /
analyzed: lta bar byed pa ma yin no // gang gi tshe gtan pa'am /
translated: it is not seeing.🔽When it does not see even a little bit,

original: khre'u 'am cung zad la yang lta bar mi byed pa de'i tshe lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khre'u 'am cung zad la yang lta bar mi byed pa de'i tshe lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: such as a pot or a cloth, at that time it is not seeing.

original: de'i phyir / lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //
analyzed: de'i phyir / lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //
translated: Therefore,

original: de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
translated: how could it be tenable to say🔽“Seeing sees”?

original: lta bas lta bar byed ces bya ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lta bas lta bar byed ces bya ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur te /
translated: How could it be tenable to say “Seeing sees”?

original: de ni mi rigs pa kho na'o zhes bya @80a * //
analyzed: de ni mi rigs pa kho na'o zhes bya @80a * //
translated: It is not tenable at all.

original: ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
analyzed: de'i phyir / lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
translated: seeing is not seeing itself.

original: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid //
analyzed: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid //
translated: That which is not seeing does not see.

original: lta ba'i nus pas stong pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lta ba'i nus pas stong pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is devoid of the capacity for seeing,

original: bong ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bong ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like a lump of clay and so on.

original: zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is what he intends.

original: des na don dam par sgra'i bstan bcos las lta ba'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra bstan pa mi rung ba kho na ste /
analyzed: des na don dam par sgra'i bstan bcos las lta ba'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra bstan pa mi rung ba kho na ste /
translated: Therefore, in the ultimate, it is not suitable for the treatises on sound to teach the term view and the term buddha,

original: dpe med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no example.

original: mdzad pa'i mtha' dang mi 'gal te //
analyzed: mdzad pa'i mtha' dang mi 'gal te //
translated: It is not contradictory to the conclusion of the activity,🔽because in the ultimate truth, the Bhagavat is also essenceless, and later

original: don dam par bcom ldan 'das kyang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir dang / 'og nas kyang /
analyzed: don dam par bcom ldan 'das kyang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir dang / 'og nas kyang /
translated: it says,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos nyid gang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos nyid gang //
translated: Whatever is the reality of the Tathāgata

original: de ni 'gro 'di'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: de ni 'gro 'di'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: Is the reality of this world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dngos nyid med //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dngos nyid med //
translated: The Tathāgata is realityless.

original: 'gro 'di ngo bo nyid med do //🔽zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro 'di ngo bo nyid med do // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This world is realityless.

original: yang na gzhan du brtags te /
analyzed: yang na gzhan du brtags te /
translated: Or else, it is imputed in another way.

original: 'di la de lta ba yin pa la byed pa po bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas lta bar byed pas lta ba zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'di la de lta ba yin pa la byed pa po bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas lta bar byed pas lta ba zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Here, it is said that the agent of seeing is the condition of the action, and because it sees, it is called seeing.

original: lta ba ma yin pa la byed pa po la bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas lta bar byed pas lta ba zhes bya /
analyzed: lta ba ma yin pa la byed pa po la bya ba'i rkyen brjod nas lta bar byed pas lta ba zhes bya /
translated: Or, it is said that the agent of nonseeing is the condition of the action, and because it sees, it is called seeing.

original: des cir 'gyur /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur /
translated: What is the point of this?

original: gal te de lta ba ma yin pa la bya na ni /
analyzed: gal te de lta ba ma yin pa la bya na ni /
translated: If it is said that the eye is the seer because it is the instrument of the act of seeing,

original: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
analyzed: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
translated: then when it does not see the slightest thing,

original: lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not the instrument of the act of seeing.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: lta bar byed pa nyid ni lta bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: lta bar byed pa nyid ni lta bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The instrument of the act of seeing is the instrument of the act of seeing.

original: des na mig lta ba'i bya ba skyes pas lta bar byed de /
analyzed: des na mig lta ba'i bya ba skyes pas lta bar byed de /
translated: Therefore, the eye is the seer because the act of seeing arises in it.

original: de lta na gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon de nyid yod do //
analyzed: de lta na gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon de nyid yod do //
translated: In that case, the fault in the reason and example remains.

original: gal te de lta ba'i bya ba byed pa po yin pa'i phyir lta bar byed pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta ba'i bya ba byed pa po yin pa'i phyir lta bar byed pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the eye is the seer because it is the agent of the act of seeing,

original: de'i tshe de lta ba yin na lta ba'i bya ba don med pa nyid de /🔽de'i phyir / lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //
analyzed: de'i tshe de lta ba yin na lta ba'i bya ba don med pa nyid de / de'i phyir / lta bas lta bar byed ces byar //
translated: then if it is seeing, the act of seeing is pointless.🔽Therefore,🔽how could it be tenable to say

original: de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar rigs par 'gyur //
translated: “Seeing sees”?

original: mi rigs pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: mi rigs pa kho na yin te /
translated: It is not tenable at all.

original: lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //🔽ji ste de lta ba ma yin pa la bya na yang /
analyzed: lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to // ji ste de lta ba ma yin pa la bya na yang /
translated: The meaning of the words is that it is because it possesses the act of seeing.🔽But if it is said that the eye is the seer because it is not the act of seeing,

original: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
analyzed: gang tshe cung zad mi lta ba //
translated: then when it does not see the slightest thing,

original: lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lta bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not see.

original: de'i tshe de lta ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na /
analyzed: de'i tshe de lta ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na /
translated: If at that time it does not have the nature of seeing,

original: bong ba la sogs pa bzhin du lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba yin pas lta ba ma yin pa yang lta bar mi byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: bong ba la sogs pa bzhin du lta ba'i bya ba dang bral ba yin pas lta ba ma yin pa yang lta bar mi byed pa nyid do //
translated: then like a lump of earth, it is devoid of the activity of seeing, and thus it does not see.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gnyi ga yang lta ba'i bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gnyi ga yang lta ba'i bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since neither of the two has the activity of seeing,

original: lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
analyzed: lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
translated: Seeing does not see itself.

original: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid //
analyzed: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid //
translated: That which does not see does not see another.

original: ci ste dgag pa gnyis yod na /
analyzed: ci ste dgag pa gnyis yod na /
translated: If you say that the two negations exist,

original: skabs kyi don go bas de'i phyir mig lta ba'i bya ba skyes pas lta bar byed do zhe na /
analyzed: skabs kyi don go bas de'i phyir mig lta ba'i bya ba skyes pas lta bar byed do zhe na /
translated: then the meaning of the context is understood. Therefore, since the eye has the activity of seeing, it sees.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good.

original: yod pa dang ni med pa'i rkyen dgag pa bzhin du yod pa dang / med pa'i rgyu nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa dang ni med pa'i rkyen dgag pa bzhin du yod pa dang / med pa'i rgyu nyid bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause of existence and nonexistence is refuted, just like the refutation of the conditions of existence and nonexistence.

original: phyis 'byung ba'i tshul gyis ltas nyid du nye @80b bar brtags nas /
analyzed: phyis 'byung ba'i tshul gyis ltas nyid du nye @80b bar brtags nas /
translated: Later, having imagined that it is seeing,

original: de lta ba yin par rtogs na ni tha snyad kyi bden pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyams so //
analyzed: de lta ba yin par rtogs na ni tha snyad kyi bden pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyams so //
translated: If you understand it in that way, then your assertion is undermined in order to establish conventional truth.

original: yang na pha rol po na re mig lta ba'i bya ba skyes pas lta bar byed par smra ste /
analyzed: yang na pha rol po na re mig lta ba'i bya ba skyes pas lta bar byed par smra ste /
translated: Or, the opponent says that the eye is the seer because the activity of seeing arises in it.

original: bya ba'i tha snyad yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba'i tha snyad yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the convention of activity exists.

original: gang la lta ba'i bya ba ma skyes pa de ni lta bar byed do zhes mi brjod de /
analyzed: gang la lta ba'i bya ba ma skyes pa de ni lta bar byed do zhes mi brjod de /
translated: That in which the activity of seeing has not arisen is not said to be the seer.

original: dper na rna ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rna ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the ear.

original: mig la ni lta ba'i bya ba yod pas mig lta bar byed do zhes tha snyad 'dogs so zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: mig la ni lta ba'i bya ba yod pas mig lta bar byed do zhes tha snyad 'dogs so zhes zer ba la /
translated: But the eye is said to be the seer because the activity of seeing exists in the eye.

original: slob dpon gyis bshad pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis bshad pa /
translated: The master responds:

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that case,

original: lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
analyzed: lta ba lta nyid ma yin te //
translated: seeing is not seeing itself.

original: pha rol pos don dam par lta ba po 'ga' zhig la lta ba'i bya ba skyes par ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / lta ba la lta ba'i bya ba skyes pa'i sngon rol na /
analyzed: pha rol pos don dam par lta ba po 'ga' zhig la lta ba'i bya ba skyes par ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / lta ba la lta ba'i bya ba skyes pa'i sngon rol na /
translated: Because the opponent does not teach that the activity of seeing arises in any seer ultimately, and because prior to the activity of seeing arising in seeing,

original: lta ba nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: lta ba nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: seeing itself is not established.

original: sngon lta ba ma yin pa las phyis lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni bstan dka' ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sngon lta ba ma yin pa las phyis lta ba'i bya ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni bstan dka' ba'i phyir /
translated: It is difficult to teach that which was not seen previously comes to have the activity of seeing later.

original: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid //🔽de lta na gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
analyzed: lta ba min pa mi lta nyid // de lta na gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
translated: That which is not seeing does not see.🔽In that case, the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: don 'gal ba nyid yin pas ;
analyzed: don 'gal ba nyid yin pas ;
translated: Or, the meaning is contradictory.

original: dam bcas pa nyams so //
analyzed: dam bcas pa nyams so //
translated: Therefore, the thesis is undermined.

original: 'dir grangs can dang / bye brag pa dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir grangs can dang / bye brag pa dag gis smras pa /
translated: Here, the Sāṃkhya and Vaiśeṣika say:

original: 'dis lta bar byed pas lta ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis lta bar byed pas lta ba ste /
translated: It is seeing because it sees.

original: byed pa la bya ba'i rkyen brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa la bya ba'i rkyen brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the instrumental case is expressed for the activity.

original: byed pa de gang gi yin pa de ni lta ba po ste /
analyzed: byed pa de gang gi yin pa de ni lta ba po ste /
translated: That which is the agent of that activity is the seer.

original: de yang des lta bar byed do //
analyzed: de yang des lta bar byed do //
translated: And that also sees by means of that.

original: dper na gcod pa po sta res shing gcad par bya ba shing gcod par byed kyi sta re nyid gcod par mi byed pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na gcod pa po sta res shing gcad par bya ba shing gcod par byed kyi sta re nyid gcod par mi byed pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, the axe, which is the agent of cutting, cuts the tree, which is the object to be cut, but the axe itself does not cut.

original: des na mig gis lta bar mi byed do zhes bya ba de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: des na mig gis lta bar mi byed do zhes bya ba de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement “The eye does not see” is an establishment of what is already established.

original: byed pa dag la byed pa po yod de /
analyzed: byed pa dag la byed pa po yod de /
translated: Agents exist for activities.

original: byed pa yin pa'i phyir dper na sta re la sogs pa dag la gcod pa po yod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: byed pa yin pa'i phyir dper na sta re la sogs pa dag la gcod pa po yod pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it is an agent, just as an axe, etc. are the cutters.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:🔽The seer is not the hearer,🔽The hearer is not the feeler,🔽The feeler is not the taster,🔽The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The one who knows is not the one who perceives,

original: lta ba nyid kyis lta ba po //🔽rnam par bshad par shes par bya //
analyzed: lta ba nyid kyis lta ba po // rnam par bshad par shes par bya //
translated: The one who perceives is not the one who sees.🔽The seer is not the hearer,🔽The hearer is not the feeler,🔽The feeler is not the taster,🔽The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The one who knows is not the one who perceives,🔽The one who perceives is not the one who sees.🔽The seer is not the hearer,

original: rnam par bshad par shes par bya ba zhes bya ba lan btab par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par bshad par shes par bya ba zhes bya ba lan btab par shes par bya'o //
translated: The hearer is not the feeler,🔽The feeler is not the taster,

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The one who knows is not the one who perceives,

original: lta ba nyid kyis so //🔽gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: lta ba nyid kyis so // gang gi zhe na /
translated: The one who perceives is not the one who sees.🔽The seer is not the hearer,🔽The hearer is not the feeler,🔽The feeler is not the taster,🔽The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The one who knows is not the one who perceives,

original: lta ba po'i ste /
analyzed: lta ba po'i ste /
translated: The one who perceives is not the one who sees.🔽The seer is not the hearer,🔽The hearer is not the feeler,🔽The feeler is not the taster,🔽The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The one who knows is not the one who perceives,

original: lta ba po nyid du rnam par rtog pa dgag pa yang 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so ;
analyzed: lta ba po nyid du rnam par rtog pa dgag pa yang 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so ;
translated: The one who perceives is not the one who sees.🔽The seer is not the hearer,🔽The hearer is not the feeler,🔽The feeler is not the taster,🔽The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The one who knows is not the one who perceives,🔽The one who perceives is not the one who sees.🔽The seer is not the hearer,🔽The hearer is not the feeler,

original: / ji ltar der mig gi chos rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa yin pa de bzhin du 'dir bdag gi chos kyang rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa yin te /
analyzed: / ji ltar der mig gi chos rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa yin pa de bzhin du 'dir bdag gi chos kyang rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa yin te /
translated: The feeler is not the taster,🔽The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The one who knows is not the one who perceives,

original: gang gi phyir bdag ni rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed pa mi 'thad de /🔽rang gi bdag nyid la 'jug pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bdag ni rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed pa mi 'thad de /🔽rang gi bdag nyid la 'jug pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The one who perceives is not the one who sees.🔽The seer is not the hearer,🔽The hearer is not the feeler,🔽The feeler is not the taster,🔽The taster is not the one who knows,🔽The

original: 'di ltar ral @81a * //
analyzed: 'di ltar ral @81a * //
translated: It is like this.🔽

original: gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcod par mi byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcod par mi byed pa bzhin no //
translated: It is just like the edge of a sword does not cut itself.

original: de ltar rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par bdag kyang lta ba po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par bdag kyang lta ba po ma yin te /
translated: Thus, ultimately, the self is not the seer,

original: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir dper na rna ba bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir dper na rna ba bzhin no //
translated: because it does not see itself, like an ear, for example.

original: pha rol pos gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid du dogs pa'i dug gis bslad du yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: pha rol pos gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid du dogs pa'i dug gis bslad du yang mi rung ngo //
translated: The opponent should not be poisoned by the fear that the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: gang la lar bdag gis bdag la lta bar byed do zhes bshad pa der ni /
analyzed: gang la lar bdag gis bdag la lta bar byed do zhes bshad pa der ni /
translated: In some places it is said that the self sees itself.

original: yid phan 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir /🔽bdag gis zhes bya ba'i sgrar sgro btags nas tha snyad du de skad bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: yid phan 'dogs pa yin pa'i phyir / bdag gis zhes bya ba'i sgrar sgro btags nas tha snyad du de skad bshad pa yin no //
translated: There, the mind is the beneficiary.🔽The term “self” is a superimposition.

original: 'dir rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar gzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dir rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar gzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Here, the phrase “does not see itself” is used in the sense of a defining characteristic.

original: gtan tshigs dngos po nyid dang / shes bya nyid dang / brjod par bya ba nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir rna ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhe 'am /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dngos po nyid dang / shes bya nyid dang / brjod par bya ba nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir rna ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhe 'am /
translated: and because of being a thing, an object of knowledge, an object of expression, and so on, like the ear and so on,

original: sgra la sogs pa bzhin no zhe'am /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa bzhin no zhe'am /
translated: like sound and so on,

original: bdag gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes gtan tshigs dang / dpe'i rjes su dpag pa dag kyang rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes gtan tshigs dang / dpe'i rjes su dpag pa dag kyang rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
translated: like the self of the self.

original: de ltar na don dam par bdag ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
analyzed: de ltar na don dam par bdag ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
translated: Thus, ultimately the self does not see form,

original: dngos po yin pa'i phyir dper na rna ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po yin pa'i phyir dper na rna ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: because it is a thing, like the ear and so on.

original: de bzhin du don dam par bdag ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par bdag ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
translated: Similarly, ultimately the self does not see form,

original: shes bya yin pa'i phyir dper na sgra la sogs pa bzhin no ;
analyzed: shes bya yin pa'i phyir dper na sgra la sogs pa bzhin no ;
translated: because it is an object of knowledge, like sound and so on.

original: / de bzhin du don dam par bdag ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
analyzed: / de bzhin du don dam par bdag ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
translated: Similarly, ultimately the self does not see form,

original: brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dper na bdag gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dper na bdag gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: because it is an object of expression, like the self of the self.

original: gzugs la yang de bzhin du ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs la yang de bzhin du ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: So too, form should be stated in the same way, as appropriate.

original: dam bcas pa la sogs pa'i skyon yang med de /
analyzed: dam bcas pa la sogs pa'i skyon yang med de /
translated: Nor is there the fault of a thesis, etc.,

original: tha snyad kyi bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir dang ; spyir khas blangs pa'i bdag phyogs su byas pa'i phyir dang / de'i chos bstan pa'i phyir dang / dpe nyid du yang de nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi bden pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir dang ; spyir khas blangs pa'i bdag phyogs su byas pa'i phyir dang / de'i chos bstan pa'i phyir dang / dpe nyid du yang de nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is done in terms of conventional truth, because the self that is generally accepted is taken as the subject, because its attributes are taught, and because it is also presented as an example.

original: de ltar na don dam par sta re la sogs pa ma grub pas dpe yang med pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na don dam par sta re la sogs pa ma grub pas dpe yang med pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, since the axe, etc., are not established ultimately, there is no example, and so this is not an argument that establishes what is already established.

original: 'dir kha cig na re /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig na re /
translated: In this regard, some say,

original: lta ba po lta bar mi byed do zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis don de la skur ba btab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lta ba po lta bar mi byed do zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis don de la skur ba btab pa'i phyir /
translated: “The statement ‘The seer does not see’ is a denial of that fact by that very person,

original: dam bcas pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
translated: and so it is a fault of the thesis.”

original: 'dir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med do zhes bya bas lan btab zin pa'i phyir yang phyir bzlas mi dgos so //
analyzed: 'dir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med do zhes bya bas lan btab zin pa'i phyir yang phyir bzlas mi dgos so //
translated: Here, since the response “Dependent origination is non-arisen” has already been given, it is unnecessary to repeat it.

original: gzhan yang 'di la lta ba po de lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid yin nam @81b 'on te lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di la lta ba po de lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid yin nam @81b 'on te lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin /
translated: Moreover, is the seer the entity of the seer or is he not the entity of the seer?

original: de la gal te lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: de la gal te lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: If he is the entity of the seer,

original: ji ltar grangs can dag na re skyes bu'i ngo bo nyid ni shes pa yod pa nyid do zhes zer ba lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar grangs can dag na re skyes bu'i ngo bo nyid ni shes pa yod pa nyid do zhes zer ba lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: then just as the Sāṃkhyas say, “The entity of the person is the mere existence of consciousness,”

original: de la gal te de'i lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid yin na ngo bo nyid ni ma byas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la gal te de'i lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid yin na ngo bo nyid ni ma byas pa'i phyir /
translated: then if he is the entity of the seer, because the entity is not made,

original: lta ba med par yang lta ba por 'gyur ro //🔽ci ste gcod pa po de la sta re med na gcod pa po nyid du mi 'thad pa de bzhin du de yang lta ba ma spangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lta ba med par yang lta ba por 'gyur ro // ci ste gcod pa po de la sta re med na gcod pa po nyid du mi 'thad pa de bzhin du de yang lta ba ma spangs pa'i phyir /
translated: he would be the seer even without seeing.

original: lta ba po nyid du blta bar bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: lta ba po nyid du blta bar bya'o zhe na /
translated: But if you say that just as it is untenable that the one who cuts is the cutter without an axe, so too he should be regarded as the seer because he does not abandon seeing,

original: de lta na bdag po nyid ni tha snyad pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta na bdag po nyid ni tha snyad pa yin te /
translated: then in that case, the one who sees is a mere convention

original: gcod pa po tha snyad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcod pa po tha snyad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the one who cuts is a mere convention.

original: de ltar rtog na /
analyzed: de ltar rtog na /
translated: If you think that way,

original: ma spangs lta po yod min te //
analyzed: ma spangs lta po yod min te //
translated: then the seer does not exist without seeing.

original: lta ba ma spangs na de lta ba po nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: lta ba ma spangs na de lta ba po nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: because if seeing does not exist, then the seer is accepted as not a seer.

original: 'di na lta ba dang ldan pa'i sngon rol dang lta ba dang bral ba'i 'og na lta ba med pas lta ba med na blta bar bya ba la lta ba yang med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di na lta ba dang ldan pa'i sngon rol dang lta ba dang bral ba'i 'og na lta ba med pas lta ba med na blta bar bya ba la lta ba yang med pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, prior to one who possesses seeing and subsequent to one who is devoid of seeing, seeing does not exist, and if seeing does not exist, then the seer also does not exist.

original: lta ba po nyid du mi 'thad pas lta ba po med de /
analyzed: lta ba po nyid du mi 'thad pas lta ba po med de /
translated: Therefore, since it is untenable that the seer exists, the seer does not exist.

original: lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of this is that the seer does not exist inherently.

original: me bzhin du yang de mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: me bzhin du yang de mi 'grub ste /
translated: It is not established like fire,

original: bud shing med par me mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bud shing med par me mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because fire is not established without fuel.

original: yang na gal te lta ba po yod na lta ba po yin no zhe na yang grangs can dag gis yongs su brtags pa'i lta ba po med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma ste /
analyzed: yang na gal te lta ba po yod na lta ba po yin no zhe na yang grangs can dag gis yongs su brtags pa'i lta ba po med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma ste /
translated: Moreover, if the seer exists, then the seer would exist. However, the remainder of the sentence is that the seer imputed by the Sāṃkhyas does not exist.

original: 'di la gzugs dmigs shing lta bar byed pas lta ba po'o zhes rjes su dpag pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di la gzugs dmigs shing lta bar byed pas lta ba po'o zhes rjes su dpag pa yin na /
translated: Here, it is inferred that the seer sees and observes form.

original: gzugs dmigs pa de yang /
analyzed: gzugs dmigs pa de yang /
translated: Moreover, that form that is observed

original: mig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / nam mkha' dang / yid la byed pa dag yod na yod pa yin pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: mig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / nam mkha' dang / yid la byed pa dag yod na yod pa yin pas de'i phyir /
translated: exists when there is an eye, form, light, space, and mental activity. Therefore,

original: lhas byin zhes bya ba'i tshogs de dag dang ldan pa la lta ba po zhes gdags kyi de las gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: lhas byin zhes bya ba'i tshogs de dag dang ldan pa la lta ba po zhes gdags kyi de las gzhan ni med do //
translated: the one who sees is designated as possessing those components, such as Devadatta, but apart from that there is no other.

original: de las gzhan pa yongs su brtags pa'i yod pa nyid cig yod du zin na yang /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa yongs su brtags pa'i yod pa nyid cig yod du zin na yang /
translated: Even if the existence of something other than that were to exist,

original: long ba'i rgyud la gzugs dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: long ba'i rgyud la gzugs dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because form is not observed in the continuum of a blind person,

original: byed pa'i rgyu dag la byed pa por tha snyad gdags te /
analyzed: byed pa'i rgyu dag la byed pa por tha snyad gdags te /
translated: the one who sees is designated as the agent in relation to the causes of seeing.

original: mar me bzhin du rigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mar me bzhin du rigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: It is just like a lamp.

original: dper na mar me la sems pa med kyang snang ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir snang bar byed pa yin no zhes zer ba bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na mar me la sems pa med kyang snang ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir snang bar byed pa yin no zhes zer ba bzhin te /
translated: For example, although a lamp has no intention, it is said to illuminate because it is the cause of light.

original: de'i phyir tha snyad du yang med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha snyad du yang med do //
translated: Therefore, it does not exist even conventionally.

original: ci ste lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin te /
translated: But if it is not the entity of the seer,

original: ji ltar bye brag pa dag na re bzhi'i sbyor ba las gzugs shes pa skyes pa na lta bar byed do zhes zer ba lta bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bye brag pa dag na re bzhi'i sbyor ba las gzugs shes pa skyes pa na lta bar byed do zhes zer ba lta bu'o zhe na /
translated: For example, the Vaiśeṣikas say that when form is seen, the eye sees form through the conjunction of the four: eye, form, light, and mental activity.

original: de lta na yang skyon de nyid yod de /🔽ma grags pa'i yod pas de la de brtag pa @82a * //
analyzed: de lta na yang skyon de nyid yod de / ma grags pa'i yod pas de la de brtag pa @82a * //
translated: Even so, the error remains.

original: mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not renowned, it is untenable to posit that as its nature.

original: thun mong du khas blangs nas de yod do zhe na /
analyzed: thun mong du khas blangs nas de yod do zhe na /
translated: If you accept that it is common knowledge, then it exists.

original: yang bshad pa /
analyzed: yang bshad pa /
translated: Again it is said:

original: lta ba spangs par gyur kyang ngo //
analyzed: lta ba spangs par gyur kyang ngo //
translated: Even though seeing is abandoned,

original: ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci zhig ce na /
translated: what?

original: lta ba po yod min te //
analyzed: lta ba po yod min te //
translated: The seer does not exist.

original: zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
translated: This is the context.

original: lta ba'i nus pa spangs par gyur na /
analyzed: lta ba'i nus pa spangs par gyur na /
translated: If seeing is abandoned,

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not its nature.

original: don dam par de gzugs la lta bar byed par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: don dam par de gzugs la lta bar byed par mi 'thad de /
translated: Ultimately, it is untenable that it sees form,

original: mig las gzhan yin pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mig las gzhan yin pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is different from the eye, like a pot.

original: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka la yang /
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka la yang /
translated: Thus, in both cases,

original: lta ba po nyid ma grub bo //
analyzed: lta ba po nyid ma grub bo //
translated: the seer itself is not established.

original: yang na lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su brtags na yang /
analyzed: yang na lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su brtags na yang /
translated: Moreover, if the seer is thoroughly investigated in terms of his own intrinsic reality,

original: ma spangs lta po yod min te //
analyzed: ma spangs lta po yod min te //
translated: The seer does not exist without seeing.

original: lta ba spangs par gyur kyang ngo //🔽lta ba dang bcas sam /
analyzed: lta ba spangs par gyur kyang ngo // lta ba dang bcas sam /
translated: Even if seeing were abandoned,🔽whether he has seeing or

original: lta ba med kyang rung ste /
analyzed: lta ba med kyang rung ste /
translated: does not have seeing,

original: lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: lta ba po'i ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: the seer does not exist in terms of his own intrinsic reality.

original: gal te re zhig lta ba po de mig yod na lta bar byed do zhes bya ba de ltar 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te re zhig lta ba po de mig yod na lta bar byed do zhes bya ba de ltar 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that the seer sees when he has eyes,

original: de lta na gzugs dmigs pa 'grub pa ni mig yod na yod pa'i phyir me yod na bsreg pa nyid bzhin pas lta ba po nyid tha snyad pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na gzugs dmigs pa 'grub pa ni mig yod na yod pa'i phyir me yod na bsreg pa nyid bzhin pas lta ba po nyid tha snyad pa ste /
translated: then, since the perception of form is established when there are eyes, just as burning is established when there is fire, the seer is conventionally called “the eye.”

original: mig nyid yin par 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: mig nyid yin par 'dod par bya'o //
translated: You should assert that the eye itself is the seer.

original: ci ste lta ba med kyang lta ba po yin no zhes byar ni long ba'i rgyud la gzugs dmigs pa med pa'i phyir de lta ba po nyid yin par mi rigs so //
analyzed: ci ste lta ba med kyang lta ba po yin no zhes byar ni long ba'i rgyud la gzugs dmigs pa med pa'i phyir de lta ba po nyid yin par mi rigs so //
translated: But if you say that the seer is the seer even without seeing, then it is not reasonable that the blind are the seer, because they do not perceive form.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here the opponent says:

original: lta ba'i bya ba yod pa nyid ni lta ba po yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: lta ba'i bya ba yod pa nyid ni lta ba po yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: The seer should be understood as the one who has the activity of seeing.

original: de la byed pa dang / las yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la byed pa dang / las yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the agent and object exist in relation to it.

original: 'di na gang la bya ba med pa de la ni byed pa dang las med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang la bya ba med pa de la ni byed pa dang las med de /
translated: Here, that which lacks activity does not have an agent or object,

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: like a sky flower.

original: lta ba po de la ni byed pa lta ba dang las blta bar bya ba yod pas de'i phyir lta ba'i bya ba yod pa nyid ni lta ba po yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lta ba po de la ni byed pa lta ba dang las blta bar bya ba yod pas de'i phyir lta ba'i bya ba yod pa nyid ni lta ba po yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: But the seer has the activity of seeing and the object of seeing. Therefore the seer should be understood as the one who has the activity of seeing.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: don dam par lta ba rnam pa thams cad du bkag pa'i phyir dang / lta ba med na lta ba po yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: don dam par lta ba rnam pa thams cad du bkag pa'i phyir dang / lta ba med na lta ba po yang mi 'thad de /
translated: Ultimately, seeing is completely refuted, and if seeing does not exist, the seer is not tenable.

original: lta ba med na khyod kyi ni //
analyzed: lta ba med na khyod kyi ni //
translated: If seeing does not exist,

original: blta bya lta ba ga la yod //
analyzed: blta bya lta ba ga la yod //
translated: How could the seen and seeing exist?

original: gang gis kyang lta bar mi byed pa la blta bar bya ba mi rigs pa'i phyir dang / 'dis lta bar byed pa'i lta ba po med pa kho na'i phyir byed pa yang mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gang gis kyang lta bar mi byed pa la blta bar bya ba mi rigs pa'i phyir dang / 'dis lta bar byed pa'i lta ba po med pa kho na'i phyir byed pa yang mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: because it is not logical that something that is not seen by anyone is seen, and because it is not logical that there is seeing when there is no seer.

original: des na khyod kyi byed pa dang las yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
analyzed: des na khyod kyi byed pa dang las yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of your reason “because the action and agent exist” is unestablished,

original: don 'gal ba nyid yin no //🔽rang gi sde pa dag las /
analyzed: don 'gal ba nyid yin no // rang gi sde pa dag las /
translated: or it is contradictory.

original: kha cig na re /
analyzed: kha cig na re /
translated: Some of our own schools say:🔽It is logical to say that the eye does not see conditioned phenomena that are powerless and unmoving due to other causes and conditions,

original: rgyu dang rkyen gzhan gyi dbang dang g-yo ba med pa'i 'du byed dag la mig lta bar mi byed do zhes bya ba dang / @82b de las gzhan pa'i bdag lta ba po med do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni rigs kyi /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen gzhan gyi dbang dang g-yo ba med pa'i 'du byed dag la mig lta bar mi byed do zhes bya ba dang / @82b de las gzhan pa'i bdag lta ba po med do zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni rigs kyi /
translated: and that there is no self that is different from that which sees,

original: blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba dag med do zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod de /
analyzed: blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba dag med do zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod de /
translated: but it is not accepted that the seen and seeing do not exist,

original: de dag gi 'bras bu rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi 'bras bu rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the four effects such as consciousness exist.

original: gang med pa de la ni /
analyzed: gang med pa de la ni /
translated: But if they do not exist,

original: 'bras bu rnam par shes pa dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dag med de /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam par shes pa dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dag med de /
translated: then the effects of the eye, such as visual consciousness, contact, feeling, and craving, do not exist.

original: dper na dmus long gi mig bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na dmus long gi mig bzhin no //
translated: They are like the eye of a man born blind.

original: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba dag la ni 'bras bu rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi yod pas /
analyzed: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba dag la ni 'bras bu rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhi yod pas /
translated: But since the four effects, such as visual consciousness, exist in regard to the seen and seeing,

original: de'i phyir blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba dag yod do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba dag yod do zhes zer ro //
translated: therefore the seen and seeing exist.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we reply:

original: gal te ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba rab tu ma grub par bstan pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba rab tu ma grub par bstan pa de'i tshe /
translated: If, in the manner explained, the seen and seeing are shown to be unestablished,

original: blta bya lta ba med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: blta bya lta ba med pa'i phyir //
translated: then because the seen and seeing do not exist,

original: rnam par shes la sogs pa bzhi //
analyzed: rnam par shes la sogs pa bzhi //
translated: the four, such as visual consciousness, do not exist.

original: yod min / rkyen med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: yod min / rkyen med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The intended meaning is that they do not exist because they lack conditions.

original: de'i phyir de dag ma grub pas ma grub na blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba yang 'grub par mi rigs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag ma grub pas ma grub na blta bar bya ba dang / lta ba yang 'grub par mi rigs te /
translated: Therefore, since they are not established, if they do not exist, it is illogical that the seen and seeing are established.

original: dpe yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no example.

original: gang dag 'di skad ces don dam par rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag yod pa nyid de de dag gi 'bras bu nye bar len pa la sogs pa dag yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de dag la bshad par bya ste /🔽nye bar len pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: gang dag 'di skad ces don dam par rnam par shes pa la sogs pa dag yod pa nyid de de dag gi 'bras bu nye bar len pa la sogs pa dag yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de dag la bshad par bya ste / nye bar len pa la sogs pa //
translated: Those who say, “Consciousness and so on exist ultimately because their effects, such as appropriation, exist,” should be addressed as follows:🔽How could appropriation and so on

original: ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur //
analyzed: ji lta bur na yod par 'gyur //
translated: exist?

original: de dag kyang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽nye bar len pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag kyang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so // nye bar len pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The point is that they are not established, like consciousness and so on.🔽“ Appropriation” refers to

original: nye bar blang bar bya ba dag ste /
analyzed: nye bar blang bar bya ba dag ste /
translated: that which is appropriated.

original: 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag tu smra ba dang / lta ba zhes bya ba dag go //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag tu smra ba dang / lta ba zhes bya ba dag go //
translated: They are the overesteeming of: morality and asceticism, the belief in a self, and views.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gang dag gi dang por de dag bstan pa ste /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gang dag gi dang por de dag bstan pa ste /
translated: “ And so on” refers to those that are taught first.

original: de dag kyang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi dag go //
analyzed: de dag kyang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi dag go //
translated: They are existence, birth, and aging and death.

original: de'i phyir khyod la skyon de nyid yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod la skyon de nyid yod do //
translated: Therefore the error still applies to you.

original: da ni pha rol pos rab tu byed pa'i dang por nyan pa la sogs pa dang / sgra la sogs pa dang nyid du nye bar bzhag pa dag ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis 'dra bar bstan par bzhed nas ;
analyzed: da ni pha rol pos rab tu byed pa'i dang por nyan pa la sogs pa dang / sgra la sogs pa dang nyid du nye bar bzhag pa dag ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis 'dra bar bstan par bzhed nas ;
translated: Now, the opponent wishes to show that the ear, etc., the sound, etc., and the one who is situated in the ear, etc., are similar to the seer, etc., in the manner already explained.🔽He says:

original: lta dang nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
analyzed: lta dang nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
translated: The seer, the hearer, the smeller, the taster, the toucher, the thinker,

original: nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs //
analyzed: nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs //
translated: the hearer, the seen, etc.,

original: rnam par bshad par shes par bya //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs so //🔽nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / myong bar byed pa dang / reg par byed pa dang / yid dang / nyan pa po dang / mnyan par bya @83a * //
analyzed: rnam par bshad par shes par bya // zhes bya ba gsungs so // nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / myong bar byed pa dang / reg par byed pa dang / yid dang / nyan pa po dang / mnyan par bya @83a * //
translated: should be understood as explained.

original: ba la sogs pa dag gi lan kyang btab par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ba la sogs pa dag gi lan kyang btab par shes par bya'o //
translated: The hearer, the smeller, the taster, the toucher, the thinker, the hearer, the seen, etc., should be understood as answered.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: lta ba nyid kyis te /
analyzed: lta ba nyid kyis te /
translated: By the refutation of the seer.🔽The refutation of the hearer, etc., should be understood in the same way as the refutation of the seer, as appropriate.

original: lta ba dgag pa bzhin du nyan pa la sogs pa dag dgag pa yang ci rigs par rjes su dang ga pa rgyas par spros pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: lta ba dgag pa bzhin du nyan pa la sogs pa dag dgag pa yang ci rigs par rjes su dang ga pa rgyas par spros pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o //
translated: The extensive explanation with elaboration should be understood.

original: des na rab tu byed pa rtsom pa nas rnam par rtog par byed pa'i skye ba yang ma grub la 'gro ba yang ma grub bo //
analyzed: des na rab tu byed pa rtsom pa nas rnam par rtog par byed pa'i skye ba yang ma grub la 'gro ba yang ma grub bo //
translated: Therefore, in the composition of the treatise, the arising of the thinker is not established, and going is not established.

original: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni pha rol pos smras pa'i sgrub pa'i skyon brjod pas skye mched rnams stong pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni pha rol pos smras pa'i sgrub pa'i skyon brjod pas skye mched rnams stong pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: Here, the meaning of the treatise is that the sense bases are shown to be emptiness by stating the faults of the establishment spoken by the opponent.

original: de'i phyir nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i don te /
analyzed: de'i phyir nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i don te /
translated: Therefore, the inner earth element and the outer earth element are non-dual.🔽That is also the non-duality, indivisibility, and single characteristic of non-characteristics, which is

original: de yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ye shes kyis gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ye shes kyis gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa 'di lta ste /
translated: fully and perfectly realized by the Tathāgata with wisdom and knowledge.

original: mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du bu mo khams dag ji ltar blta bar bya /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du bu mo khams dag ji ltar blta bar bya /
translated: And likewise, “Daughter, how should the elements be seen?”

original: bu mos smras pa /
analyzed: bu mos smras pa /
translated: The daughter said:

original: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
translated: Mañjuśrī, it is like this:

original: dper na 'jig rten gsum bskal pa'i mes bsregs pa na thal ba yang med pa ltar ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na 'jig rten gsum bskal pa'i mes bsregs pa na thal ba yang med pa ltar ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: mig ni gzugs la mi lta zhing //
analyzed: mig ni gzugs la mi lta zhing //
translated: The eye does not see form,

original: yid ni chos rnams mi shes te //
analyzed: yid ni chos rnams mi shes te //
translated: The mind does not know phenomena.

original: gang la 'jig rten mi 'jug pa //
analyzed: gang la 'jig rten mi 'jug pa //
translated: Where the world does not engage,

original: de ni dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: de ni dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: That is the highest truth.🔽And similarly,

original: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du chos thams cad ni shes par mi byed /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du chos thams cad ni shes par mi byed /
translated: All phenomena are not to be known,

original: lta bar mi byed de /
analyzed: lta bar mi byed de /
translated: Not to be seen.

original: de ni chos smra ba la yang dmigs par mi byed /
analyzed: de ni chos smra ba la yang dmigs par mi byed /
translated: One should not attend to the one who speaks of the Dharma,

original: sems par mi byed /
analyzed: sems par mi byed /
translated: Should not think,🔽Should not imagine.

original: rlom par mi byed do zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du sring mo mig ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed /
analyzed: rlom par mi byed do zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du sring mo mig ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed /
translated: And similarly, Sister, the eye does not see forms,

original: rnam par shes par mi byed de /
analyzed: rnam par shes par mi byed de /
translated: Does not cognize them.

original: byang chub kyang mig dang gzugs dang bral ba nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub kyang mig dang gzugs dang bral ba nyid do //
translated: Awakening is free from eye and form.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gang chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed rnam par shes par mi byed de /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gang chos rnams 'dzin par mi byed rnam par shes par mi byed de /
translated: The ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind do not apprehend or cognize phenomena.

original: byang chub kyang yid dang chos dang bral ba nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs ni gzugs kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyang yid dang chos dang bral ba nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin du rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs ni gzugs kyi spyod yul ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, form is not the domain of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin no //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not the domain of consciousness.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa spyod yul zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyis gzugs mi shes mi mthong ba @83b dang ; tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ba'o //
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa spyod yul zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyis gzugs mi shes mi mthong ba @83b dang ; tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ba'o //
translated: Subhūti, the domain is that form does not know or see form, and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness do not know or see consciousness.

original: gzugs mi shes mi mthong /
analyzed: gzugs mi shes mi mthong /
translated: Form does not know or see form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no //🔽slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no // slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
translated: That which does not know or see feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is the perfection of wisdom.

original: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
analyzed: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
translated: The master Bhāviveka’s Lamp of Wisdom, a commentary on Nāgārjuna’s Root Verses on the Middle Way,

original: skye mched brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: skye mched brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is called “Examination of the Faculties.”

original: rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the third chapter.

original: // / da ni skye mched yod pa nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas phung po rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa bzhi ba brtsam mo //
analyzed: // / da ni skye mched yod pa nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas phung po rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa bzhi ba brtsam mo //
translated: Now, chapter 4 is begun by way of the meaning of the teaching that the aggregates are essenceless through the refutation of the special discordant class, the existence of the faculties.

original: rab tu byed pa bstan ma thag pa'i mjug tu /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa bstan ma thag pa'i mjug tu /
translated: Immediately after the chapter on the faculties is taught,

original: lta bas nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
analyzed: lta bas nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
translated: Seeing, hearing, smelling, Tasting, touching, and mental cognition,

original: nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs //
analyzed: nyan pa po dang mnyan la sogs //
translated: The hearer, the heard, and so on,

original: rnam par bshad par shes par bya //
analyzed: rnam par bshad par shes par bya //
translated: One should understand the explanation.

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir rang gi sde pa dag na re /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir rang gi sde pa dag na re /
translated: Thus, our own schools say:

original: don dam par skye mched rnams yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: don dam par skye mched rnams yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: The sense spheres exist ultimately,

original: phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are included in the aggregates.

original: 'di na gang yod pa ma yin pa de ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung pos ma bsdus te /
analyzed: 'di na gang yod pa ma yin pa de ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung pos ma bsdus te /
translated: Here, that which does not exist is not included in the aggregates of form and so on,

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: like a sky flower.

original: nang gi skye mched rnams la ni phung pos bsdus pa yod de /
analyzed: nang gi skye mched rnams la ni phung pos bsdus pa yod de /
translated: The internal sense spheres are included in the aggregates,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: because

original: gzugs can bcu ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus la /
analyzed: gzugs can bcu ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus la /
translated: ten of them are included in the aggregate of form,

original: chos kyi skye mched ni phung po gsum dang / gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig gis bsdus /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched ni phung po gsum dang / gzugs kyi phung po'i phyogs gcig gis bsdus /
translated: the sense sphere of mental objects is included in three aggregates and one part of the aggregate of form,

original: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i phung pos bsdus so //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched ni rnam par shes pa'i phung pos bsdus so //
translated: and the sense sphere of the mental faculty is included in the aggregate of consciousness.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pas don dam par nang gi skye mched rnams yod pa na yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pas don dam par nang gi skye mched rnams yod pa na yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, because of the reason stated, the internal sense spheres exist ultimately.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we reply:

original: 'di la gzugs ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: 'di la gzugs ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Form is twofold:

original: 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs so //
translated: primary form and derivative form.

original: dus la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dus la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: All of these, differentiated by time, etc., are included in the aggregate of form.

original: de la re zhig pha rol po'i gtan tshigs nyid du mig la sogs pa bsdus par 'dod pa'i phyir dang / bstan sla ba'i phyir gzugs las brtsams te bsam par bya'o //🔽gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: de la re zhig pha rol po'i gtan tshigs nyid du mig la sogs pa bsdus par 'dod pa'i phyir dang / bstan sla ba'i phyir gzugs las brtsams te bsam par bya'o // gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the aggregate of form, we will first consider form, because the opponent accepts that the eye, etc., are included in the aggregate of form and because it is easy to demonstrate.🔽Form is not perceived

original: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //🔽gzugs zhes bya ba ni @84a * //
analyzed: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs zhes bya ba ni @84a * //
translated: apart from the cause of form.

original: gzugs su rung ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs su rung ba'o //
translated: Form is that which is suitable as form.

original: de'i rgyu ni gzugs kyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni gzugs kyi rgyu ste /
translated: Its cause is the cause of form.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag go //🔽de dag ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag go // de dag ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The four great elements, earth, etc.🔽Apart from them

original: de dag bstsal na'o //
analyzed: de dag bstsal na'o //
translated: means excluding them.

original: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Form is not perceived

original: zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don dam par ro //
translated: means ultimately.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /🔽tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na / tha snyad gdags pa'i phyir /
translated: What then?

original: gzugs kyi rgyu 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag la brten nas gzugs zhes 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag la brten nas gzugs zhes 'dogs par byed do //
translated: It is said that form is designated in dependence on the four great elements that are its cause.

original: de ltar na 'dis gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba chos sa la sogs par 'dus pa tsam nyid dang / gzugs kyi bsgrub pa'i chos rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dis gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya ba chos sa la sogs par 'dus pa tsam nyid dang / gzugs kyi bsgrub pa'i chos rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, this shows that the object to be established by form is merely the aggregation of earth and so on, and that without apprehending the cause of form, the cognition of form does not exist.

original: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
analyzed: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
translated: The example is stated by the words “by the power of that.”

original: dmag dang nags tshal la sogs pa dag yin no //
analyzed: dmag dang nags tshal la sogs pa dag yin no //
translated: The example is an army, a forest, and so on.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par gzugs rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par gzugs rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the inference is this: Form does not ultimately exist substantially,

original: rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir ro //🔽'di na gang rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa ni rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir ro // 'di na gang rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa ni rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
translated: because without apprehending its cause, the cognition of it does not exist.

original: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Here, that which does not exist substantially without apprehending its cause is like an army, and so on.

original: de bzhin du gzugs kyang rang gi rgyus la sogs pa dag ma bzung na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs kyang rang gi rgyus la sogs pa dag ma bzung na /
translated: Form also does not exist without apprehending its cause, earth, and so on.

original: gzugs kyi blo med pas rdzas su yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi blo med pas rdzas su yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because there is no cognition of form, it does not substantially exist.

original: yang na sbyor ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
analyzed: yang na sbyor ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
translated: Or, there is another syllogism:

original: don dam par gzugs kyi blo ni dngos po rdzas su yod pa'i yul can ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par gzugs kyi blo ni dngos po rdzas su yod pa'i yul can ma yin te /
translated: ultimately, the cognition of form does not have as its object a substantially existent thing,

original: blo yin pa'i phyir dper na nags tshal la sogs pa'i blo bzhin no //
analyzed: blo yin pa'i phyir dper na nags tshal la sogs pa'i blo bzhin no //
translated: because it is a cognition, like the cognition of a forest, and so on.

original: yang na sbyor ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
analyzed: yang na sbyor ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
translated: Or, there is another syllogism:

original: don dam par gzugs kyi zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni tshig gi don rdzas su yod pa'i yul can ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par gzugs kyi zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di ni tshig gi don rdzas su yod pa'i yul can ma yin te /
translated: ultimately, the word “form” does not have as its object a substantially existent thing,

original: sgra yin pa'i phyir dper na dmag la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra yin pa'i phyir dper na dmag la sogs pa'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: because it is a word, like the word “army,” and so on.

original: rnam par shes pa dang / sems las byung ba dag kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / rigs mthun pa nyid kyis de bzhin du dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang / sems las byung ba dag kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / rigs mthun pa nyid kyis de bzhin du dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Consciousness and mental factors are also to be refuted in the same way, because they are to be established as similar.

original: gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the reason is not unestablished.

original: gal te gzugs ni don dam par yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te gzugs ni don dam par yod pa yin te /
translated: If you say that form exists ultimately,

original: de zhig kyang de'i blo mi 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de zhig kyang de'i blo mi 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the cognition of that does not cease when it is destroyed.

original: 'di na gang zhig na de'i blo 'jig pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di na gang zhig na de'i blo 'jig pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin te /
translated: Here, that which is conventionally existent is that whose cognition ceases when it ceases.

original: dper na bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bum pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, a pot.

original: gzugs sngon po la sogs pa dag ni zhig kyang de'i blo de ltar mi 'jig pas de'i phyir gzugs ni rdzas su yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs sngon po la sogs pa dag ni zhig kyang de'i blo de ltar mi 'jig pas de'i phyir gzugs ni rdzas su yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But the cognition of blue, etc., does not cease in that way when it is destroyed. Therefore, form exists substantially.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good,

original: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no concomitance.

original: de ltar re zhig rgyur byas pa'i gzugs brtags zin to //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rgyur byas pa'i gzugs brtags zin to //
translated: Thus, derivative form has been examined.

original: da ni 'byung ba'i gzugs kyi @84b dbang du byas te bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: da ni 'byung ba'i gzugs kyi @84b dbang du byas te bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, the four great elements should be explained in terms of form.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Derivative form does exist,

original: de'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its cause exists.

original: 'di na gang med pa de la ni rgyu gzung du med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang med pa de la ni rgyu gzung du med de /
translated: For, that which does not exist has no cause that can be apprehended,

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: like a sky flower.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la ni rgyu sa la sogs pa de dag yod pas de'i phyir rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni yod pa kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la ni rgyu sa la sogs pa de dag yod pas de'i phyir rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni yod pa kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, derivative form exists.

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: To this, the following reply is made:

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from what is called form,

original: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
translated: the cause of form is not seen.🔽Here, apart from the characteristics of derivative form, form, sound,

original: 'di la rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu sa la sogs pa dag kyang mi snang zhing gzung du med do //
analyzed: 'di la rgyur byas pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu sa la sogs pa dag kyang mi snang zhing gzung du med do //
translated: odor, taste, and the tangible, the causes of form, earth, etc., are not seen and are not apprehended.🔽Here, the thesis to be established, the form of the primary elements, is merely the aggregation of such dharmas as form, etc.

original: 'dir yang 'byung ba'i gzugs kyi bsgrub par bya ba chos gzugs la sogs pa 'dus pa tsam nyid dang / sgrub pa'i chos gzugs la sogs pa mi snang na sa la sogs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'dir yang 'byung ba'i gzugs kyi bsgrub par bya ba chos gzugs la sogs pa 'dus pa tsam nyid dang / sgrub pa'i chos gzugs la sogs pa mi snang na sa la sogs pa de dag kyang mi snang bar bstan to //
translated: The establishing dharmas are form, etc. If they are not seen, then earth, etc., are also not seen.

original: de'i phyir de'i dbang gis dpe yang mngon no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i dbang gis dpe yang mngon no //
translated: Therefore, the example is evident by the power of this argument.

original: de la 'dir re zhig sa'i dbang du byas te sbyor ba'i tshig bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'dir re zhig sa'i dbang du byas te sbyor ba'i tshig bya'o //
