translated: Here, for the time being, we will apply the term “composition” in terms of the earth element.

original: 'dus pa tsam nyid kyang /
analyzed: 'dus pa tsam nyid kyang /
translated: Even mere collection

original: don dam par mi ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par mi ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not taught to be ultimately existent.

original: 'dir bstan bcos mdzad pas 'dus pa tsam nyid bstan pas /
analyzed: 'dir bstan bcos mdzad pas 'dus pa tsam nyid bstan pas /
translated: Here, the author of the treatise teaches mere collection,

original: rdzas su yod pa nyid dgag pa kho na bstan te /
analyzed: rdzas su yod pa nyid dgag pa kho na bstan te /
translated: and he teaches only the negation of substantial existence.

original: de dag pa ni don che ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag pa ni don che ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because that is of great significance.

original: ji ltar de don che ba nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de don che ba nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How is it of great significance?

original: 'di ltar tha snyad du brten nas 'dogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar tha snyad du brten nas 'dogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: It is because whatever is dependently imputed conventionally

original: don dam par rdzas su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir skye ba med pas ngo bo nyid med pa nyid grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par rdzas su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir skye ba med pas ngo bo nyid med pa nyid grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not substantially existent ultimately, and therefore it is established as being unarisen and essenceless.

original: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
analyzed: 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
translated: The noble Sūtra on Entering Lanka says:

original: gang phyir 'dus pa ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gang phyir 'dus pa ma gtogs par //
translated: Because apart from a collection,

original: blo yis dngos po gzung du med //
analyzed: blo yis dngos po gzung du med //
translated: the mind does not apprehend things,

original: de phyir stong dang ma skyes dang // rang bzhin med par du smra'o //
analyzed: de phyir stong dang ma skyes dang // rang bzhin med par du smra'o //
translated: Therefore I say that they are empty, unarisen, and essenceless.

original: 'di la rkyen gyis cung zad kyang //
analyzed: 'di la rkyen gyis cung zad kyang //
translated: Here, due to conditions, not even the slightest

original: skye ba dang ni dgag pa med //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni dgag pa med //
translated: And there is no cessation.🔽And there is no arising.

original: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa yang //🔽rkyen rnams kho na 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa yang // rkyen rnams kho na 'ba' zhig go //
translated: And there is no cessation.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //🔽'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par sa ni rdzas su yod pa ma yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par sa ni rdzas su yod pa ma yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: And so on, as it is said.

original: de'i rgyu mi snang na de mi snang ba'i phyir ro //🔽gang rgyu mi snang na de mi snang ba de ni don dam par rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rgyu mi snang na de mi snang ba'i phyir ro // gang rgyu mi snang na de mi snang ba de ni don dam par rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Here is the syllogism: “The ultimate, earth, is not substantially existent, because its cause is not perceived, when its cause is not perceived, it is not perceived.

original: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Whatever, when its cause is not perceived, it is not perceived, that is not substantially existent in the ultimate, like an army, and so on.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And so on, in the same way,

original: blo dang sgra'i phyogs la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: blo dang sgra'i phyogs la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: with regard to the categories of cognition and sound.

original: yang na gzugs kyi rgyus la sogs pa de dag ma gtogs @85a * //
analyzed: yang na gzugs kyi rgyus la sogs pa de dag ma gtogs @85a * //
translated: Or, the cause of form, and so on, is not perceived apart from them.

original: par de dag las gzhan pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
analyzed: par de dag las gzhan pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de /
translated: Apart from them, form is not perceived.

original: rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de gzung du med pa ni gzugs kyi chos yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de gzung du med pa ni gzugs kyi chos yin no //
translated: When its cause is not grasped, it is not grasped. This is the nature of form.

original: 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par gzugs ni rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par gzugs ni rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Here the syllogism is: Ultimately, form is not different from its own parts,

original: de ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
translated: because when it is not apprehended, the cognition of it does not occur,

original: dper na sa la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na sa la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: just as, for example, earth and so on are not different from their own natures.

original: 'dir bya ba la gnas pa yin par bsams bas ma bzung ba blo'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir bya ba la gnas pa yin par bsams bas ma bzung ba blo'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Here, since it is thought that the action is present, the nonapprehension is a property of the cognition.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the reason is not unestablished.

original: grangs can dag na re /
analyzed: grangs can dag na re /
translated: The Samkhyas argue as follows:

original: gzugs la sogs pa dag las sa la sogs pa dag gzhan ma yin pas /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dag las sa la sogs pa dag gzhan ma yin pas /
translated: Since earth and so on are not different from form and so on,

original: de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: this is an establishment of what is already established.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: This is not good,

original: gzhan nyid dgag pas gzhan ma yin pa nyid du ston par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / pha rol po 'dod pa'i gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid dgag pas gzhan ma yin pa nyid du ston par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / pha rol po 'dod pa'i gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyang khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the negation of difference does not teach nondifference, and because the nondifference that the opponent accepts is not accepted.

original: bye brag pa dag gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid du rgol bar byed de /
analyzed: bye brag pa dag gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid du rgol bar byed de /
translated: The Vaisesikas argue that the reason is not established.

original: mar med ma bzung yang de las gzhan pa yod na bum pa la de'i blo yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mar med ma bzung yang de las gzhan pa yod na bum pa la de'i blo yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But if it exists as something other than that, then the mind would be directed to the pot.

original: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good,

original: de'i blo med pa kho na'i phyir ro zhes nges par bzung ba'i phyir dang / mar me med kyang nor bu dang / 'od zer dang / sman dang zla ba dang / nyi ma'i snang ba yod na de'i blo yod pas /
analyzed: de'i blo med pa kho na'i phyir ro zhes nges par bzung ba'i phyir dang / mar me med kyang nor bu dang / 'od zer dang / sman dang zla ba dang / nyi ma'i snang ba yod na de'i blo yod pas /
translated: because it is ascertained that the mind is directed to it only when the lamp exists, and when the lamp does not exist, the mind is directed to it only when there is the light of a jewel, light rays, medicine, the moon, or the sun.

original: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la bsgrub pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la bsgrub pa'i chos med pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, because the property of the probandum does not exist in the dissimilar class, it is not indeterminate.

original: rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te zhes dam bcas pa khyad par can nye bar bzung ba'i phyir mar me ni bum pa'i rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te zhes dam bcas pa khyad par can nye bar bzung ba'i phyir mar me ni bum pa'i rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the lamp is not a part of the collection of the pot, because the special thesis “It is not different from its own parts” is accepted.

original: 'og nas gang yang gang dang lhan cig tu gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad do zhes ston pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'og nas gang yang gang dang lhan cig tu gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad do zhes ston pas mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i phyir /
translated: Later, it will be shown that “Whatever is not different from something else is not tenable as something else,” and because the dissimilar class does not exist,

original: don dam par mar me las bum pa gzhan nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir yang ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par mar me las bum pa gzhan nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir yang ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is not indefinite because a pot is not established as different from a lamp ultimately.

original: gal te dmag la sogs pa yan lag can gyi rdzas dag la /
analyzed: gal te dmag la sogs pa yan lag can gyi rdzas dag la /
translated: If you say that the substance of the whole, such as an army,

original: rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir sa la sogs pa dag rdzas su yod pa nyid ma yin par rab tu sgrub pa'i rdzas su dpag pa dag gis dpe ma grub bo zhe na /🔽dmag gi yan lag dag ni dmag ces bya ba yan lag can gyi rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir sa la sogs pa dag rdzas su yod pa nyid ma yin par rab tu sgrub pa'i rdzas su dpag pa dag gis dpe ma grub bo zhe na / dmag gi yan lag dag ni dmag ces bya ba yan lag can gyi rdzas rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: is not established as an example in the inference that proves that earth and so on are not substantially existent because it is the beginning of composition,

original: yan lag yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yan lag yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then the parts of an army do not compose the substance of the whole called an army because they are parts.

original: dper na / shing gi yan lag rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / yal ga phra mo la @85b sogs pa dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / shing gi yan lag rtsa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang / yal ga phra mo la @85b sogs pa dag bzhin no //
translated: For example, the parts of a tree, such as the roots, trunk, branches, and twigs,

original: yang na glang po che dag la yongs su rdzogs pa de'i yan lag gang yin pa de ni shing rta dang rta la sogs pa dag rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na glang po che dag la yongs su rdzogs pa de'i yan lag gang yin pa de ni shing rta dang rta la sogs pa dag rtsom par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: or the parts of an elephant that are complete do not compose a chariot, horse, and so on.

original: de la med pa'i phyir dper na rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin pas dpe med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la med pa'i phyir dper na rgyu spun la sogs pa bzhin pas dpe med pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that there is no example, as in the case of the cause, such as the thread, and so on.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par ;
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par ;
translated: apart from what is called form,

original: / gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
analyzed: / gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
translated: the cause of form is not seen.

original: zhes bya ba 'di la yang snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos dag nye bar sbyar nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di la yang snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos dag nye bar sbyar nas /
translated: Here, as before, having applied the probandum and the property of the example,

original: rjes su dpag pa rgyas par brjod par bya'o //🔽ji ltar gzugs sa la sogs pa dag las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa rgyas par brjod par bya'o // ji ltar gzugs sa la sogs pa dag las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: the inference should be stated in full.🔽Just as form is not different from earth, and so on,

original: sa la sogs pa dag gzugs las gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin te /🔽'og nas gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyang 'gog pa'i phyir dang / gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyis 'o ma yang zho nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: sa la sogs pa dag gzugs las gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin te / 'og nas gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyang 'gog pa'i phyir dang / gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyis 'o ma yang zho nyid du 'gyur ba'am /
translated: in the same way, earth, and so on, are not different from form.🔽Because later on, non-difference will also be refuted, and because it is not tenable that milk is curd due to non-difference,

original: zho yang 'o ma nyid du 'gyur na mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zho yang 'o ma nyid du 'gyur na mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: or that curd is milk.

original: de'i phyir / gcig pa nyid dang gzhan nyid du //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gcig pa nyid dang gzhan nyid du //
translated: Therefore,

original: ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar byis pas rnam brtags ltar //
translated: as children imagine,

original: dngos po gzhan pa ma yin dang // tshogs las gzhan pa'ang gang na'ang med //
analyzed: dngos po gzhan pa ma yin dang // tshogs las gzhan pa'ang gang na'ang med //
translated: And there is no entity that is not other, nor is there a collection that is other.

original: ces gsungs pa de grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ces gsungs pa de grub pa yin no //
translated: This is established.

original: de'i phyir de ltar skye mched rnams rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro zes smras pa'i don ma grub pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar skye mched rnams rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro zes smras pa'i don ma grub pa nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, since the reason is included in the aggregates, the meaning of the statement “because they are included in the aggregates” is not established.

original: don 'gal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: don 'gal ba nyid yin no //
translated: Or, if established, it is contradictory.

original: gzugs kyi rgyu ma gtogs par yang gzugs yod do zhes shes par byar mi nus te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu ma gtogs par yang gzugs yod do zhes shes par byar mi nus te /
translated: It cannot be known that form exists apart from the cause of form.

original: 'on kyang rnam par rtog na /🔽gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par rtog na / gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
translated: But if you imagine that,🔽then form would be without a cause of form,

original: gzugs na gzugs ni rgyu med par //
analyzed: gzugs na gzugs ni rgyu med par //
translated: apart from the cause of form.

original: thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: It follows that

original: gzugs kyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi yod pa nyid kyi rgyu ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi yod pa nyid kyi rgyu ste /
translated: the cause of form is the cause of the existence of form,

original: bar gyi tshig mi mngon pa'i phyir mi'i rgyu bzhin no //
analyzed: bar gyi tshig mi mngon pa'i phyir mi'i rgyu bzhin no //
translated: like the cause of a human, because the middle term is not expressed.

original: de ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi rgyu ma gtogs par te /
analyzed: de ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi rgyu ma gtogs par te /
translated: Apart from that is apart from the cause of form.

original: gzugs yod pa nyid du ston pa'i rgyu med par zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gzugs yod pa nyid du ston pa'i rgyu med par zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that there is no cause to demonstrate that form exists.

original: gzugs na zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa tsam las rnam pa de lta bu de 'dod na'o //
analyzed: gzugs na zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa tsam las rnam pa de lta bu de 'dod na'o //
translated: “In the form” means that if you assert that form is like that, it is merely a thesis.

original: gzugs ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa med par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzugs ni rgyu med par thal bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa med par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: “Form would arise without a cause” means that it is untenable.

original: de yang mi 'dod pas ji skad smras pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
analyzed: de yang mi 'dod pas ji skad smras pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
translated: Since that is unacceptable, the fault stated above cannot be averted.

original: rgyu med par gang dag dngos po thams cad rgyu med pa kho na las skye bar khas blangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu med par gang dag dngos po thams cad rgyu med pa kho na las skye bar khas blangs pa'i phyir /
translated: Since you accept that all things arise only without a cause,

original: gzugs 'grub pa yang de dag dang 'dra'o zhes zer na /
analyzed: gzugs 'grub pa yang de dag dang 'dra'o zhes zer na /
translated: the establishment of form is similar to that.

original: de la bshad pa /
analyzed: de la bshad pa /
translated: Nāgārjuna responds:

original: @86a * // gal te 'ga' zhig ji skad smras pa'i rnam pa lta bur gyur na ni de yang rung ba zhig na /🔽don gang yang /
analyzed: @86a * // gal te 'ga' zhig ji skad smras pa'i rnam pa lta bur gyur na ni de yang rung ba zhig na / don gang yang /
translated: If something were like the example you stated, that would be acceptable.🔽But no object

original: rgyu med pa ni gang na'ang med //
analyzed: rgyu med pa ni gang na'ang med //
translated: exists without a cause.

original: de yang dpe med pa'i phyir smra ba de la yang grub pa med do //
analyzed: de yang dpe med pa'i phyir smra ba de la yang grub pa med do //
translated: Since that is also without example, your statement is also unestablished.

original: kho bos dang po nyid du yang rgyu med par smra ba dag bsal zin pas de ni bden pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: kho bos dang po nyid du yang rgyu med par smra ba dag bsal zin pas de ni bden pa ma yin no ;
translated: I have already refuted the proponents of causeless arising, so that is not true.

original: / gang dag grangs can dag gi tshul la mkhas su re bas /
analyzed: / gang dag grangs can dag gi tshul la mkhas su re bas /
translated: Those who, hoping to be experts in the Sāṃkhya system,

original: 'di skad ces khyod kyis sa la sogs pa dag gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan ma yin no zhes smras pas /
analyzed: 'di skad ces khyod kyis sa la sogs pa dag gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan ma yin no zhes smras pas /
translated: say, “You say that earth and so on are not different from form and so on.

original: de dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid du khas blangs pa yin pas des na don dam par sa la sogs pa dag rdzas su yod par shes par byar nus te /
analyzed: de dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid du khas blangs pa yin pas des na don dam par sa la sogs pa dag rdzas su yod par shes par byar nus te /
translated: Since you assert that they are not different, it follows that earth and so on can be known to ultimately exist substantially,

original: gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dag las gzhan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are not different from form and so on.🔽This is just like the self-entity of form and so on.”

original: dper na gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes zer na ji skad pa stan pa'i tshul gyis gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dper na gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes zer na ji skad pa stan pa'i tshul gyis gzhan ma yin pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since nondifference is not established by the mode of statement, the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: dpe yang med de /
analyzed: dpe yang med de /
translated: There is also no example.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the self-entity of form and so on is refuted.

original: gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:

original: don dam par sa la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: don dam par sa la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Earth and so on exist ultimately,

original: de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because their effects exist.

original: 'di na gang med pa de la ni 'bras bu gzung du med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang med pa de la ni 'bras bu gzung du med de /
translated: If something does not exist, its effect cannot be apprehended,

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: like a flower in the sky.

original: sa la sogs pa dag la ni 'bras bu gzugs la sogs pa dag yod pas de'i phyir sa la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa dag la ni 'bras bu gzugs la sogs pa dag yod pas de'i phyir sa la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: But since the effects of earth and so on, such as form, do exist, therefore earth and so on exist.

original: 'dir bshad pa /🔽gal te gzugs ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / gal te gzugs ni ma gtogs par //
translated: Here we say:🔽If the cause of form exists

original: gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod na ni //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu zhig yod na ni //
translated: without form,

original: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur te //
translated: then it would be a cause without an effect,

original: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu med do //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu med do //
translated: but there is no cause without an effect.

original: kho bo'i phyogs la gal te gzugs ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu sa la sogs pa zhig yod na ni des na 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: kho bo'i phyogs la gal te gzugs ma gtogs par gzugs kyi rgyu sa la sogs pa zhig yod na ni des na 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: In our system, if the cause of form, such as earth, exists without form, then it would be a cause without an effect.

original: 'bras bu gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'bras bu med pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would be a cause without an effect characterized by an effect such as form.

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir rtsi skyang la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir rtsi skyang la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because they are different, like grass and trees.

original: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu med do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu med do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There is no cause without an effect.

original: de yang gzugs la sogs pa 'dus pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de yang gzugs la sogs pa 'dus pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is because the nature of form, etc., is the aggregation of causes.

original: de'i phyir rgyu bzhin du 'bras bu yang ma grub pa'i phyir de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar smras pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu bzhin du 'bras bu yang ma grub pa'i phyir de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro zhes sngar smras pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon yod do //
translated: Therefore, since the effect is not established like the cause, the error of the nonestablishment of the meaning of the reason previously stated, “because the effect exists,” still remains.

original: spyir grags pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na ni don @86b 'gal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: spyir grags pa'i gtan tshigs nyid du brjod na ni don @86b 'gal ba nyid yin no //
translated: If you state a reason that is generally recognized, then the meaning is contradictory.

original: sun dbyung ba'i len gzhan yang yod de /🔽'di la gzugs kyi rgyu zhig brtags na gzugs yod pa'am /
analyzed: sun dbyung ba'i len gzhan yang yod de / 'di la gzugs kyi rgyu zhig brtags na gzugs yod pa'am /
translated: There is another refutation:

original: med pa la brtag grang na /
analyzed: med pa la brtag grang na /
translated: If you investigate the cause of form, is it investigated as existent or🔽nonexistent?

original: gnyi ga la yang mi 'thad par bshad pa /🔽gzugs yod na yang gzugs kyi ni //
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang mi 'thad par bshad pa / gzugs yod na yang gzugs kyi ni //
translated: It is explained that neither is tenable:🔽Even if form exists,

original: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid //
analyzed: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid //
translated: the cause of form is not tenable.

original: yod pa'i phyir dper na bum pa dang snam bu yod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yod pa'i phyir dper na bum pa dang snam bu yod pa bzhin no //
translated: because it exists, like, for example, a pot and a cloth.

original: ci ste med na yang /🔽gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi ni //
analyzed: ci ste med na yang / gzugs med na yang gzugs kyi ni //
translated: But if it does not exist,🔽then even without form,

original: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid /
analyzed: rgyu yang 'thad par mi 'gyur nyid /
translated: the cause of form would not be tenable.

original: sa la sogs pa 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa 'dod pa ste //
translated: Earth, etc. are asserted

original: skye ba'i sngon rol na med pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: skye ba'i sngon rol na med pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: to be like something else, because they do not exist prior to arising.

original: 'dir skye ba med pa'i rab tu byed par bstan pa'i sun dbyung ba rjes su bzlas pas /
analyzed: 'dir skye ba med pa'i rab tu byed par bstan pa'i sun dbyung ba rjes su bzlas pas /
translated: Here, the refutation taught in the Chapter on Non-arising should be repeated.

original: sun dbyung ba brjod par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sun dbyung ba brjod par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the refutation is stated in that way.

original: rgyu med par smra ba dag rgyu med pa kho na'o zhes zer ba de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: rgyu med par smra ba dag rgyu med pa kho na'o zhes zer ba de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
translated: For those who advocate causelessness, who say that things arise without a cause, it is explained:

original: rgyu med pa yi gzugs dag ni //
analyzed: rgyu med pa yi gzugs dag ni //
translated: Forms without a cause

original: 'thad par mi rung rung ma yin //
analyzed: 'thad par mi rung rung ma yin //
translated: are not tenable, not tenable.

original: kun rdzob tu yang de khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu yang de khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because they are not accepted even conventionally.

original: yang na bye brag tu smra ba dag ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyang yod do zhes zer bas de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: yang na bye brag tu smra ba dag ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyang yod do zhes zer bas de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore, this is explained:

original: rgyu med pa yi gzugs dag ni //
analyzed: rgyu med pa yi gzugs dag ni //
translated: Form without a cause

original: 'thad par mi rung rung ma yin //
analyzed: 'thad par mi rung rung ma yin //
translated: is not tenable.

original: ma 'ongs pa skye ba'i rgyu ma blangs pa dag nyid kyi dngos po ma thob pa ni tha snyad du yang yod par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa skye ba'i rgyu ma blangs pa dag nyid kyi dngos po ma thob pa ni tha snyad du yang yod par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is the intention that that which has not obtained the state of existence of that which has not taken up the cause of the arising of the future is not established as existent even conventionally.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi gzugs rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi gzugs rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad pa /
translated: Since form that is the nature of the primary elements and secondary characteristics is not tenable in any way,🔽therefore, any conception of form

original: de phyir gzugs kyi rnam par rtog /'ga' yang rnam par brtag mi bya //
analyzed: de phyir gzugs kyi rnam par rtog /'ga' yang rnam par brtag mi bya //
translated: should not be conceived.

original: mkhas pa chos kyi de kho na rnam par rtog pa dang / legs par bral bar rtogs par 'dod pa yang dag pa'i shes pa'i mig yang dag par bye bas gzugs rdzas su yod pa dang / rgyu las gzhan pa dang / rgyu las gzhan pa ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: mkhas pa chos kyi de kho na rnam par rtog pa dang / legs par bral bar rtogs par 'dod pa yang dag pa'i shes pa'i mig yang dag par bye bas gzugs rdzas su yod pa dang / rgyu las gzhan pa dang / rgyu las gzhan pa ma yin pa dang /
translated: The wise who wish to realize the suchness of phenomena, who are free from the many conceptual thoughts, who have opened the eye of correct knowledge, should not imagine the many conceptual objects of form, such as substantial existence, being different from its cause, not being different from its cause,

original: de dag la sogs pa kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi dbye ba la sogs pa yul gyi rnam par rtog pa mang po bu ma btsas pa'i rmi lam na bu'i gzugs dang spyod pa la sogs pa'i yul dag pa thong nas sad pa lta bu dag la rnam par brtag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa kha dog dang / dbyibs kyi dbye ba la sogs pa yul gyi rnam par rtog pa mang po bu ma btsas pa'i rmi lam na bu'i gzugs dang spyod pa la sogs pa'i yul dag pa thong nas sad pa lta bu dag la rnam par brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: and so on, such as the various divisions of color and shape, like a woman who has not given birth to a child imagining the various objects, such as the form and behavior of a child, in a dream.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gzugs kyi rgyu mi 'thad pa'i phyir ji skad smras pa'i skyon dang ma bral lo /🔽// / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma /🔽bam po lnga pa /🔽yang gzhan yang 'di na rgyu'i yon tan snga na yod pa'i @87a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gzugs kyi rgyu mi 'thad pa'i phyir ji skad smras pa'i skyon dang ma bral lo /🔽// / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma /🔽bam po lnga pa /🔽yang gzhan yang 'di na rgyu'i yon tan snga na yod pa'i @87a * //
translated: Therefore, since the cause of form is untenable in this way, one is not free from the faults stated above.

original: rim gyis 'bras bu la yang yon tan mthong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gang dag 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra'o zhes zer ba de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: rim gyis 'bras bu la yang yon tan mthong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gang dag 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra'o zhes zer ba de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
translated: In the same way, some say that the effect is similar to the cause.

original: 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba zhes //
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba zhes //
translated: In response to them, it is said:

original: bya ba 'thad pa ma yin te //
analyzed: bya ba 'thad pa ma yin te //
translated: It is not tenable to say,🔽“The effect is similar to the cause.”

original: 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra bar bstan pa 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra bar bstan pa 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not tenable to say that the effect is similar to the cause.

original: rgyu de 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyu de 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of that is that the cause is not the effect.

original: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba chos smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu /
analyzed: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba chos smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu /
translated: Here the reason that is asserted to be the property of the subject is

original: rgyu ma yin pa nyid dang / sgrub pa'i chos 'dra bar bstan pa nye bar bzhag go //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa nyid dang / sgrub pa'i chos 'dra bar bstan pa nye bar bzhag go //
translated: not a cause and the property of the subject that is similar to the reason is presented.

original: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
analyzed: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
translated: The example is like that.

original: rgyud tha dad pa'i rdzas yin pa bzhin no //🔽'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu /
analyzed: rgyud tha dad pa'i rdzas yin pa bzhin no // 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu /
translated: It is a substance that is a different continuum.🔽Here the statement of the syllogism is:

original: rgyu spun sngon po ni la ba sngon po'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu spun sngon po ni la ba sngon po'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The ultimate cause that is asserted to be the property of the subject is not a cause of the blue cloth because

original: 'dra ba'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa'i la ba sngon po bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa'i la ba sngon po bzhin no //
translated: because of similarity, like a blue cloth that is different from that.

original: 'dir grangs can dag na re de las gzhan pa'i la ba sngon po la yang smra bar 'dod pa'i la ba sngon po'i rgyu med par ma grub pa'i phyir dpe med do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'dir grangs can dag na re de las gzhan pa'i la ba sngon po la yang smra bar 'dod pa'i la ba sngon po'i rgyu med par ma grub pa'i phyir dpe med do zhes zer ro //
translated: Here, the Sāṃkhyas say: “The example is not established because the cause of the blue cloth that is desired to be spoken of is not established as nonexistent in the blue cloth that is different from that.”

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good,🔽because the cause of its arising in the present is established as not a thing, and it is accepted as the very example.

original: da ltar de 'byung ba'i rgyu ni dngos po ma yin par grub pa nyid dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir dang / dgag pa 'di ni sgra gang dang lhan cig sbyor bar byed pa de'i brjod par bya ba don dgag pa kho nas mthu nye bar zad pa yin te /
analyzed: da ltar de 'byung ba'i rgyu ni dngos po ma yin par grub pa nyid dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir dang / dgag pa 'di ni sgra gang dang lhan cig sbyor bar byed pa de'i brjod par bya ba don dgag pa kho nas mthu nye bar zad pa yin te /
translated: This negation is merely the power of the negation of the object that is to be expressed, which is connected with any sound.

original: de na de'i khyad par mi ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de na de'i khyad par mi ston pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it does not indicate its distinction there,

original: bram ze ma yin no zhes bya ba bzhin pas skyon med do //
analyzed: bram ze ma yin no zhes bya ba bzhin pas skyon med do //
translated: like saying “he is not a brahmin.” Therefore there is no fault.

original: rang gi sde pa dag ni 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba dang mi 'dra bar yang smra bas skad cig ma snga ma mtshan nyid 'dra ba las skad cig ma phyi ma skye ba la ltos nas /🔽dper na mar me dang chu'i rgyun la sogs pa dag la ni rgyu'i skad cig ma dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi sde pa dag ni 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba dang mi 'dra bar yang smra bas skad cig ma snga ma mtshan nyid 'dra ba las skad cig ma phyi ma skye ba la ltos nas / dper na mar me dang chu'i rgyun la sogs pa dag la ni rgyu'i skad cig ma dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
translated: the later moment arises in dependence on the prior moment that has similar characteristics.🔽For example, in the case of a flame and a stream,

original: 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba yin no //
translated: they resemble the cause because they are similar to the moment of the cause.

original: skad cig ma snga ma mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba las skad cig ma phyi ma skyed pa la ltos nas /
analyzed: skad cig ma snga ma mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba las skad cig ma phyi ma skyed pa la ltos nas /
translated: The later moment arises in dependence on the prior moment that has dissimilar characteristics.🔽For example, in the case of ash from wood, curd from milk and so on,

original: dper na shing dang 'o ma dang de la sogs pa'i thal ba dang / zho la sogs pa dag la ni rgyu'i skad cig ma dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir mi 'dra ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na shing dang 'o ma dang de la sogs pa'i thal ba dang / zho la sogs pa dag la ni rgyu'i skad cig ma dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir mi 'dra ba yin no zhe na /
translated: they do not resemble the cause because they are dissimilar to the moment of the cause.

original: de la 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni rjes su dpag pa ji skad bstan pa nyid kyis dgag zin to //
analyzed: de la 'bras bu rgyu dang 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni rjes su dpag pa ji skad bstan pa nyid kyis dgag zin to //
translated: The effect that resembles the cause has already been refuted by the previously explained inference.

original: 'bras bu rgyu dang mi 'dra ba gang yin pa de'i dbang du byas te bshad pa /🔽'bras bu rgyu dang mi 'dra zhes //
analyzed: 'bras bu rgyu dang mi 'dra ba gang yin pa de'i dbang du byas te bshad pa / 'bras bu rgyu dang mi 'dra zhes //
translated: The following verse is stated with reference to the effect not being similar to the cause.🔽It is not tenable to say

original: bya ba'ang 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'ang 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: That the effect is not similar to the cause.

original: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos myu gu smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid dang / sgrub pa'i chos mi 'dra bar bstan pa nye bar bzhag go //
analyzed: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos myu gu smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu ma yin pa nyid dang / sgrub pa'i chos mi 'dra bar bstan pa nye bar bzhag go //
translated: Here, the probandum is that the sprout is not the effect of the cause that is asserted by the opponent, and the probative property is the presentation of the dissimilar example.

original: des na yan lag lhag @87b ma yang snga ma bzhin du mngon no //🔽'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par myu gu ni smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: des na yan lag lhag @87b ma yang snga ma bzhin du mngon no // 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par myu gu ni smra bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: The remaining parts of the syllogism are evident, as before.

original: mi 'dra ba'i phyir dper na gyo mo la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mi 'dra ba'i phyir dper na gyo mo la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Here the inference is: Ultimately, the sprout is not the effect of the cause that is asserted by the opponent, because it is not similar to it, like, for example, a clay pot.

original: ci ste yang 'bru ni myu gu'i rgyu kho na yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang 'bru ni myu gu'i rgyu kho na yin te /
translated: Now, suppose one said that the seed is the cause of the sprout,

original: de yod na 'byung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: because it arises when the seed exists,

original: des tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir dper na rnga bo che'i sgra 'am nas kyi myu gu bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: des tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir dper na rnga bo che'i sgra 'am nas kyi myu gu bzhin no zhe na /
translated: or because it is designated by that, like, for example, the sound of a drum or the sprout of barley.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good,

original: skye ba can rnams kyi skye ba rnam pa thams cad du bkag pas dpe ma grub pa'i phyir sgrub pa mtshang ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: skye ba can rnams kyi skye ba rnam pa thams cad du bkag pas dpe ma grub pa'i phyir sgrub pa mtshang ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: because the example is not established, since the arising of those who are born is completely refuted. Therefore, the error of the thesis being flawed exists.

original: gang dag 'di skad ces mig la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa mi 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir mi 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i gtan tshig ma nges pa nyid do zhes zer na /
analyzed: gang dag 'di skad ces mig la sogs pa'i 'bras bu ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa mi 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir mi 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i gtan tshig ma nges pa nyid do zhes zer na /
translated: Those who say, “The reason ‘because the effect of the eye and so on is dissimilar’ is not established, because the effect of the eye and so on is dissimilar to the effect of the ear and so on, but is similar to the effect of eye consciousness and so on,”

original: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
translated: that is not good,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang bsgrub par bya ba dang / rigs mthun pa nyid kyis de bzhin du dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pas ma nges pa nyid kyi skabs med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang bsgrub par bya ba dang / rigs mthun pa nyid kyis de bzhin du dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pas ma nges pa nyid kyi skabs med do //
translated: because eye consciousness and so on are also to be proven, and because they are similar in type, they are to be refuted in the same way. Therefore, since there is no dissimilar class, there is no opportunity for the reason to be unestablished.

original: yang na smra bar 'dod pa sa la sogs pa dag rgyu ma yin pas gzugs ma grub pa'i phyir de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
analyzed: yang na smra bar 'dod pa sa la sogs pa dag rgyu ma yin pas gzugs ma grub pa'i phyir de dag gi 'bras bu yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
translated: Or, since earth and so on, which are asserted to be the cause, are not established because form does not exist, the meaning of the reason, “because its effect exists,” is not established.

original: don 'gal ba nyid yin no zhes ji skad bstan pa'i tshul dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: don 'gal ba nyid yin no zhes ji skad bstan pa'i tshul dang 'dra'o //
translated: Or, the meaning of the reason is contradictory, just as was previously explained.

original: bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /🔽'bras bu ni rgyu dang 'dra ba yang yin la /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba dag na re / 'bras bu ni rgyu dang 'dra ba yang yin la /
translated: Vaibhasikas say:

original: mi 'dra ba yang yin te /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba yang yin te /
translated: An effect is similar to its cause and dissimilar to its cause.

original: byed pa'i rgyus 'dus byas kyi byed pa'i rgyu ni thams cad yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir dpe med do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: byed pa'i rgyus 'dus byas kyi byed pa'i rgyu ni thams cad yin par khas blangs pa'i phyir dpe med do zhes zer ro //
translated: There is no example of a cause that is the cause of a conditioned state that is accepted as being all.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good,

original: rigs mthun pa bskyed pa'i rgyu thun mong ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi sgrub par byed pa nyid 'gog par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa bskyed pa'i rgyu thun mong ma yin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi sgrub par byed pa nyid 'gog par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is asserted that the cause that generates a state of similar type is the specific cause that is the uncommon cause and so on.

original: de ltar na gzhung gi tshogs des 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bkag pas gzugs kyi phung po mi srid par bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na gzhung gi tshogs des 'byung ba'i gzugs dang / rgyur byas pa'i gzugs bkag pas gzugs kyi phung po mi srid par bstan to //
translated: Thus, since the collection of texts refutes primary matter and derivative matter, it teaches that the form aggregate is impossible.

original: da ni gzugs bkag pa bzhin du tsho rab la sogs pa dag dgag pa yang rim pa mtshungs par bstan par bya ste /🔽tshor dang 'du shes 'du byed dang // sems dang dngos po thams cad kyang //
analyzed: da ni gzugs bkag pa bzhin du tsho rab la sogs pa dag dgag pa yang rim pa mtshungs par bstan par bya ste / tshor dang 'du shes 'du byed dang // sems dang dngos po thams cad kyang //
translated: Now, just as form is refuted, so the aggregates of feeling and so on are refuted in a similar manner.🔽Feeling, discernment, formation,🔽and consciousness, and all things,

original: rnam pa dag ni thams cad du //
analyzed: rnam pa dag ni thams cad du //
translated: in every way,

original: gzugs nyid kyis ni rim pa mtshungs //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyis ni rim pa mtshungs //
translated: are just like form.

original: gzugs dgag pa bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa dag dgag pa yang rim pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gzugs dgag pa bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa dag dgag pa yang rim pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The refutation of feeling and so on is similar to the refutation of form.

original: ji ltar don dam par gzugs rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /🔽rang gi rgyu ma @88a * //
analyzed: ji ltar don dam par gzugs rdzas su yod pa ma yin te / rang gi rgyu ma @88a * //
translated: Just as form does not substantially exist ultimately,

original: bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
translated: because if its cause is not apprehended, the cognition of it does not exist,

original: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bstan pa de bzhin du don dam par /
analyzed: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no zhes bstan pa de bzhin du don dam par /
translated: like an army and so on.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag kyang rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag kyang rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness also do not substantially exist,

original: rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
translated: because if their causes are not apprehended, their cognition does not exist.

original: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no zhes rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o //🔽tshor ba la sogs pa dag gi rgyu ni /
analyzed: dper na dmag la sogs pa bzhin no zhes rgyas par khong du chud par bya'o // tshor ba la sogs pa dag gi rgyu ni /
translated: For example, it is like an army and so on.

original: reg pa dang / mig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / nam mkha' dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa dag yin par ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: reg pa dang / mig dang / gzugs dang / snang ba dang / nam mkha' dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa dag yin par ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The causes of feeling and so on are contact, the eye, form, light, space, mental attention, and so on, as is appropriate.

original: ji ltar don dam par gzugs ni rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar don dam par gzugs ni rang gi tshogs pa'i yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Just as ultimately form is not different from its own component parts,

original: de ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ma bzung na de'i blo med pa'i phyir /
translated: because if it is not apprehended, its cognition does not exist.

original: dper na sa la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bya bas don dam par gzugs rang gi rgyu dag las gzhan ma yin par bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang don dam par tshor ba la sogs pa dag rang gi rgyu dag las gzhan ma
analyzed: dper na sa la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bya bas don dam par gzugs rang gi rgyu dag las gzhan ma yin par bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang don dam par tshor ba la sogs pa dag rang gi rgyu dag las gzhan ma
translated: For example, it is like the intrinsic reality of earth and so on.

original: yin par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yin par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Just as that passage teaches that ultimately form is not different from its causes, so too here it should be said that ultimately feeling and so on are not different from their causes.

original: 'dir sun 'byin pa dang / sun 'byin pa'i lan dag kyang snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir sun 'byin pa dang / sun 'byin pa'i lan dag kyang snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Here the refutation and the response to that are similar to the previous.

original: dngos po thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni phung po las gzhan pa 'dus byas kyi chos med mod kyi /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyang zhes bya ba ni phung po las gzhan pa 'dus byas kyi chos med mod kyi /
translated: All things means that although there are no conditioned phenomena other than the aggregates,

original: de dag gi bye brag dag dgag pa brjod par bzhed pas nye bar bzhag ste /
analyzed: de dag gi bye brag dag dgag pa brjod par bzhed pas nye bar bzhag ste /
translated: they are presented in order to describe their specific attributes.

original: yongs su brtag pa'i bum pa dang / snam bu la sogs pa dag rdzas su yod pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid dgag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su brtag pa'i bum pa dang / snam bu la sogs pa dag rdzas su yod pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid dgag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is necessary to refute the substantial existence and difference of imputed vases, cloth, and so on.

original: 'dir yang snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba'i tshig dag ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba'i tshig dag ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here too, the statements of the syllogism should be applied as appropriate to the previous.

original: de ltar phung po rnams ma grub pa'i phyir phung pos bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / dpe med do //
analyzed: de ltar phung po rnams ma grub pa'i phyir phung pos bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / dpe med do //
translated: Thus, because the aggregates are not established, the meaning of the reason “because they are included in the aggregates” is not established, and there is no example.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung pos bsdus pa dag don dam par yod do zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung pos bsdus pa dag don dam par yod do zhes bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not exist that “those included in the aggregates of form and so on ultimately exist.”

original: yang na gtan tshigs kyi don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin te /
analyzed: yang na gtan tshigs kyi don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin te /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of the reason is contradictory because

original: phung pos bsdus pa ni tha snyad kho nar yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phung pos bsdus pa ni tha snyad kho nar yod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: that which is included in the aggregates exists only conventionally.

original: de ltar rigs pa des na ;
analyzed: de ltar rigs pa des na ;
translated: Thus, by that reasoning,

original: stong pa nyid kyis brtsad byas tshe //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis brtsad byas tshe //
translated: when one is questioned about emptiness,

original: gang zhig lan 'debs smra byed pa //
analyzed: gang zhig lan 'debs smra byed pa //
translated: whatever answer one gives

original: de yi thams can lan btab min //
analyzed: de yi thams can lan btab min //
translated: is not an answer at all.

original: bsgrub par ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub par ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
translated: It is just like the thesis.

original: de kho na brtag pa'i mtshan nyid la dngos po 'ga' zhig gi don dam pa ba'i ngo bo nyid brtag pa brtsam pa na stong pa nyid kyis don dam par skye mched @88b rnams skye ba med pa dang / rdzas su yod pa ma yin par tshad ma yongs su bzung ste /
analyzed: de kho na brtag pa'i mtshan nyid la dngos po 'ga' zhig gi don dam pa ba'i ngo bo nyid brtag pa brtsam pa na stong pa nyid kyis don dam par skye mched @88b rnams skye ba med pa dang / rdzas su yod pa ma yin par tshad ma yongs su bzung ste /
translated: When one begins the investigation of the ultimate reality of some entity, one should take as one’s evidence the fact that the sense bases are ultimately unarisen and substantially nonexistent due to emptiness.

original: brtsad cing 'gyed pa byas pa'i tshe //
analyzed: brtsad cing 'gyed pa byas pa'i tshe //
translated: When one debates and disputes,

original: gang zhig rtog ge phyi ma nye bar bzhag pas lan 'debs shing smra bar byed pa de'i de dag thams cad ni lan btab pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig rtog ge phyi ma nye bar bzhag pas lan 'debs shing smra bar byed pa de'i de dag thams cad ni lan btab pa ma yin te /
translated: whatever one answers and says in response to the later sophistry is not an answer at all,

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is equivalent to the probandum.

original: de ston pa'i gtan tshigs dang / dpe de dag bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ston pa'i gtan tshigs dang / dpe de dag bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: The reason and example that demonstrate that are not established as equivalent to the probandum.🔽The later sophistry is not established.

original: rtog ge phyi ma mi 'grub bo zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: rtog ge phyi ma mi 'grub bo zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: stong pa nyid kyis bshad byas te //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis bshad byas te //
translated: it is explained by emptiness.

original: gang zhig skyon 'dogs smra byed pa //
analyzed: gang zhig skyon 'dogs smra byed pa //
translated: Whatever one says in response to the sophist

original: de yi thams cad skyon brtags min //
analyzed: de yi thams cad skyon brtags min //
translated: All of those are not faults,

original: bsgrub par bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur //
translated: because they are equivalent to the probandum.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa na stong pa nyid kyis sbyor ba rnam par dbye ba byas te /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa na stong pa nyid kyis sbyor ba rnam par dbye ba byas te /
translated: When the aggregates, elements, and sense bases are taught to be essenceless, the application of emptiness is distinguished.

original: rnam par bshad pa'i tshe gang zhig tshad ma log pas blo gros bslad pa nyid kyis phung po la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa'i tshe gang zhig tshad ma log pas blo gros bslad pa nyid kyis phung po la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: When they are explained, someone whose mind is confused by the cessation of valid knowledge may accuse them, saying, “The aggregates and so on do exist,

original: bden pa la sogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas skyon 'dogs shing smra bar byed pa de'i de dag thams cad kyang skyon brtags shing sun 'byin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bden pa la sogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas skyon 'dogs shing smra bar byed pa de'i de dag thams cad kyang skyon brtags shing sun 'byin pa ma yin te /
translated: because they are included in the truths and so on.” All of those are not faults, not refutations,

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: because they are equivalent to the probandum. This is the remainder of the sentence.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: sun dbyung ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sun dbyung ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir //
translated: Because they are similar to the refutation.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ma grub pa nyid dang spyir mtshungs te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ma grub pa nyid dang spyir mtshungs te /
translated: The point to be established is not established, and is similar to the general.🔽As it is said:

original: dngos po gcig la gang lta ba //
analyzed: dngos po gcig la gang lta ba //
translated: The view of one thing

original: de ni kun la'ang lta bar 'dod //
analyzed: de ni kun la'ang lta bar 'dod //
translated: Is asserted to be the view of all.

original: gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa //
analyzed: gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa //
translated: The emptiness of one thing

original: de nyid kun gyi stong pa nyid //🔽ces gang gsungs so //
analyzed: de nyid kun gyi stong pa nyid // ces gang gsungs so //
translated: Is the emptiness of all.

original: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni skye mched rnams yod par ston pa nye bar bzhag pa'i sgrub pa'i skyon brjod pas /
analyzed: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni skye mched rnams yod par ston pa nye bar bzhag pa'i sgrub pa'i skyon brjod pas /
translated: Here, the meaning of the chapter is as follows: By stating the faults of the proof that the existence of the sense-spheres is presented,

original: phung po rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: phung po rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: The absence of intrinsic reality of the aggregates is taught.

original: de'i phyir rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa phung po lnga po dag gi mngon par 'grub par gtogs pa ston pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa phung po lnga po dag gi mngon par 'grub par gtogs pa ston pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, the teaching of the manifestation of the five aggregates

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no //
translated: Is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ni gzugs so //
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ni gzugs so //
translated: Subhūti, form is form because it is devoid of intrinsic reality.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Likewise, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness that are devoid of an intrinsic nature are consciousness.

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag gi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni @89a * //
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag gi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni @89a * //
translated: The absence of an intrinsic nature of form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa ni gzugs so //
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa ni gzugs so //
translated: Subhūti, the absence of an intrinsic nature of form is form.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the absence of an intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is consciousness.

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag gi ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag gi ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: The absence of an intrinsic nature of form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is the perfection of wisdom.

original: ngas ni 'jig rten phung po bstan //
analyzed: ngas ni 'jig rten phung po bstan //
translated: I have taught the world to be a heap.

original: de la 'jig rten gnas bar gyur //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gnas bar gyur //
translated: The world remains in that.

original: mkhas pa de la mi gnas pa //
analyzed: mkhas pa de la mi gnas pa //
translated: The wise do not remain in that.

original: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos so //
translated: They are not sullied by worldly phenomena.

original: 'jig rten nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: 'jig rten nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: The world has the characteristic of space.

original: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
translated: Space also has no characteristic.

original: de phyir de yi de brtags pas //
analyzed: de phyir de yi de brtags pas //
translated: Therefore, because of that examination,

original: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos so //
translated: they are not sullied by worldly phenomena.

original: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas /
translated: And similarly, the Bodhisattvabhumi says,🔽“The bodhisattva should not give gifts while attending to forms, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental objects.”

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas te sbyin pa sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas te sbyin pa sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: srid pa gsum ni brtags pa tsam //
analyzed: srid pa gsum ni brtags pa tsam //
translated: The three worlds are mere imputations.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med //
translated: They are not inherently entities.

original: brtags pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du //
analyzed: brtags pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du //
translated: The nature of entities is imputed

original: ngan rtog rnams ni rtog par byed //
analyzed: ngan rtog rnams ni rtog par byed //
translated: By the inferior conceptual thought.

original: blo yis rnam par brtag byas na //
analyzed: blo yis rnam par brtag byas na //
translated: When it is examined by the mind,

original: ngo bo nyid ni gzung du med //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni gzung du med //
translated: The nature is not apprehended.

original: de phyir de dag brjod med dang // ngo bo nyid ni med par bstan //
analyzed: de phyir de dag brjod med dang // ngo bo nyid ni med par bstan //
translated: Therefore, they are taught to be inexpressible And to have no intrinsic reality.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no //🔽slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /🔽dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las phung po brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no // slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las phung po brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, it is established that the statements such as, “Therefore, they are inexpressible and are taught to be essenceless” are correct.

original: rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o /
translated: The master Bhāviveka’s Lamp of Wisdom, a commentary on Nāgārjuna’s Root Verses on the Middle Way, the fourth chapter, called the “Examination of the Aggregates.”

original: // / da ni stong pa nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas khams rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa lnga pa brtsam mo //
analyzed: // / da ni stong pa nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas khams rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa lnga pa brtsam mo //
translated: Now, in order to teach that the constituents are essenceless by refuting the specific counter positions to emptiness, the fifth chapter is begun.

original: rab tu byed pa bstan ma thag tu //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa bstan ma thag tu //
translated: The immediately preceding chapter has been explained.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from what is called form,

original: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
translated: The cause of form is not seen.

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir re zhig rang gi sde ba dag na re /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir re zhig rang gi sde ba dag na re /
translated: Therefore, some of our own schools say,

original: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po khams drug po 'di dag ni skyes bu'o zhes gsungs pas khams drug po //
analyzed: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po khams drug po 'di dag ni skyes bu'o zhes gsungs pas khams drug po //
translated: The Bhagavat has said, “Great King, the six elements are the person.”

original: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dag gi mtshan nyid sla ba dang / gsher ba dang / tsha ba dang g-yo ba dang / skabs 'byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa @89b dag bstan to //
analyzed: sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dag gi mtshan nyid sla ba dang / gsher ba dang / tsha ba dang g-yo ba dang / skabs 'byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa @89b dag bstan to //
translated: The six elements are the characteristics of earth, water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness, which are taught to be solidity, liquidity, heat, motion, providing an opening, and cognizing.

original: nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa lta bu med pa dag ni skyes bu'i rgyu nyid du ma bstan pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa lta bu med pa dag ni skyes bu'i rgyu nyid du ma bstan pas de'i phyir /
translated: Since non-existent things such as sky-flowers are not taught to be the cause of a person,

original: slob dpon gyis sa la sogs pa dag la yang gzugs kyi rgyu med do zhes dam bca' ba byas pa de ni khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis sa la sogs pa dag la yang gzugs kyi rgyu med do zhes dam bca' ba byas pa de ni khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: the master’s thesis that “form does not exist in earth and so on” is undermined by his own assertion.

original: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas tha snyad du khams drug po dag skyes bu'o zhes bstan par khas blangs pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas tha snyad du khams drug po dag skyes bu'o zhes bstan par khas blangs pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you accept that the Tathāgata taught conventionally that the six elements are the person, there is no fault.

original: don dam par bstan par khas blangs pa'i phyir nyes pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par bstan par khas blangs pa'i phyir nyes pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that there is no fault in the assertion that the elements are taught as ultimate.

original: gal te de ma grub pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ma grub pa'i phyir rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not logical because that is not established,

original: ma grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not the case that it is not established.

original: don dam par sa la sogs pa khams rnams yod pa kho na yin te de dag gi mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par sa la sogs pa khams rnams yod pa kho na yin te de dag gi mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The elements such as earth definitely exist ultimately because their characteristics exist.

original: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis gang don dam par med do zhes gsungs pa de la ni mtshan nyid med de /
analyzed: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis gang don dam par med do zhes gsungs pa de la ni mtshan nyid med de /
translated: The Bhagavān said that that which does not exist ultimately has no characteristics,

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: like a sky flower.

original: sa la sogs pa dag la ni sra ba nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag yod pas de ltar de dag gi mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir sa la sogs pa khams rnams yod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa dag la ni sra ba nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag yod pas de ltar de dag gi mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir sa la sogs pa khams rnams yod pa kho na yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Earth and so on have characteristics such as solidity. Therefore, since their characteristics exist in that way, the elements such as earth definitely exist.

original: de la 'dir nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis bstan sla ba'i phyir dang / de yod pa ma yin par bstan pas khams lhag ma rnams dgag pa yang sla ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la 'dir nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis bstan sla ba'i phyir dang / de yod pa ma yin par bstan pas khams lhag ma rnams dgag pa yang sla ba'i phyir /
translated: Here, because the nature of space is easily taught by means of emptiness, and because the remaining elements are easily refuted by teaching that space does not exist,

original: slob dpon gyis nam mkha'i khams kho na'i dbang du mdzad de bshad pa /🔽nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis nam mkha'i khams kho na'i dbang du mdzad de bshad pa / nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
translated: the master explains the element of space alone.🔽Space does not exist in the least

original: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: prior to the characteristics of space.

original: dbyer med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: He means that it is not divisible.

original: 'di la bye brag tu smra ba dag nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa kho nar ston pas mi sgrib pa nyid nam mkha' yin la /
analyzed: 'di la bye brag tu smra ba dag nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa kho nar ston pas mi sgrib pa nyid nam mkha' yin la /
translated: Vaibhasikas say that since space is taught to be nonobstructive alone, nonobstruction is space.

original: de yang yod pa nyid du sgrub pas mi sgrib pa yod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: de yang yod pa nyid du sgrub pas mi sgrib pa yod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa mi 'grub ste /
translated: Since it is established as existent, nonobstruction is not established by the existence of space.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: For example, sound is impermanent because it is impermanent.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de bzhin du 'dir yang nam mkha' yod de /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de bzhin du 'dir yang nam mkha' yod de /
translated: In the same way, here space exists because it is nonobstruction.

original: nam mkha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar smras par 'gyur ro //🔽yang na gang dag dbu ma'i bstan bcos kyi tshul la sdang ba dag 'di skad ces gang dag gi phyir /
analyzed: nam mkha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar smras par 'gyur ro // yang na gang dag dbu ma'i bstan bcos kyi tshul la sdang ba dag 'di skad ces gang dag gi phyir /
translated: because it is space.🔽Or else, those who are hostile to the system of the Madhyamaka might say that the basis characterized and the characteristic are not accepted as being different,

original: rim ma ma cig car de mi 'thad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag gzhan nyid yin par khas mi len te /
analyzed: rim ma ma cig car de mi 'thad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag gzhan nyid yin par khas mi len te /
translated: because it is not tenable that they are sequential or simultaneous.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams las skyes bu chen po gzhan yin par mi rigs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams las skyes bu chen po gzhan yin par mi rigs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is not logical that a great man is different from the marks of a great man.

original: 'di la de mtshon par bya ba yin pas mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: 'di la de mtshon par bya ba yin pas mtshan nyid de /
translated: Here, that is characterized by this, so it is a characteristic.

original: las la bya ba'i rkyen brjod pa'i phyir ro @90a * //
analyzed: las la bya ba'i rkyen brjod pa'i phyir ro @90a * //
translated: Because the condition of action is expressed in terms of the object.

original: zhes smra'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zhes smra'o zhes zer ro //
translated: This is what they say.

original: de dag gi de ltar khas blangs pa nyid la yang /
analyzed: de dag gi de ltar khas blangs pa nyid la yang /
translated: But even if they accept it in this way,

original: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
translated: prior to the characteristic of space,

original: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: space does not exist in the least.

original: nam mkha' nyid mtshan nyid yin na de nyid kyis de bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar sbyor bar byed pa ni gtan tshigs su mi rung ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' nyid mtshan nyid yin na de nyid kyis de bsgrub pa'i phyir nye bar sbyor bar byed pa ni gtan tshigs su mi rung ste /
translated: If space itself is the definition, then it is not suitable to apply it as a reason to establish that very space,

original: don ma grub pa'i phyir des na gang gis ci zhig sgrub par 'gyur /
analyzed: don ma grub pa'i phyir des na gang gis ci zhig sgrub par 'gyur /
translated: because the meaning is not established. Therefore, what is established by what?

original: ci ste yang tha snyad du yod pa'i nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa nyid yin par grags so zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang tha snyad du yod pa'i nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa nyid yin par grags so zhe na /
translated: But if you say that conventionally existent space is known as nonobstructiveness,

original: de bstan pa'i phyir gtan tshigs mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de bstan pa'i phyir gtan tshigs mi 'dod do //
translated: then we do not assert that as a reason to teach that.

original: don dam par ni ma grags pas de ltar bstan pa la rab tu 'bad par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: don dam par ni ma grags pas de ltar bstan pa la rab tu 'bad par bya'o zhe na /
translated: But if you say that ultimately it is not known, then you should strive to teach that.

original: de la yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon dang dpe'i skyon yod de /
analyzed: de la yang gtan tshigs kyi skyon dang dpe'i skyon yod de /
translated: But in that case, there is the fault of the reason and the fault of the example.

original: dam bcas pa tsam la gnas par zad do //
analyzed: dam bcas pa tsam la gnas par zad do //
translated: It is just a claim.

original: yang na bye brag tu smra ba dang / bye brag pa dag nam mkha' ni rdzas su yod pa dang / 'dus ma byas so zhes zer bas de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: yang na bye brag tu smra ba dang / bye brag pa dag nam mkha' ni rdzas su yod pa dang / 'dus ma byas so zhes zer bas de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Or if the Vaibhāṣikas and the Vaiśeṣikas say that space is substantially existent and unconditioned, then for their sake it is said:

original: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
translated: Prior to the definition of space,

original: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: Space does not exist in the least.

original: rdzas su gyur pa'o zhes dam bca' ba nye bar bzhag pa yin no //🔽de skye ba med par phyogs gnyi ga la grags pa ni chos yin no //
analyzed: rdzas su gyur pa'o zhes dam bca' ba nye bar bzhag pa yin no // de skye ba med par phyogs gnyi ga la grags pa ni chos yin no //
translated: The proposition is that it is a substance.🔽The subject is accepted by both parties to the debate.

original: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
analyzed: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
translated: The example is given by the power of that.

original: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dag yin no //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dag yin no //
translated: It is like the horn of a rabbit and so on.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni /
translated: Here is the inference:

original: don dam par nam mkha' rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par nam mkha' rdzas su yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Space does not exist as a substance ultimately,

original: skye ba med pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
translated: because it is not produced, like the horn of a rabbit.

original: de bzhin du rgyu med pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu med pa'i phyir dang / 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the reasons “because it has no cause,” “because it has no effect,” and “because it does not exist” should be stated.

original: gang dag nam mkha' ni sgra'i mtshan nyid do zhes zer ba de dag la yang /
analyzed: gang dag nam mkha' ni sgra'i mtshan nyid do zhes zer ba de dag la yang /
translated: Those who say that space is characterized by sound should be addressed as follows:

original: sgra nyid nam mkha' yin pas gtan tshigs kyi skyon snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra nyid nam mkha' yin pas gtan tshigs kyi skyon snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Since sound itself is space, the fault in the reason is the same as before.

original: 'dir kha cig na re gal te don 'di bstan bcos byed pa'i bsam pa yin par gyur na de lta na bstan bcos byed pas nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las gzhan du gyur pa'i nam mkha' cung zad yod pa ma yin zhes smras pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes
