analyzed: 'dir kha cig na re gal te don 'di bstan bcos byed pa'i bsam pa yin par gyur na de lta na bstan bcos byed pas nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las gzhan du gyur pa'i nam mkha' cung zad yod pa ma yin zhes smras pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes
translated: Here, some say: If this meaning were the intention of the treatise, then the treatise would only say, “Space does not exist in the least as other than the characteristics of space.”

original: zer ro // snga phyi mi srid par bstan pa kho nas gzhan nyid dgag pa 'grub pa'i phyir de ni mi gnod do //
analyzed: zer ro // snga phyi mi srid par bstan pa kho nas gzhan nyid dgag pa 'grub pa'i phyir de ni mi gnod do //
translated: Since the refutation of otherness is established by the mere demonstration that earlier and later are not possible, this is not a problem.

original: bye brag pa dag gi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag gzhan nyid du dam bca' bas de dag gi gzhan nyid yin na lan 'ga' snga phyir yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: bye brag pa dag gi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag gzhan nyid du dam bca' bas de dag gi gzhan nyid yin na lan 'ga' snga phyir yang 'gyur te /
translated: The Vaise~ika thesis that the basis of characteristics and the characteristics themselves are other is refuted because if they were other, they would be sequential.

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir dper na @90b bum pa dang / snam bu dag bzhin pas de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir dper na @90b bum pa dang / snam bu dag bzhin pas de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Since they are other, they would be like a pot and a cloth.

original: gal te mtshan las snga gyur na //
analyzed: gal te mtshan las snga gyur na //
translated: If it were prior to the characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: it would follow it is without characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: That which is without characteristics does not have characteristics.

original: de smra bar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nyid du ma gyur par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de smra bar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nyid du ma gyur par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the basis of the characteristic of that which is asserted to be space.

original: gal te mtshan las snga gyur na //
analyzed: gal te mtshan las snga gyur na //
translated: If it existed prior to the characteristic,

original: zhes bya ba 'dis de'i chos dus tha dad pa nyid bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis de'i chos dus tha dad pa nyid bstan to //
translated: this shows that the time of that phenomenon is different.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni nam mkha' ni smra bar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni nam mkha' ni smra bar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi ma yin te /
translated: Here is the inference: Space is not the basis of the characteristic of that which is asserted to be space,

original: de bas dus snga na yod pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de bas dus snga na yod pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
translated: because it exists prior to that, like anything else.🔽Or,

original: yang na / mtshan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na / mtshan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: it follows that it would be without a characteristic.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid la med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid la med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste /
translated: That which does not have a characteristic is without a characteristic.

original: de la mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nyid med par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nyid med par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it would not be the basis of the characteristic.

original: gal te mtshan las snga gyur na //
analyzed: gal te mtshan las snga gyur na //
translated: If it existed prior to the characteristic,

original: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
translated: this is the context of the term “space.”

original: 'dis ni de'i chos mtshan nyid kyi gzhi las mtshan nyid gzhan pa nyid bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni de'i chos mtshan nyid kyi gzhi las mtshan nyid gzhan pa nyid bstan to //
translated: This shows that the characteristic of that phenomenon is different from the basis of the characteristic.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni smra bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nam mkha' mtshon mi nus te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni smra bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nam mkha' mtshon mi nus te /
translated: Here, an inference cannot indicate the characterized basis, space, by the characteristic of the speaker,

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir dper na de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is different, like something else.

original: pha rol po'i ni rang gi rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
analyzed: pha rol po'i ni rang gi rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
translated: The opponent’s inference is undermined.

original: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag la mtshan nyid med pa nyid du mi 'dod pas ;
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag la mtshan nyid med pa nyid du mi 'dod pas ;
translated: Since we do not assert that the characterized basis and the characteristic are without characteristics,

original: gzhan nyid du rnam par rtog pa yang spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nyid du rnam par rtog pa yang spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: the conception of their difference should be rejected.

original: ci ste yang dbyug pas ma bzlog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci ste yang dbyug pas ma bzlog pa'i phyir /
translated: But if you say that because it is not refuted by a stick,

original: kun rdzob pa'i gtan tshigs brjod na /
analyzed: kun rdzob pa'i gtan tshigs brjod na /
translated: you state a conventional reason,

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid ma yin yang don 'gal ba nyid bzlog dka' bas /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid ma yin yang don 'gal ba nyid bzlog dka' bas /
translated: then although the meaning of the reason is not unestablished, it is difficult to refute the contradiction in the meaning.

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid don gzhan dang / don gzhan ma yin par gyur pa ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid don gzhan dang / don gzhan ma yin par gyur pa ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is not established that the characteristic is a different object or not a different object from the characterized basis,

original: nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhe na /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhe na /
translated: it is said that space is without characteristics.

original: de mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po nyid yin par yang shes par mi nus te /
analyzed: de mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po nyid yin par yang shes par mi nus te /
translated: But it cannot be known that it is a thing that lacks a characteristic.🔽Thus:

original: 'di ltar / mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po ni //
translated: A thing that lacks a characteristic

original: 'ga' yang gang na'ang yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'ga' yang gang na'ang yod ma yin //
translated: Does not exist anywhere at all.

original: don dam pa pa'i dngos po gzhan gyi phyogs dang / bdag cag gi phyogs gang na yang 'grub pa med do //🔽gang dag mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nam mkha' ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: don dam pa pa'i dngos po gzhan gyi phyogs dang / bdag cag gi phyogs gang na yang 'grub pa med do // gang dag mtshan nyid kyi gzhi nam mkha' ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: A thing that is ultimately real does not exist in the position of the other, nor does it exist in our own position.🔽Those who say that the basis of the characteristic, space, does exist

original: de la mtshan nyid 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
translated: because the characteristic is present there

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin par nges par bzung ste /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin par nges par bzung ste /
translated: should be told that this is definitely not logical.🔽Thus:

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos med na //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos med na //
translated: A non-thing that lacks a characteristic

original: mtshan nyid gang du 'jug par 'gyur //🔽gzhi @91a * //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gang du 'jug par 'gyur // gzhi @91a * //
translated: Where would a characteristic be present?

original: med pa'i phyir gzhi ji bzhin du gtan tshigs mi 'grub ste yul med pa la gtan tshigs 'jug pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir gzhi ji bzhin du gtan tshigs mi 'grub ste yul med pa la gtan tshigs 'jug pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because there is no basis, the reason is not established, just as the basis is. Because the reason is not established in the absence of an object, the fault of the non-establishment of the reason is incurred.

original: yang na gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyogs la ni /
analyzed: yang na gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyogs la ni /
translated: Or, in the case of the position that they are not different,

original: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin na de nyid kyis de mtshon par byar mi rung ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin na de nyid kyis de mtshon par byar mi rung ste /
translated: if the basis of those characteristics and the characteristics themselves are not different, then it is not tenable that they are characterized by that,

original: de las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir /
translated: because they do not have a characteristic that is different from them.

original: nam mkha' la mtshan nyid kyi gzhi med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' la mtshan nyid kyi gzhi med do //
translated: Space does not have a basis of those characteristics.

original: gzhi gzhan nyid kyi phyogs la yang smra bar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhi gzhan nyid kyi phyogs la yang smra bar 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: In the case of the position that they are different, the characteristics that are asserted to be characteristics of the basis of those characteristics are not the characteristics of the basis of those characteristics,

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir de las gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir de las gzhan bzhin no //
translated: because they are different, like something that is different from them.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they do not have characteristics.

original: des kyang nam mkha' la mtshan nyid med de /
analyzed: des kyang nam mkha' la mtshan nyid med de /
translated: Space does not have characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po nam mkha' zhes bya ba med na mtshan nyid gang du 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po nam mkha' zhes bya ba med na mtshan nyid gang du 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: If a non-entity called space that does not have characteristics does not exist, then what would characteristics engage?

original: de 'jug pa mi grub pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de 'jug pa mi grub pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is impossible for them to engage. This is the meaning of the above passage.

original: gzhan yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de'i don ni 'di la mtshan nyid 'di mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i chos yod pa nyid la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba des mtshan nyid kyi gzhi shes par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: gzhan yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de'i don ni 'di la mtshan nyid 'di mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i chos yod pa nyid la sogs pa med na mi 'byung ba des mtshan nyid kyi gzhi shes par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of the reason called “the engagement of the basis of those characteristics” is as follows: If the basis of those characteristics does not exist, the characteristics of the phenomenon that is the basis of those characteristics, such as existence, would not occur.

original: gang gi tshe kho bo cag gi phyogs la /🔽mtshan nyid med la mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: gang gi tshe kho bo cag gi phyogs la / mtshan nyid med la mtshan nyid ni //
translated: But when, in our system,

original: mi 'jug mtshan nyid bcas la min //
analyzed: mi 'jug mtshan nyid bcas la min //
translated: The characteristic does not apply to that which lacks a characteristic,🔽Nor does it apply to that which possesses a characteristic.

original: de'i tshe med pa la ni mtshan nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir dang mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe med pa la ni mtshan nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir dang mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: At that time, since a characteristic is not established in the nonexistent, nor is an existent thing that possesses a characteristic established.

original: ji skad bstan pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, since a basis of those characteristics that has a different aspect and different characteristics is not established,🔽The characteristic does not apply

original: mtshan bcas mtshan nyid med pa las //🔽gzhan la'ang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan bcas mtshan nyid med pa las //🔽gzhan la'ang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: To that which possesses characteristics or that which lacks characteristics.

original: de'i phyir de ltar don dam par dngos po 'gal ba la mtshan nyid 'jug par ma grub pa'i phyir dang / dpe med pa'i phyir khyod kyi 'dod pa'i don ma grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar don dam par dngos po 'gal ba la mtshan nyid 'jug par ma grub pa'i phyir dang / dpe med pa'i phyir khyod kyi 'dod pa'i don ma grub bo //
translated: Therefore, since in this way it is not established that a characteristic is instantiated in a contradictory object ultimately, and since there is no example, the object you assert is not established.

original: yang na mtshan nyid med pa nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa dag la mtshan nyid de med pa'i phyir mi 'jug pa de ni grags pa yin no ;
analyzed: yang na mtshan nyid med pa nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa dag la mtshan nyid de med pa'i phyir mi 'jug pa de ni grags pa yin no ;
translated: Or, it is well known that a characteristic does not occur in that which lacks a characteristic, such as a sky flower, because that characteristic does not exist.

original: / da ni mtshan nyid bcas la min //
analyzed: / da ni mtshan nyid bcas la min //
translated: Now, it is not in that which possesses a characteristic.

original: zhes bya ba mtshan nyid dang bcas pa la mtshan nyid mi 'jug go zhes bya ba'i skabs de ni dam bca' ba nye bar bzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba mtshan nyid dang bcas pa la mtshan nyid mi 'jug go zhes bya ba'i skabs de ni dam bca' ba nye bar bzhag pa yin no //
translated: The context of “it is not in that which possesses a characteristic” is the thesis that a characteristic does not occur in that which possesses a characteristic.

original: de'i chos ni mtshan nyid gang gis mtshon na mtshan nyid dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i chos ni mtshan nyid gang gis mtshon na mtshan nyid dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The property of that is the characteristic by which it is characterized, and that is called “that which possesses a characteristic.”

original: dpe ni de'i dbang gis /
analyzed: dpe ni de'i dbang gis /
translated: The example is by the power of that.

original: de @91b las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid dag yin no //
analyzed: de @91b las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid dag yin no //
translated: The other characteristics are from that.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mi sgrib pa ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mi sgrib pa ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: Here, the inference is: ultimately, nonobstruction is not the definition of space,🔽

original: mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dper na sra ba la sogs pa dag bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dper na sra ba la sogs pa dag bzhin no //
translated: Here, an inference is as follows: Nonobstruction is not the characteristic of space, because it is a characteristic, like solidity, etc.

original: rnam pa gnyis su smra ba dag rnam grangs las mtshan nyid dang bcas pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa la mtshan nyid 'jug pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su smra ba dag rnam grangs las mtshan nyid dang bcas pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa la mtshan nyid 'jug pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: The proponents of the two kinds of emptiness say that there is no error, because the characteristic is engaged in that which has a characteristic and that which does not have a characteristic, respectively.

original: de dgag pa'i phyir yang bshad pa /🔽mtshan bcas mtshan nyid med pa las //
analyzed: de dgag pa'i phyir yang bshad pa / mtshan bcas mtshan nyid med pa las //
translated: To refute that, it is said:🔽The characteristic is not engaged

original: gzhan la'ang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan la'ang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In that which has a characteristic or that which does not have a characteristic.

original: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po mi srid pa'i phyir dang / ltos pa'i nges pa yang me dang bud shing rtag pa'i rab tu byed pa las 'og nas 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i skyon nyis 'gyur du 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi dngos po mi srid pa'i phyir dang / ltos pa'i nges pa yang me dang bud shing rtag pa'i rab tu byed pa las 'og nas 'gog par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i skyon nyis 'gyur du 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Because a thing that is the nature of both is impossible, because the necessity of dependence will be refuted later in the chapter on fire and fuel, and because the error that is taught in both cases occurs in double measure.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not correct.

original: gzhan dag ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni /
translated: Others say:

original: mtshan nyid med la mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med la mtshan nyid ni //
translated: But the characteristic does not occur🔽In that which lacks a characteristic.

original: mi 'jug ces bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: mi 'jug ces bya ba 'di la /
translated: But the characteristic does not occur in that which lacks a characteristic.

original: de ltar gang gi phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po med na gzhi med pa la mtshan nyid 'jug par mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ltar gang gi phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i dngos po med na gzhi med pa la mtshan nyid 'jug par mi 'thad do //
translated: Since there is no existent thing that lacks a characteristic, therefore, if there is no existent thing that lacks a characteristic, it is not tenable that a characteristic occurs without a basis.

original: mtshan nyid bcas la min zhes bya ba 'di la yang mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po la yang mtshan nyid 'jug pa mi 'thad de /
analyzed: mtshan nyid bcas la min zhes bya ba 'di la yang mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po la yang mtshan nyid 'jug pa mi 'thad de /
translated: But the characteristic does not occur in that which possesses a characteristic.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: Because there is no need for that.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not logical,

original: mtshan nyid yod na de dang ldan pa la med pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid yod na de dang ldan pa la med pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if a characteristic exists, it is not tenable that it does not occur in that which possesses it, and similarly, because the basis of the characteristic exists.

original: mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po grub pa la yang pha rol po dran par bya ba'i phyir mtshan nyid kyi gzhi la mtshan nyid du 'jug pa 'gal ba med pa'i phyir des mi nus so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'i dngos po grub pa la yang pha rol po dran par bya ba'i phyir mtshan nyid kyi gzhi la mtshan nyid du 'jug pa 'gal ba med pa'i phyir des mi nus so //
translated: Also, with regard to the establishment of a thing that has a characteristic, it is not possible for the characteristic to engage in the basis of the characteristic, because it is not contradictory for the opponent to remember it.

original: de'i phyir de ltar mtshan nyid kyi gzhi la mtshan nyid kyis 'jug pa mi 'thad pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar mtshan nyid kyi gzhi la mtshan nyid kyis 'jug pa mi 'thad pas /
translated: Therefore, since in this way the engagement of the characteristic in the basis of the characteristic is untenable,

original: mtshan nyid 'jug pa ma yin na //
analyzed: mtshan nyid 'jug pa ma yin na //
translated: The characteristic does not engage.

original: mtshan gzhi 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan gzhi 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The basis of the characteristic is not tenable.

original: zhes bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis mjug bsdus so //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis mjug bsdus so //
translated: This is the summary of the meaning of the explanation.

original: 'dir mkhas su re ba'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can kha cig rang gi phyogs kyi skyon brjod pa pa rnags par mi bzod pa na 'di skad ces nam mkha' yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir mkhas su re ba'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can kha cig rang gi phyogs kyi skyon brjod pa pa rnags par mi bzod pa na 'di skad ces nam mkha' yod pa yin te /
translated: Here, some who are conceited with the pride of being learned, unable to bear the statement of the faults of their own position, say, “Space exists,

original: mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir ro zhes smra ba na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir ro zhes smra ba na /
translated: because its characteristic exists.”

original: khyed kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang mtshan nyid dag snga phyir sgro btags nas gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid du brjod pa ni dper na sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: khyed kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang mtshan nyid dag snga phyir sgro btags nas gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid du brjod pa ni dper na sgra ni mi rtag ste /
translated: You say that the meaning of the reason is not established because you superimpose the basis of those characteristics and the characteristics as sequential. For example, it is like this: Sound is impermanent.

original: byas pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa la /🔽gal te sgra skyes @92a * //
analyzed: byas pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa la / gal te sgra skyes @92a * //
translated: Because it is produced.

original: pa'i snga rol na /
analyzed: pa'i snga rol na /
translated: If that which is produced existed prior to sound,

original: byas pa nyid yod na ni sgra la 'khrul pa yod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs su rung ngo //
analyzed: byas pa nyid yod na ni sgra la 'khrul pa yod pa'i phyir gtan tshigs su rung ngo //
translated: then because sound would be mistaken, it would be suitable as a reason.

original: 'on te sgra skyes pa'i sngon rol na byas pa nyid med de /
analyzed: 'on te sgra skyes pa'i sngon rol na byas pa nyid med de /
translated: But if that which is produced does not exist prior to sound,

original: phyis yod na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do zhes zer ba de'i tshig de rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phyis yod na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do zhes zer ba de'i tshig de rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: then if it exists later, the meaning of the reason is not established.🔽Your statement is not logical because it is said to be a semblance of nonestablishment.

original: ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de bzhin du khyed kyis /
analyzed: ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid du brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de bzhin du khyed kyis /
translated: In the same way, you say,

original: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
translated: Prior to the characteristic of space,

original: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: Space does not exist in the least.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs ji skad smras pa sun 'byin par 'dod pas mtshan nyid yod pa 'gog par byed pa'i tshig de yang legs par smras pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtan tshigs ji skad smras pa sun 'byin par 'dod pas mtshan nyid yod pa 'gog par byed pa'i tshig de yang legs par smras pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Thus, since you wish to refute the reason stated above, you also do not state well the words that refute the existence of characteristics.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: mtshan nyid kyang de nyid dang / gzhan la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i khongs su gtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyang de nyid dang / gzhan la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i khongs su gtogs pa yin la /
translated: Characteristics are included among the bases of characteristics, which are distinguished as the same or different, and so on.

original: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i skye mched de dag gi don dam pa ba'i yod pa nyid ni don dam par brtsal pas de'i phyir mtshan nyid kyi gzhi mi 'thad na mtshan nyid kyang mi srid pas de dgag pa'i phyir ni 'bad pa mi rtsom mo //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i skye mched de dag gi don dam pa ba'i yod pa nyid ni don dam par brtsal pas de'i phyir mtshan nyid kyi gzhi mi 'thad na mtshan nyid kyang mi srid pas de dgag pa'i phyir ni 'bad pa mi rtsom mo //
translated: Since the bases of characteristics are not ultimately existent, they are not ultimately established. Therefore, since the bases of characteristics are not tenable, characteristics are also impossible. Thus, we do not strive to refute them.

original: 'di skad ces mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag snga phyir sgro btags nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la yang nyon cig dang / snga phyi mi srid par bstan pa kho nas gzhan nyid dgag pa bstan pa'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di skad ces mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag snga phyir sgro btags nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la yang nyon cig dang / snga phyi mi srid par bstan pa kho nas gzhan nyid dgag pa bstan pa'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: You should listen to what I say here: The basis of characteristics and the characteristics are imputed as earlier and later, and so on.🔽 I have already taught that because it is taught that earlier and later are impossible, otherness is refuted.

original: ci ste gang la gzhan nyid yin yang med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa de ni gtan tshigs yin pas des na gzhan yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid du brjod pa yang ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid yin no
analyzed: ci ste gang la gzhan nyid yin yang med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'brel pa de ni gtan tshigs yin pas des na gzhan yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid du brjod pa yang ma grub pa ltar snang ba nyid yin no
translated: But if you say, Even if it is other, the relationship of the reason and the predicate is that of invariable concomitance, and that is the reason. Therefore, because it is other, the meaning of the reason is not established, and the reason is not established,

original: zhe na / de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: zhe na / de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: that is not good.

original: don dam par gzhan nyid dang / me med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ma grub pas de la mngon par zhen pa yang spang bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par gzhan nyid dang / me med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ma grub pas de la mngon par zhen pa yang spang bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because ultimately otherness and the relationship characterized by the invariable concomitance of the absence of fire are not established, I wish to abandon clinging to them.

original: sgrub pa de tha snyad kyi bden par gtogs pa'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub pa de tha snyad kyi bden par gtogs pa'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: That practice is conventional because it is taught as a thing belonging to conventional truth.

original: tha snyad dang rjes su mthun pa ni yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad dang rjes su mthun pa ni yin no //
translated: It is in accordance with convention.

original: zhar la bshad pas chog go //
analyzed: zhar la bshad pas chog go //
translated: This is enough of an explanation of the side issues.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here someone might say,

original: don dam par nam mkha' yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: don dam par nam mkha' yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: “Space definitely exists ultimately,

original: mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has a characteristic.

original: 'di na gang yang med pa de ni mtshan nyid yin par mi 'dod de /
analyzed: 'di na gang yang med pa de ni mtshan nyid yin par mi 'dod de /
translated: Whatever does not exist at all is not asserted to be a characteristic,

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: like a sky flower.

original: nam mkha' ni mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: But space is a characteristic.

original: rgyal po chen po khams drug po 'di dag ni skyes bu'o zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir de ni yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po khams drug po 'di dag ni skyes bu'o zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir de ni yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: The Buddha said, ‘Great King, these six elements are a person.’ Therefore it definitely exists.”

original: @92b bshad pa /🔽mtshan nyid kyi gzhi mi 'thad do zhes bstan zin pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: @92b bshad pa / mtshan nyid kyi gzhi mi 'thad do zhes bstan zin pas de'i phyir /
translated: Nāgārjuna responds:🔽Since it has been shown that a basis of a characteristic is untenable,

original: mtshan gzhi 'thad pa ma yin na //
analyzed: mtshan gzhi 'thad pa ma yin na //
translated: therefore a basis of a characteristic is not tenable.

original: mtshan nyid kyang ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyang ni yod ma yin //
translated: A characteristic also does not exist.

original: mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir de bzhin du mi 'grub pa'i phyir dang / dpe yang med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so ;
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir de bzhin du mi 'grub pa'i phyir dang / dpe yang med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so ;
translated: and the definition is not established in the same way because it is included in the class of the object defined, and there is no example.

original: / gang gi phyir de ltar shes rab kyis nye bar brtags na mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag mi 'thad pa de'i phyir bstan bcos mdzad pas /
analyzed: / gang gi phyir de ltar shes rab kyis nye bar brtags na mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dag mi 'thad pa de'i phyir bstan bcos mdzad pas /
translated: Since the object defined and the definition are untenable when examined with wisdom in this way, the treatise master concludes:

original: de phyir mtshan gzhi yod min te //
analyzed: de phyir mtshan gzhi yod min te //
translated: Therefore the object defined does not exist

original: mtshan nyid yod pa nyid ma yin //🔽zhes mjug bsdu ba mdzad de /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yod pa nyid ma yin // zhes mjug bsdu ba mdzad de /
translated: and the definition does not exist.

original: de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir dang / de med par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir dang / de med par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: He thinks that since there is no inference that teaches that, and since there is an inference that teaches its nonexistence.

original: bye brag tu smra bdag gis smras pa /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra bdag gis smras pa /
translated: The Vaibhāṣikas say:

original: nam mkha' ni dngos po yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni dngos po yin te /
translated: Space is a thing

original: yul de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags spong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yul de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags spong ba'i phyir /
translated: because it is the object of the abandonment of attachment that is aspiration for that object.

original: dper na gzugs bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzugs bzhin no //
translated: It is like form.

original: yang na snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dper na ;
analyzed: yang na snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dper na ;
translated: Or, because it is the object of meditative attainment, like

original: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: consciousness and so on.

original: yang na 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir dper na mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yang na 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir dper na mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin no //
translated: Or, because it is unconditioned, like nirvana.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: 'di la don dam par nam mkha' de dngos po nyid du 'dod na /🔽mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'am /
analyzed: 'di la don dam par nam mkha' de dngos po nyid du 'dod na / mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'am /
translated: If you assert that space is a thing in reality,🔽is it the basis of the characteristics

original: mtshan nyid yin grang na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yin grang na /
translated: or is it the characteristics?

original: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid de dag ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar ni sngar bstan zin pas /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid de dag ji ltar mi srid pa de ltar ni sngar bstan zin pas /
translated: Since it has already been demonstrated how it is impossible for the basis of the characteristics and the characteristics to exist,

original: des na gang gi phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la /🔽mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa'i //
analyzed: des na gang gi phyir kho bo cag gi phyogs la / mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa'i //
translated: therefore, since in our system🔽Things do not exist

original: dngos po yang ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: dngos po yang ni yod ma yin //
translated: Except as the basis of characteristics and characteristics.

original: de'i phyir dpe ma bstan par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe ma bstan par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa med do //
translated: Therefore, since the example is not established, the probandum is not established.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba dag kyang dngos po nyid du grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba dag kyang dngos po nyid du grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because neither nirvana nor anything else is established as a thing.

original: 'dis ni sde pa gzhan dag gi bsgrub pa nam mkha' yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni sde pa gzhan dag gi bsgrub pa nam mkha' yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: This refutes the assertions of other schools that space exists as a real entity.🔽

original: gzugs yongs su chad pa'i phyir dang / 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dag la yang skyon gyis lan btab pa yin te /
analyzed: gzugs yongs su chad pa'i phyir dang / 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dag la yang skyon gyis lan btab pa yin te /
translated: This also refutes the proofs of other schools, such as “Space definitely exists because it is the absence of form and it is unconditioned.”

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the reason is not established.

original: mdo sde pa dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: mdo sde pa dag gis smras pa /
translated: The Sautrantikas say:

original: nam mkha' dngos po nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' dngos po nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Space is not a thing.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: kho bo cag la de ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po med pa tsam yin no //🔽snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / yul de la 'dun pa'i 'dod @93a * //
analyzed: kho bo cag la de ni thogs pa dang bcas pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po med pa tsam yin no // snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / yul de la 'dun pa'i 'dod @93a * //
translated: It is the mere absence of obstructive contact in the state of nonobstructive material form.

original: chags spong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba des dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sel bar byed pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: chags spong ba'i phyir zhes bya ba des dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sel bar byed pa yin mod kyi /
translated: The Sautrantikas say: The statement “because it is the object of meditative equipoise” and the statement “because it is the object of the desire that abandons attachment to that object” refute the nonexistence of space.

original: 'on kyang de dag nam mkha' la rtog par byed pa de dag dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag nam mkha' la rtog par byed pa de dag dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: However, in order to refute those who imagine space, the master Nagarjuna said:

original: dgag pa ches gsal ba brjod par bzhed pa de nyid bshad pa /🔽gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: dgag pa ches gsal ba brjod par bzhed pa de nyid bshad pa / gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
translated: The explanation of the very clear refutation that is intended is as follows:🔽Form is not observed

original: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: apart from the cause of form.

original: zhes bya bas de bstan zin pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya bas de bstan zin pas de'i phyir /
translated: Since that has already been explained, therefore:

original: dngos po yod pa ma yin na //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa ma yin na //
translated: If an entity does not exist,

original: dngos med gang gi yin par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos med gang gi yin par 'gyur //
translated: whose nonentity would it be?

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na khyed kyis nam mkha' zhes bya bar brtags pa gang yin pa'i dngos po med pa de gang gi yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na khyed kyis nam mkha' zhes bya bar brtags pa gang yin pa'i dngos po med pa de gang gi yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If the entity called “form that impedes” does not exist, then whose nonentity would that be, which you imagine to be called “space”?

original: de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin pas don de rab tu mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin pas don de rab tu mi 'grub bo //
translated: Since there is no inference that teaches that, that meaning is not established.

original: yang na gzhan du brtag ste /
analyzed: yang na gzhan du brtag ste /
translated: Or else, imagine it in another way:

original: pha rol pos smras pa /
analyzed: pha rol pos smras pa /
translated: The opponent says:

original: nam mkha' dngos po yin te zhes bya ba'i don de bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: nam mkha' dngos po yin te zhes bya ba'i don de bstan par mi nus te /
translated: The meaning of “space is an entity” cannot be taught.🔽You said:

original: khyod kyis / mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa'i //
analyzed: khyod kyis / mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa'i //
translated: Apart from the characterized and the characteristic,

original: dngos po yang ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: dngos po yang ni yod ma yin //
translated: An entity does not exist.

original: zhes bya bas dpe med pa dang dpe bsgrubs su zin kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa mi 'grub pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya bas dpe med pa dang dpe bsgrubs su zin kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa mi 'grub pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa de'i phyir /
translated: Thus, although the example is not established and the proof is not established, still the probandum and the proof are not established.

original: kho bos de nyid bsgrub par bya ste /
analyzed: kho bos de nyid bsgrub par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, we will establish this point.

original: gzugs la sogs pa la dngos po yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa la dngos po yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Form and so on do exist as things,

original: ltos pas de dag med pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pas de dag med pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because their nonexistence is dependent on their existence.

original: 'di na gang yod pa de la ni ltos pas dngos po med pa yod de /
analyzed: 'di na gang yod pa de la ni ltos pas dngos po med pa yod de /
translated: Here, the nonexistence of things exists in dependence on the existence of things.

original: dper na gzugs la ro nyid med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzugs la ro nyid med pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the absence of taste exists in dependence on form.

original: gang med pa de la ni ltos pas dngos po med pa med de /
analyzed: gang med pa de la ni ltos pas dngos po med pa med de /
translated: The nonexistence of things does not exist in dependence on the nonexistence of things.

original: dper na rta'i rva bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rta'i rva bzhin no //
translated: For example, a rabbit’s horns do not exist.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the reason is not unestablished.

original: 'di ltar khyod kyis lan cig ma yin par phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag phung po la sogs pa nyid kyis med pa nyid du brjod pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyod kyis lan cig ma yin par phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag phung po la sogs pa nyid kyis med pa nyid du brjod pas /
translated: Because you have said many times that the aggregates, elements, and sense bases do not exist as aggregates and so on.

original: de'i phyir ltos pas de dag med pa yod pa'i phyir dngos po yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ltos pas de dag med pa yod pa'i phyir dngos po yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of dependence, since nonexistence exists, things surely exist.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: kho bos gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa nyid dgag pa byas par zad kyi /
analyzed: kho bos gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa nyid dgag pa byas par zad kyi /
translated: We have refuted the existence of things such as form.

original: de dag med par ma bstan pas //
analyzed: de dag med par ma bstan pas //
translated: But we have not taught that they are nonexistent.

original: de'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na gang ro nyid med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yod pa ma yin na gang ro nyid med par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, if the thing called form does not exist, then what is nonexistent?

original: de med pa'i phyir dpe ma grub pas 'dod pa'i don grub pa med do //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir dpe ma grub pas 'dod pa'i don grub pa med do //
translated: Since that does not exist, the example is not established. Therefore, the intended meaning is not established.

original: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
translated: Others say:

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Things and nonthings surely exist.

original: de dag shes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag shes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because their cognition exists.

original: 'di na gang la shes @93b pa yod pa de ni yod de /
analyzed: 'di na gang la shes @93b pa yod pa de ni yod de /
translated: Here, whatever exists has a cognition.

original: dper na chos nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na chos nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like reality.

original: 'dir bshad pa /🔽pha rol po'i yid la bsam pas brtags pa'i dngos po dang / dngos po med par shes pa de yang dngos po'am /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / pha rol po'i yid la bsam pas brtags pa'i dngos po dang / dngos po med par shes pa de yang dngos po'am /
translated: Here we say:

original: dngos po med pa zhig yin grang na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhig yin grang na /
translated: The cognition of things and nonthings imagined by the mind of the opponent is either a thing or a nonthing.

original: de gnyi ga dgag pa yang bstan zin pas de dag shes pa yod par mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de gnyi ga dgag pa yang bstan zin pas de dag shes pa yod par mi 'grub bo //
translated: Since both of these have already been refuted, consciousness is not established as existent.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang mi mthun pa'i shes pa gzhan zhig yod par rtog na /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang mi mthun pa'i shes pa gzhan zhig yod par rtog na /
translated: If you imagine that there is another consciousness that is not in accord with things and nonthings,

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: that also is not tenable.

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /🔽dngos dang dngos med mi mthun chos //
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa / dngos dang dngos med mi mthun chos //
translated: Therefore it is said:🔽The consciousness that is in accord with things and nonthings

original: gang gis dngos dang dngos med shes //
analyzed: gang gis dngos dang dngos med shes //
translated: Does not exist.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement “It does not exist” is that it does not exist.

original: gal te rnam grangs kyi tshul smra ba dag gis brtags pa'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / mi mthun pa de dag shes pa yod pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam grangs kyi tshul smra ba dag gis brtags pa'i dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / mi mthun pa de dag shes pa yod pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no error because the consciousness that is in accord with things and nonthings imagined by those who speak in terms of synonyms exists,

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not logical.

original: gcig la bdag nyid mi mthun pa gnyis mi srid pa'i phyir dang / ltos pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gcig la bdag nyid mi mthun pa gnyis mi srid pa'i phyir dang / ltos pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that it is not possible for a single thing to have two incompatible natures, it is not tenable that they are related, and there is no inference that demonstrates that.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dpyad na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dpyad na /
translated: Therefore,

original: nam mkha' 'thad pa mi bzod pa //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'thad pa mi bzod pa //
translated: space is not tenable when analyzed.

original: de phyir nam mkha' dngos po min //
analyzed: de phyir nam mkha' dngos po min //
translated: Therefore, space is not a thing.

original: dngos med ma yin mtshan gzhi min //
analyzed: dngos med ma yin mtshan gzhi min //
translated: It is not a non-thing, not a basis of characteristics,🔽and not a characteristic.

original: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes pha rol pos smras pa'i dngos po nyid la sogs pa ston pa'i sgrub pa sun 'byin pa bsal ba'i dbang gis mjug bsdus so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes pha rol pos smras pa'i dngos po nyid la sogs pa ston pa'i sgrub pa sun 'byin pa bsal ba'i dbang gis mjug bsdus so //
translated: The conclusion is stated by the power of refuting the argument that demonstrates the existence of space and so on, which the opponent claims are not tenable when analyzed.

original: khams lnga po //
analyzed: khams lnga po //
translated: The five elements

original: gzhan gang dag kyang nam mkha' mtshungs //
analyzed: gzhan gang dag kyang nam mkha' mtshungs //
translated: and whatever other things are like space.

original: khams zhes bya ba'i don ni 'byung khungs kyi don te /
analyzed: khams zhes bya ba'i don ni 'byung khungs kyi don te /
translated: The meaning of the term element is a source.

original: gser gyi 'byung khungs bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa dag kyang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba la sogs pa dag gi 'byung khungs su gyur pa dag yin no //
analyzed: gser gyi 'byung khungs bzhin du nam mkha' la sogs pa dag kyang sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba la sogs pa dag gi 'byung khungs su gyur pa dag yin no //
translated: Just as a source of gold is the source of suffering, mental dissatisfaction, and so on, space and so on are the sources of suffering, mental dissatisfaction, and so on.

original: yang na khams zhes bya ba'i don ni byed pa med par rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i don to //
analyzed: yang na khams zhes bya ba'i don ni byed pa med par rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i don to //
translated: Alternatively, the meaning of the term element is to hold one’s own characteristics without activity.

original: lnga po zhes bya ba ni sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dag go //
analyzed: lnga po zhes bya ba ni sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dag go //
translated: The five are called earth, water, fire, wind, and consciousness.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'og tu dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'og tu dgag par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The other is space, which is to be refuted as a sixth element.

original: gang dag kyang nam mkha' mtshungs zhes bya ba ni khams lnga po gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par dgag par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang dag kyang nam mkha' mtshungs zhes bya ba ni khams lnga po gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par dgag par bya ba ste /
translated: The other five elements are similar to space, which is to be refuted as a sixth element.

original: ji ltar sngar /
analyzed: ji ltar sngar /
translated: As it was said previously:

original: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid snga rol na //
translated: Prior to the characteristics of space,

original: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: nam mkha' cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: Space does not exist in the least.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: And beginning from:

original: de phyir nam mkha' dngos po min //
analyzed: de phyir nam mkha' dngos po min //
translated: Therefore space is not an entity,

original: @94a * // dngos med ma yin mtshan gzhi min //
analyzed: @94a * // dngos med ma yin mtshan gzhi min //
translated: It is not a nonentity, it is not the basis of characteristics,🔽It is not a characteristic.🔽This teaches the refutation of space.

original: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar gyis nam mkha' dgag pa bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar gyis nam mkha' dgag pa bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
translated: In the same way, here it is said:

original: sa sogs mtshan nyid snga rol na //
analyzed: sa sogs mtshan nyid snga rol na //
translated: Prior to the characteristics of earth,

original: sa sogs cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: sa sogs cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: Earth does not exist in the least.

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: And beginning from:

original: de phyir sa sogs dngos po min //
analyzed: de phyir sa sogs dngos po min //
translated: Therefore, earth and so on are not entities.

original: dngos med ma yin mtshan gzhi min //
analyzed: dngos med ma yin mtshan gzhi min //
translated: They are not non-entities, nor bases of characteristics,🔽up to and including not characteristics.

original: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher brjod par bya zhing sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga po gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag kyang nam mkha' dang dgag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir 'dra bar bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher brjod par bya zhing sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga po gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag kyang nam mkha' dang dgag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir 'dra bar bstan par bya'o //
translated: The other five elements, earth and so on, should be taught in the same way as space, because they are similar to space in being negated.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la khams de dag de ltar yod par bstan pa ni de dag bstan pas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la khams de dag de ltar yod par bstan pa ni de dag bstan pas /
translated: The existence of those elements in the scriptures of the Bhagavat is taught in order to guide those who are attached to the existence of elements.

original: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rjes su thugs brtse bas tha snyad du grags pa'i tha snyad kyi bden par gtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rjes su thugs brtse bas tha snyad du grags pa'i tha snyad kyi bden par gtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Out of compassion for those to be trained, he taught them as belonging to the conventional truth, which is known in the world.

original: don dam par ni khams rnams yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni khams rnams yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But ultimately, the elements do not exist.

original: khams rnams yod pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa yang med la /
analyzed: khams rnams yod pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa yang med la /
translated: There is no contradiction in accepting that the elements exist,

original: skye mched rnams 'grub par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye mched rnams 'grub par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the sense bases are also established.

original: yang na kha cig na re /
analyzed: yang na kha cig na re /
translated: Or, some say:

original: khyod kyis don dam par dngos po thams cad la skur ba btab pa'i phyir log pa'i lta ba dngos po thams cad la skur ba 'debs pa'i tshul can rjes su brjod pas /
analyzed: khyod kyis don dam par dngos po thams cad la skur ba btab pa'i phyir log pa'i lta ba dngos po thams cad la skur ba 'debs pa'i tshul can rjes su brjod pas /
translated: Because you ultimately deprecate all things, you are a nihilist who deprecates all things.🔽Because you propound a counterfeit of the scriptures of the Bhagavan, you are a proponent of Lokayata philosophy.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab ltar bcos pas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub par byas pa'i phyir 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ma yin pas spang bar bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab ltar bcos pas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub par byas pa'i phyir 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ma yin pas spang bar bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Therefore, because this is not the word of the Bhagavan, it should be rejected.

original: de la 'dir pha rol po dag ni skyon cha ma mnyam pas rab rib skyes pa dag / skra shad dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa dag sel bar byed pa dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: de la 'dir pha rol po dag ni skyon cha ma mnyam pas rab rib skyes pa dag / skra shad dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa dag sel bar byed pa dang 'dra ste /
translated: In this regard, the opponent is like a person with an eye disease who, because of the inequality of his eyes, removes nonexistent things such as hairs, flies, and so on.

original: 'di ltar kho bos ni skye mched rnams kyi yod pa nyid dgag pa smras pa na ngo bo nyid yod pa dgag pa byas par zad kyi dngos po med pa nyid du ni ma smras te /
analyzed: 'di ltar kho bos ni skye mched rnams kyi yod pa nyid dgag pa smras pa na ngo bo nyid yod pa dgag pa byas par zad kyi dngos po med pa nyid du ni ma smras te /
translated: Thus, when we say that the existence of the sense bases is refuted, we are only refuting inherent existence, we are not saying that things do not exist.

original: mdo sde las /
analyzed: mdo sde las /
translated: A sutra declares:

original: ji srid sems kyi spyod yul ba //
analyzed: ji srid sems kyi spyod yul ba //
translated: As long as the mind has an experiential object,

original: yod med gnyis kyi mthar yang 'gyur //
analyzed: yod med gnyis kyi mthar yang 'gyur //
translated: it will fall into the extremes of existence and nonexistence.

original: spyod yul 'gags par gyur na ni //
analyzed: spyod yul 'gags par gyur na ni //
translated: When the experiential object is blocked,

original: sems kyang yang dag 'gag par 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dngos por ma lhung ba ni dngos po med pas /
analyzed: sems kyang yang dag 'gag par 'gyur // zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dngos por ma lhung ba ni dngos po med pas /
translated: the mind is also truly blocked.

original: chos 'ga' yang dngos po med par mi byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos 'ga' yang dngos po med par mi byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: And similarly, not falling into the existence of things, one does not make any existent thing nonexistent.

original: de bzhin du slob dpon nyid kyis kyang gzhan dag tu /
analyzed: de bzhin du slob dpon nyid kyis kyang gzhan dag tu /
translated: And in the same way, the Acarya himself has said in other places:

original: 'di ni yod nyid 'gog pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni yod nyid 'gog pa ste //
translated: This is the refutation of existence;

original: med nyid yongs su @94b 'dzin pa min //🔽nag po min zhes smras pa na //🔽dkar po yin zhes ma brjod bzhin //
analyzed: med nyid yongs su @94b 'dzin pa min // nag po min zhes smras pa na // dkar po yin zhes ma brjod bzhin //
translated: it is not the affirmation of nonexistence.🔽When one says that something is not black,

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: one does not say that it is white.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa de gnyi ga yang lta ba ngan pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa de gnyi ga yang lta ba ngan pa kho na yin te /
translated: Therefore, both of these positions are simply bad views,

original: mkhas pa spros pa ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba 'dod pa'i bgegs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mkhas pa spros pa ma lus pa nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba 'dod pa'i bgegs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are obstacles to the bliss of the cessation of all conceptual elaboration by the wise.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'di la don dam par 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dag gal te tshul gang gis tha snyad gdags su rung ba des bdag nyid thob pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par gyur na de'i phyir dge ba dang /
analyzed: 'di la don dam par 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dag gal te tshul gang gis tha snyad gdags su rung ba des bdag nyid thob pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par gyur na de'i phyir dge ba dang /
translated: If the self were to exist in the way that it is imputed, then it would be pointless to strive to generate virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena because it would be impossible to generate or cease virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena.🔽If the self were to exist in the way that it is imputed, then it would be pointless to strive to generate virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena because it would be impossible to generate or cease virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena.🔽If the self were to exist in the way that it is imputed, then it would be pointless to strive to generate virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena because it would be impossible to generate or cease virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena.

original: mi dge ba'i chos rnams skyed pa dang mi skyed pa'i phyir 'bad pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur te /🔽yod pa'i phyir dper na bum pa dang / snam bu yod pa bzhin pas bde ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang bde ba'i khyad par nyams pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal gyi khyad par nyams pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos rnams skyed pa dang mi skyed pa'i phyir 'bad pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur te /🔽yod pa'i phyir dper na bum pa dang / snam bu yod pa bzhin pas bde ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang bde ba'i khyad par nyams pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal gyi khyad par nyams pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: If the self were to exist in the way that it is imputed, then it would be pointless to strive to generate virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena because it would be impossible to generate or cease virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena.

original: rtsig pa la bris pa'i ri mo bzhin du srog chags rnams kyi na tshod dang bong tshod dang / spyod lam gyi khyad par dag la skyed dbri med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsig pa la bris pa'i ri mo bzhin du srog chags rnams kyi na tshod dang bong tshod dang / spyod lam gyi khyad par dag la skyed dbri med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Beings would be like pictures on a wall, with no change in their age, size, or behavior.

original: ci ste khams gsum pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dag ngo bo nyid med pa yin par gyur na /
analyzed: ci ste khams gsum pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dag ngo bo nyid med pa yin par gyur na /
translated: If the three realms, the supramundane, virtue, nonvirtue, and the ethically neutral were essenceless,

original: de lta na yang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams skyed pa dang / mi skyed pa'i phyir 'bad pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams skyed pa dang / mi skyed pa'i phyir 'bad pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be pointless to strive for virtue and nonvirtue, because virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena would not arise.

original: med pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva rnon por bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa bzhin pas /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva rnon por bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa bzhin pas /
translated: Because they would be nonexistent, like striving to make the horn of an ass sharp.

original: tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha snyad chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, conventions would be annihilated.

original: de'i phyir 'di bshad de /🔽lta ba ngan pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di bshad de / lta ba ngan pa'i rab rib kyis blo gros kyi mig nyams pa /
translated: Therefore, this is explained.

original: blo chung gang dag dngos rnams la //
analyzed: blo chung gang dag dngos rnams la //
translated: Those whose eyes of intelligence are impaired by the cataracts of bad views,🔽those of little intelligence,🔽who think that things

original: yod pa nyid dang med nyid du //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang med nyid du //
translated: exist or do not exist,

original: lta ba des ni blta bya ba //
analyzed: lta ba des ni blta bya ba //
translated: That view does not see the peace

original: nye bar zhi ba zhi mi mthong //
analyzed: nye bar zhi ba zhi mi mthong //
translated: of the pacification of the object of the view.

original: blo chung ngu gang dag rab rib can dbang po nyams pas zla ba gnyis la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong ba bzhin du dngos po rnams la yod pa nyid dang / med pa nyid du lta ba de dag gis ni don dam pa'i bden pa shin tu che phra ba 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi spyan gyi spyod yul blta bar bya ba zhi zhing zhi ba mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: blo chung ngu gang dag rab rib can dbang po nyams pas zla ba gnyis la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong ba bzhin du dngos po rnams la yod pa nyid dang / med pa nyid du lta ba de dag gis ni don dam pa'i bden pa shin tu che phra ba 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi spyan gyi spyod yul blta bar bya ba zhi zhing zhi ba mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Those of little intelligence, like those with cataracts who see unreal things such as a double moon, see existence and nonexistence in things. They do not see the object of the view, the pacification of the pacification of the object of the view, which is the domain of the eye of the noble wisdom that is the ultimate truth, which is very subtle.

original: blta bar bya ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba ni 'di la blta bar bya ba mtshan ma thams cad mi snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blta bar bya ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba ni 'di la blta bar bya ba mtshan ma thams cad mi snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The pacification of the object of the view is because the signs of the object of the view do not appear.

original: zhi zhes bya ba ni gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba ni gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir te /
translated: Peace is because it is free from all harm.

original: mdo @95a * //
analyzed: mdo @95a * //
translated: As a sutra says:

original: sde las / gang gis gang la skye rnams kyi //
analyzed: sde las / gang gis gang la skye rnams kyi //
translated: Whatever is the cause of the arising of beings

original: yod par sgrub pa med nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: yod par sgrub pa med nyid 'gyur //
translated: is the nonexistence of existence.

original: lta ngan skye bar smra ba yis //
analyzed: lta ngan skye bar smra ba yis //
translated: The one who speaks of the arising of bad views

original: yod pa dang ni med par bstan //🔽zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: yod pa dang ni med par bstan // zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: teaches existence and non-existence.

original: mkhas pa gang stong pa nyid la lta ba dang / sgom pa'i mig sman dang ldan pas /
analyzed: mkhas pa gang stong pa nyid la lta ba dang / sgom pa'i mig sman dang ldan pas /
translated: The wise one who has the eye ointment of the view of emptiness and meditation

original: blo gros kyi mig gi skyon dang bral bar gyur pa blo gros kyi mig yang dag par bye ba des ni dngos po rnams kyi ji lta ba nyid mthong ste /
analyzed: blo gros kyi mig gi skyon dang bral bar gyur pa blo gros kyi mig yang dag par bye ba des ni dngos po rnams kyi ji lta ba nyid mthong ste /
translated: is free from the fault of the eye of intelligence. The eye of intelligence, which is purified, sees the reality of things.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi /
translated: The Bhagavān said:

original: gang tshe 'jig rten yod min zhing //
analyzed: gang tshe 'jig rten yod min zhing //
translated: When the world is not seen as existent,

original: med min yod min mi mthong ba //
analyzed: med min yod min mi mthong ba //
translated: as non-existent, or as neither,

original: de tshe sems ni rnam ldog cing //
analyzed: de tshe sems ni rnam ldog cing //
translated: then the mind turns away

original: bdag med nyid kyang rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag med nyid kyang rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: and one realizes selflessness.

original: zhes ji skad gsungs pa dang ; de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes ji skad gsungs pa dang ; de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly:

original: 'od srungs yod ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gcig go //
analyzed: 'od srungs yod ces bya ba 'di ni mtha' gcig go //
translated: Kāśyapa, “existence” is one extreme,

original: med ces bya ba 'di yang mtha' gcig go zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: med ces bya ba 'di yang mtha' gcig go zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: “non-existence” is the other extreme.

original: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni sa la sogs pa khams rnams yod par ston pa'i gtan tshigs nyid yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nye bar bzhag pa de'i skyon brjod pas khams rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni sa la sogs pa khams rnams yod par ston pa'i gtan tshigs nyid yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nye bar bzhag pa de'i skyon brjod pas khams rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: Here, the meaning of the chapter is that the faults of the position that the elements such as earth exist because the reason “they exist” is stated are shown. Thus, it teaches that the elements are essenceless.

original: de'i phyir nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the statement “The internal earth element and the external earth element are not two” means that they are not different.

original: de yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ye shes kyis gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa dang ; mtshan nyid gcig pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ye shes kyis gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa dang ; mtshan nyid gcig pa 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, the Tathāgata has realized with wisdom and exalted knowledge that they are not two, that they are not divided into two, and that they are of the same character, which is this:🔽he has fully and completely realized them to be characterless.”

original: mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du bu mo khams dag ji ltar blta bar bya /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du bu mo khams dag ji ltar blta bar bya /
translated: And, “Girl, how should the elements be viewed?”

original: bu mos smras pa /
analyzed: bu mos smras pa /
translated: The girl said,

original: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di lta ste /
translated: “Mañjuśrī, it is like this:

original: dper na 'jig rten gsum bskal pas bsregs pa na thal ba yang med pa ltar ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa gang yin pa de la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: dper na 'jig rten gsum bskal pas bsregs pa na thal ba yang med pa ltar ro zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa gang yin pa de la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bya ba dang /
translated: And similarly, “One should not form attachments to the formless, the imperceptible, the non-abiding, the non-appearing, and the non-cognizable.”

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: sha ra dva ti'i bu chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: sha ra dva ti'i bu chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra, all phenomena are characterized by non-attachment.

original: gang chos gang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de ni de'i mtshan nyid med pa yin pas /🔽chos 'ga' yang mtshan nyid mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang chos gang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de ni de'i mtshan nyid med pa yin pas / chos 'ga' yang mtshan nyid mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: Whatever is the characteristic of a phenomenon is its lack of characteristic.🔽No phenomenon abides in order to establish a characteristic.

original: nye bar mi gnas so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: nye bar mi gnas so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: des ni 'jig rten phung po bstan //
analyzed: des ni 'jig rten phung po bstan //
translated: “That is how the world is taught to be a mass;

original: de la 'jig rten gnas par gyur //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gnas par gyur //
translated: The world abides in that.

original: mkhas pa de la mi gnas pa //
analyzed: mkhas pa de la mi gnas pa //
translated: The wise do not abide in that;

original: 'jig rten chos @95b kyis mi gos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos @95b kyis mi gos so //
translated: They are unstained by worldly phenomena.”

original: 'jig rten nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: 'jig rten nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: The characteristic of the world is space.

original: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
translated: But space has no characteristic.

original: de phyir de yis de rtogs pas //
analyzed: de phyir de yis de rtogs pas //
translated: Therefore, since it is understood by that,

original: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos so //
translated: the world is not sullied by worldly dharmas.

original: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du sha ra dva ti'i bu chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / yongs su grub pa med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chags pa med pa nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no //🔽slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du sha ra dva ti'i bu chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / yongs su grub pa med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chags pa med pa nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no // slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
translated: And similarly, “Śāradvatīputra, the absence of the characteristic of all dharmas and their nonestablishment is called nonattachment.”

original: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
analyzed: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
translated: The master Bhāviveka’s Lamp of Wisdom, commentary on Nāgārjuna’s Root Verses on the Middle Way,

original: khams brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khams brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is called “Examination of the Elements.”

original: rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o /
translated: It is the fifth chapter.

original: // / da ni stong pa nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas 'dod chags dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sdang ba la sogs pa dag ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan par bzhed pa'i dbang gis rab tu byed pa drug pa brtsam mo //
analyzed: // / da ni stong pa nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas 'dod chags dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sdang ba la sogs pa dag ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan par bzhed pa'i dbang gis rab tu byed pa drug pa brtsam mo //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that desire, the desirous one, hatred, the hateful, etc. are essenceless, Candrakīrti begins the sixth chapter, which refutes the specific objections to emptiness.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here someone might say this:

original: don dam par phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: don dam par phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: In reality, the aggregates, elements, and faculties do exist,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyes dmigs bstan pa'i phyir ro //🔽'di na gang med pa de la ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de la brten nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la brten nas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyes dmigs bstan pa'i phyir ro // 'di na gang med pa de la ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de la brten nas /
translated: because the Lord Buddha has taught that on the basis of them there is affliction and there is also the danger of harm.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyes dmigs ma bstan te /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyes dmigs ma bstan te /
translated: For the Lord Buddha has not taught that on the basis of that which does not exist there is affliction and there is the danger of harm.

original: dper na rus sbal gyi spu dag bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rus sbal gyi spu dag bzhin no //
translated: This is just like the hairs of a tortoise.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po la sogs pa dag la brten nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po la sogs pa dag la brten nas /
translated: The Lord Buddha has taught that on the basis of the aggregates, etc.,

original: chags pas chos rnams mi shes shing //
analyzed: chags pas chos rnams mi shes shing //
translated: One does not understand phenomena through attachment.

original: chags pas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
analyzed: chags pas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
translated: One does not see phenomena due to attachment.

original: mi gang 'dod chags sten byed pa //
analyzed: mi gang 'dod chags sten byed pa //
translated: One who indulges in desire

original: de tshe mun pa mun nag 'gyur //🔽sdang bas chos rnams mi shes shing //
analyzed: de tshe mun pa mun nag 'gyur // sdang bas chos rnams mi shes shing //
translated: will be in the darkness of night.🔽One does not know phenomena due to hatred.

original: sdang bas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
analyzed: sdang bas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
translated: One does not see phenomena due to hatred.

original: mi gang zhe sdang sten byed pa //
analyzed: mi gang zhe sdang sten byed pa //
translated: One who indulges in anger

original: de tshe mun pa mun nag 'gyur //🔽rmongs pas chos rnams mi shes shing //
analyzed: de tshe mun pa mun nag 'gyur // rmongs pas chos rnams mi shes shing //
translated: will be in the darkness of night.🔽One does not know phenomena due to delusion.

original: rmongs pas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
analyzed: rmongs pas chos rnams mi mthong ste //
translated: One does not see phenomena due to delusion.

original: mi gang gti mug sten byed pa //
analyzed: mi gang gti mug sten byed pa //
translated: One who indulges in delusion

original: de tshe mun pa mun nag 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe mun pa mun nag 'gyur //
translated: will be in the darkness of night.

original: zhes kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyes dmigs bstan pas /
analyzed: zhes kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nyes dmigs bstan pas /
translated: Thus, since the afflictions and their faults are taught,

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pa'i 'thad pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pa'i 'thad pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag yod pa kho na yin no //
