analyzed: de ltar re zhig skye ba 'dus byas yin na 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du mi 'thad pa'i skyon bstan zin to //
translated: Thus, first, if arising is conditioned, the fault that it is not tenable as the characteristic of the conditioned has been demonstrated.

original: ji skad smos pa'i skyon yongs su spang bar @101b 'dod pas /
analyzed: ji skad smos pa'i skyon yongs su spang bar @101b 'dod pas /
translated: One who wishes to completely avoid the faults stated

original: ci ste skye ba 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste skye ba 'dus ma byas zhes bya bar 'dod na /
translated: should assert that arising is unconditioned.

original: ji ltar 'dus byas mtshan nyid yin //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dus byas mtshan nyid yin //
translated: How could it be a characteristic of the conditioned?

original: skye ba la 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid med de /
analyzed: skye ba la 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid med de /
translated: Arising does not have the characteristics of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas na rang nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas na rang nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because if it were unconditioned, it would not exist.

original: yang na 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid yin pas /
analyzed: yang na 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid yin pas /
translated: Or, since an unconditioned phenomenon is the reality of an unconditioned phenomenon,

original: don dam par skye ba 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par skye ba 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not suitable for ultimate arising to be the characteristic of an unconditioned phenomenon.

original: 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir dper na nam mkha' bzhin pas rang gi rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir dper na nam mkha' bzhin pas rang gi rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
translated: Because it is unconditioned, like space, it is undermined by our own inference.

original: skye ba ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar bzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: skye ba ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar bzung ba'i phyir /
translated: Since arising is taken as the model for the term characteristic,

original: gnas pa dang / 'jig pa gnyis kyang nye bar blangs pa yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa dang / 'jig pa gnyis kyang nye bar blangs pa yin te /
translated: endurance and destruction are also taken as models.

original: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du smra bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du smra bar 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are asserted to be the characteristics of conditioned phenomena.

original: de gnyis kyang de bzhin du dgag pa yin pas yang de gnyis dgag pa brjod mi dgos so //
analyzed: de gnyis kyang de bzhin du dgag pa yin pas yang de gnyis dgag pa brjod mi dgos so //
translated: Since those two are also refuted in the same way, it is unnecessary to refute them again.

original: yang gzhan yang 'di la skye ba la sogs pa 'di dag 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du brtag par bya na de dag so so 'am /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang 'di la skye ba la sogs pa 'di dag 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du brtag par bya na de dag so so 'am /
translated: Moreover, if you imagine that these arising, etc. are the characteristics of the conditioned, then they must be examined as to whether they are individually or collectively.

original: 'dus pa la brtag grang na /
analyzed: 'dus pa la brtag grang na /
translated: If you imagine that they are individually,🔽then the three, arising, etc.

original: de la re zhig / skye la sogs gsum so so yis //
analyzed: de la re zhig / skye la sogs gsum so so yis //
translated: are not individually capable of

original: 'dus byas mtshan nyid bya bar ni //🔽nus min / skye ba la sogs pa gsum po dag so so ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bya bar mi nus te /
analyzed: 'dus byas mtshan nyid bya bar ni // nus min / skye ba la sogs pa gsum po dag so so ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bya bar mi nus te /
translated: the activity of characteristic of the conditioned.

original: 'di ltar lkog shal la sogs pa mtshan nyid 'dus pa dag gis mtshan nyid kyi gzhi mtshon par nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar lkog shal la sogs pa mtshan nyid 'dus pa dag gis mtshan nyid kyi gzhi mtshon par nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The idea is that the basis characterized is indicated by the characteristics, such as the dewlap, etc.

original: skye ba la sogs pa dag rim gyis 'byung ba nyid du khas len na yang 'di ltar dngos po ma skyes pa la ni /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa dag rim gyis 'byung ba nyid du khas len na yang 'di ltar dngos po ma skyes pa la ni /
translated: Even if you accept that arising, etc. occur sequentially, still, since a nonarisen thing

original: skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag med pas 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bya ba'i mthu med do //
analyzed: skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dag med pas 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bya ba'i mthu med do //
translated: has no arising, enduring, or disintegrating, it has no power to perform the activity of the characteristic of the conditioned.

original: 'gags pa la yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gags pa la yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because a basis of the characteristics does not exist in cessation.

original: skye ba dang gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dag med pas 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bya ba'i mthu med do //
analyzed: skye ba dang gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dag med pas 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid bya ba'i mthu med do //
translated: Since arising, enduring, and ceasing do not exist, the characteristics of conditioned phenomena do not have the power to function.

original: skyes pa la ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes pa la ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which has arisen does not arise again.

original: gnas pa la ni 'gag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas pa la ni 'gag pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because cessation is not possible for that which endures.

original: gnas pa ni mi rtag pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gnas pa ni mi rtag pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because enduring is related to impermanence.

original: de ltar yang /🔽gnas med dngos po ga la yod //
analyzed: de ltar yang / gnas med dngos po ga la yod //
translated: As it is said:🔽How can there be a thing without enduring?

original: mi rtag pas na ga la gnas //
analyzed: mi rtag pas na ga la gnas //
translated: How can there be enduring because of impermanence?

original: gal te dang por gnas gyur na //
analyzed: gal te dang por gnas gyur na //
translated: If it endures at first,

original: tha mar rnyings par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha mar rnyings par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it will not age at the end.

original: gal te khor zug mi rtag yod //
analyzed: gal te khor zug mi rtag yod //
translated: If there is permanent impermanence,

original: khor zug gnas par mi 'gyur ro //🔽yang na rtag par gyur pa las //🔽phyis ni mi rtag par yang 'gyur //
analyzed: khor zug gnas par mi 'gyur ro // yang na rtag par gyur pa las // phyis ni mi rtag par yang 'gyur //
translated: there will not be permanent enduring.🔽If impermanence and a thing

original: gal te dngos po mi rtag dang // lhan cig gnas pa yod gyur na //
analyzed: gal te dngos po mi rtag dang // lhan cig gnas pa yod gyur na //
translated: endured together,

original: mi rtag log par 'gyur ba @102a * //
analyzed: mi rtag log par 'gyur ba @102a * //
translated: impermanence would be reversed.

original: 'am ; / yang na gnas pa brdzun par 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'am ; / yang na gnas pa brdzun par 'gyur // zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Or else, endurance would be false.

original: ji ste skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyid du 'dod na /🔽de lta na yang /
analyzed: ji ste skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyid du 'dod na / de lta na yang /
translated: If arising, etc., are the characteristics of the conditioned, then:

original: 'dus pa yin na yang /
analyzed: 'dus pa yin na yang /
translated: Even if they were to exist in the assemblage,

original: gcig la dus gcig ji ltar rung //
analyzed: gcig la dus gcig ji ltar rung //
translated: how could they be in one thing at one time?

original: de dag 'dus pa 'dus byas kyi dngos po gcig la dus gcig na med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de dag 'dus pa 'dus byas kyi dngos po gcig la dus gcig na med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: The meaning of the sentence is that they do not exist at one time in the one entity that is the assemblage of the three.

original: gal te de ji ltar nges par gzung bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ji ltar nges par gzung bar bya zhe na /
translated: If you ask how that is to be understood,

original: 'di ltar / skyes pa dang gnas pa dang / zhigs pa shin tu mi mthun pa nyid dag dngos po gang yang rung ba cig la dus gcig tu 'byung ba ni sems bde bar gnas pa dag gis brtag par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar / skyes pa dang gnas pa dang / zhigs pa shin tu mi mthun pa nyid dag dngos po gang yang rung ba cig la dus gcig tu 'byung ba ni sems bde bar gnas pa dag gis brtag par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because it is not reasonable for the mutually incompatible states of arising, enduring, and ceasing to occur at one time in any one thing, because those who are happy do not investigate.

original: mdo sde pa dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: mdo sde pa dag gis smras pa /
translated: The Sautrantikas say:

original: rgyu dang rkyen so sor nges pa'i mthu las byung ba'i rgyud la dus gcig kho nar dngos po skye bar 'dod pa ma byung ba las 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba yin la /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen so sor nges pa'i mthu las byung ba'i rgyud la dus gcig kho nar dngos po skye bar 'dod pa ma byung ba las 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni skye ba yin la /
translated: The assertion that things arise from the power of the specific determination of causes and conditions, and that they arise from nonarising in a continuum at one time, is arising.

original: skad cig ma snga ma snga ma'i rgyud kyis nges par gnas pa ni gnas pa yin /
analyzed: skad cig ma snga ma snga ma'i rgyud kyis nges par gnas pa ni gnas pa yin /
translated: The continuum of the prior instant definitely abiding through the continuum of the later instant is enduring.

original: skad cig ma snga ma dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba nyid ni rga ba yin /
analyzed: skad cig ma snga ma dang mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba nyid ni rga ba yin /
translated: The prior instant having a different characteristic from the later instant is aging.🔽The separation of that which has arisen is disintegration.

original: byung nas bral ba ni 'jig pa yin pas de ltar ltos pa nges pas skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: byung nas bral ba ni 'jig pa yin pas de ltar ltos pa nges pas skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Since such dependence is definite, arising and so on are the characteristics of the composite.

original: skad cig ma gcig la dus gcig na yod pas sgrub pa de kho bo cag la mi gnod do //
analyzed: skad cig ma gcig la dus gcig na yod pas sgrub pa de kho bo cag la mi gnod do //
translated: Since they exist at one time in one moment, that proof does not invalidate us.

original: de ltar yongs su rtog na yang rgyud rdzas su med pa'i phyir dang / ltos pas skye ba dang gnas pa la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gsum po dag tha snyad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su rtog na yang rgyud rdzas su med pa'i phyir dang / ltos pas skye ba dang gnas pa la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gsum po dag tha snyad pa yin gyi /
translated: Even though they are imagined in this way, since the continuum does not substantially exist and since arising, enduring, and so on are imagined through dependence, the three characteristics are conventional,

original: don dam pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa ma yin no //
translated: but they are not ultimate.

original: gnas pa'i dus na yang de dang mi mthun pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gnas pa'i dus na yang de dang mi mthun pa 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Also, when it endures, it does not disintegrate because it is incompatible with disintegration.

original: de yang skyon sngar bstan pa las /
analyzed: de yang skyon sngar bstan pa las /
translated: This is the fault that has been previously explained.

original: 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It does not pass beyond that.

original: bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba dag na re /
translated: Vaibhasikas say:

original: dngos po sngon ma byung ba las bdag nyid thob pa ni skye ba yin la /🔽skyes pa gnas pa ni gnas pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po sngon ma byung ba las bdag nyid thob pa ni skye ba yin la / skyes pa gnas pa ni gnas pa yin /
translated: The arising of a thing that did not previously exist is birth.🔽That which has arisen enduring is duration.

original: gnas pa rnyings pa nyid ni rga ba yin /
analyzed: gnas pa rnyings pa nyid ni rga ba yin /
translated: The aging of that which endures is aging.

original: rgas pa 'gags pa ni 'jig pa yin pas /
analyzed: rgas pa 'gags pa ni 'jig pa yin pas /
translated: The cessation of that which has aged is disintegration.

original: skye ba la sogs pa dag rim gyis 'byung ba nyid 'dus byas nyid la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa dag rim gyis 'byung ba nyid 'dus byas nyid la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Since arising and so on occur in sequence, it is not mistaken that conditioned states are characterized by arising and so on.

original: de dag mtshan nyid nyid 'grub pas /
analyzed: de dag mtshan nyid nyid 'grub pas /
translated: Therefore it is established that they are characteristics.

original: skye la sogs gsum so so yis //
analyzed: skye la sogs gsum so so yis //
translated: It is illogical to say that the three, arising and so on,

original: 'dus byas mtshan nyid bya bar ni //🔽nus min zhes smras pa ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas mtshan nyid bya bar ni // nus min zhes smras pa ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: are not individually able to act as characteristics of conditioned states.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is illogical because it is illogical to say that the three, arising and so on,

original: 'di ltar mtshan nyid cas bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gang yin pa la nam yang 'khrul par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan nyid cas bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gang yin pa la nam yang 'khrul par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, a characteristic is never mistaken with regard to the basis of the characteristic.

original: dper na sra ba nyid sa la @102b 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chan po'i mtshan dag skyes bu chen po la 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper na sra ba nyid sa la @102b 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chan po'i mtshan dag skyes bu chen po la 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For example, solidity is not mistaken with regard to earth, and the marks of a great person are not mistaken with regard to a great person.

original: don dam par skye ba la sogs pa dag ni dngos po rnams kyi 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin par mi rung ste /
analyzed: don dam par skye ba la sogs pa dag ni dngos po rnams kyi 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin par mi rung ste /
translated: Ultimately, arising, etc., are not suitable as the characteristics of conditioned phenomena of things because

original: rim gyis 'byung pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung pa'i phyir /
translated: they occur in sequence.

original: dper na 'jim pa dang / gong bu dang ; smad  pa dang / glegs pa dang / bcum pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par dag bum pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa bzhin no //🔽skye ba la sogs pa dag ni 'khrul pa med de /
analyzed: dper na 'jim pa dang / gong bu dang ; smad  pa dang / glegs pa dang / bcum pa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par dag bum pa'i 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa bzhin no // skye ba la sogs pa dag ni 'khrul pa med de /
translated: For example, the differences in the states of clay, lump, pot, handle, and contraction are not the characteristics of the conditioned phenomena of a pot.

original: 'dus ma byas la de dag med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas la de dag med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Arising, etc., are not mistaken because they do not exist in unconditioned phenomena.

original: nye bar brtags pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nye bar brtags pa yin gyi /
translated: This is a mere imputation.

original: don dam par yod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par yod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But they do not exist ultimately,

original: skye ba bkag pa'i phyir dang / ma skyes pa la gnas pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba bkag pa'i phyir dang / ma skyes pa la gnas pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because arising is refuted, and because it is impossible for the non-arisen to endure and to cease.

original: skye ba'i dus na yang gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i bdag nyid ni de dag gi bdag nyid ma yin pas /
analyzed: skye ba'i dus na yang gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i bdag nyid ni de dag gi bdag nyid ma yin pas /
translated: Even at the time of arising, that which has the nature of non-endurance and non-cessation is not their nature,

original: de dag dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not associated with them.

original: phyis 'byung ba'i tshul gyis de dag gi bdag nyid can nyid du rtog na yang tha snyad tsam du zad pas ji skad bstan pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
analyzed: phyis 'byung ba'i tshul gyis de dag gi bdag nyid can nyid du rtog na yang tha snyad tsam du zad pas ji skad bstan pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
translated: Even if you imagine that it has their nature in the manner of subsequent occurrence, since it is merely a convention, the previously mentioned faults are not averted.

original: de'i phyir de ltar skye ba la sogs pa dag so so dang 'dus pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi skyon de nyid ma log go //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar skye ba la sogs pa dag so so dang 'dus pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs kyi skyon de nyid ma log go //
translated: Therefore, since arising, etc. are not established as the characteristics of the conditioned, either individually or collectively, the fault of the reason is not averted.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover:

original: skye dang gnas dang 'jig rnams la //🔽'dus byas mtshan nyid gzhan zhig ni //
analyzed: skye dang gnas dang 'jig rnams la // 'dus byas mtshan nyid gzhan zhig ni //
translated: Arising, enduring, and ceasing🔽If the characteristics of the conditioned

original: gal te yod na thug pa med //
analyzed: gal te yod na thug pa med //
translated: Have another characteristic, there is an infinite regress.

original: de la yang gzhan zhig yod cing //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan zhig yod cing //
translated: and that has another,

original: de la yang gzhan zhig yod de /
analyzed: de la yang gzhan zhig yod de /
translated: and that has another,🔽and so on, ad infinitum.

original: thug pa med par 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod de /
analyzed: thug pa med par 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod de /
translated: But that is unacceptable.

original: skye ba la sogs pa dag / skye ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'dod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa dag / skye ba la sogs pa dang ldan par 'dod par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, arising and so on should not be asserted to possess arising and so on.

original: ci ste de ltar gyus cig ces zer na de la yang de nyid bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: ci ste de ltar gyus cig ces zer na de la yang de nyid bzlas par bya ste /
translated: If you say that this is so, then the same objection would apply to you.

original: med na de dag 'dus byas min //
analyzed: med na de dag 'dus byas min //
translated: If they do not exist, then they are not conditioned.

original: ci ste skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus byas nyid yin par yang 'dod la /
analyzed: ci ste skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus byas nyid yin par yang 'dod la /
translated: But if you assert that arising and so on are conditioned phenomena,

original: thug pa med pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: thug pa med pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: then the error of an infinite regress does not arise.

original: skye ba la sogs pa dag gis 'dus byas nyid du mtshon par byed pa ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa dag gis 'dus byas nyid du mtshon par byed pa ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: The characteristic of a conditioned phenomenon is that which indicates that something is a conditioned phenomenon through arising and so on.

original: dper na bkra shis pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan nyid bzhin du 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan med pas thug pa dang / gnas pa dang mu thug ste /
analyzed: dper na bkra shis pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan nyid bzhin du 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gzhan med pas thug pa dang / gnas pa dang mu thug ste /
translated: For example, just as the characteristics of good fortune and bad fortune are not the characteristics of conditioned phenomena, there is no other characteristic of conditioned phenomena, and so there is no infinite regress, no infinite regress of the basis, and no infinite regress of the ultimate reason.

original: med par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: med par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And they do not become nonexistent.

original: de ni sngar ji ltar don dam par skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas nyid ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin par mi 'dod de /
analyzed: de ni sngar ji ltar don dam par skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas nyid ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin par mi 'dod de /
translated: Just as it was previously explained that arising, etc. are not asserted to be the characteristics of conditioned phenomena because they are conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus byas yin pa'i @103a * //
analyzed: 'dus byas yin pa'i @103a * //
translated: like the basis of those characteristics,

original: phyir dper na mtshan nyid kyi gzhi bzhin no zhes bstan pa de bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra bas de'i phyir don dam par skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus byas yin par 'dod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyir dper na mtshan nyid kyi gzhi bzhin no zhes bstan pa de bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra bas de'i phyir don dam par skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus byas yin par 'dod par mi bya'o //
translated: so too arising, etc. are also like that. Therefore, ultimately, arising, etc. should not be asserted to be conditioned phenomena.

original: skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus byas yin na yang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyid du mi rung ste /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus byas yin na yang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid nyid du mi rung ste /
translated: Even if arising, etc. were conditioned phenomena, they would not be suitable to be the characteristics of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'di ltar de'i lan kyang 'dir med na de dag 'dus byas min zhes bya bas btab zin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar de'i lan kyang 'dir med na de dag 'dus byas min zhes bya bas btab zin to //
translated: Since the response to that is also not here, it has already been refuted by saying that they are not conditioned phenomena.

original: de'i phyir yang ji skad bstan pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang ji skad bstan pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
translated: Therefore, the previously explained faults cannot be averted.

original: 'dir gnas ma'i bu'i sde pa dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir gnas ma'i bu'i sde pa dag gis smras pa /
translated: Here the Vatsiputrīya say:

original: skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dag 'dus byas kyang yin la /
analyzed: skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'jig pa dag 'dus byas kyang yin la /
translated: Arising, enduring, and disintegrating are conditioned phenomena.

original: thug pa med par yang thal bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: thug pa med par yang thal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Nor does the error of infinite regress ensue.

original: gal te ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji lta zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gang gi phyir 'di la chos ni bdag nyid dang bco lnga skye ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la chos ni bdag nyid dang bco lnga skye ste /
translated: Because fifteen things arise in dependence on a thing:

original: chos de dang de'i skye ba dang / de'i gnas pa dang / de'i 'jig pa dang / de'i ldan pa dang / de'i gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa nyid dang / 'dir gal te chos de dkar po yin na /
analyzed: chos de dang de'i skye ba dang / de'i gnas pa dang / de'i 'jig pa dang / de'i ldan pa dang / de'i gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa nyid dang / 'dir gal te chos de dkar po yin na /
translated: the thing itself, the arising of that thing, the enduring of that thing, the disintegrating of that thing, the possession of that thing, the transformation of that thing, the otherness of that thing, the non-otherness of that thing, the impermanence of that thing, the truth of suffering, the truth of the origin of suffering, the truth of the cessation of suffering, the truth of the path, the complete relinquishment of that thing, the cessation of that thing, the realization of that thing, and the cultivation of that thing.

original: de'i yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'am /
analyzed: de'i yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'am /
translated: If that thing is pure, then the complete liberation of that thing arises.

original: ci ste nag po yin na log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / gal te chos de nges par 'byung ba yin na de'i nges par 'byung ba nyid dam /
analyzed: ci ste nag po yin na log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / gal te chos de nges par 'byung ba yin na de'i nges par 'byung ba nyid dam /
translated: If that thing is impure, then the wrong liberation of that thing arises. If that thing is a means of escape, then the means of escape of that thing arises.

original: ci ste nges par 'byung ba ma yin na nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid skye ste /
analyzed: ci ste nges par 'byung ba ma yin na nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid skye ste /
translated: If that thing is not a means of escape, then the non-means of escape of that thing arises.

original: de dag ni 'khor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni 'khor zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called the retinue.

original: de ni skye ba'i skye ba dang / gnas pa'i gnas pa dang / 'jig pa'i 'jig pa dang / ldan pa'i ldan pa dang / gnas pa las gnas gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyi gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid dang / yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'am /
analyzed: de ni skye ba'i skye ba dang / gnas pa'i gnas pa dang / 'jig pa'i 'jig pa dang / ldan pa'i ldan pa dang / gnas pa las gnas gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid kyi gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid dang / yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'am /
translated: that is, the arising of arising, the enduring of enduring, the aging of aging, the passing away of passing away, the possession of possession, the transformation of transformation, the correct liberation of correct liberation,

original: log pa'i rnam par grol ba'i log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid dam /
analyzed: log pa'i rnam par grol ba'i log pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nges par 'byung ba nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba nyid dam /
translated: the incorrect liberation of incorrect liberation, the renunciation of renunciation,

original: nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang skye ste /
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba ma yin pa nyid kyang skye ste /
translated: and the non-renunciation of non-renunciation.

original: de dag ni 'khor gyi 'khor zhes bya ste /🔽de ltar chos bdag nyid dang bco lnga skye'o //
analyzed: de dag ni 'khor gyi 'khor zhes bya ste / de ltar chos bdag nyid dang bco lnga skye'o //
translated: These are called the “sub-moments” of the primary moments.🔽Thus, fifteen dharmas arise.

original: de la rtsa ba'i skye bas ni bdag nyid ma gtogs par chos bcu bzhi skyed par byed do //
analyzed: de la rtsa ba'i skye bas ni bdag nyid ma gtogs par chos bcu bzhi skyed par byed do //
translated: Among them, the primary arising generates fourteen dharmas, excluding itself.

original: skye ba'i skye ba skye ba'i skye ba 'ba' zhig skyed par byed do //
analyzed: skye ba'i skye ba skye ba'i skye ba 'ba' zhig skyed par byed do //
translated: The arising of arising generates only the primary arising.

original: gnas pa la sogs pa dag kyang de bzhin pas thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas pa la sogs pa dag kyang de bzhin pas thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the same is true of enduring and so on, the error of infinite regress does not arise.

original: phyogs snga ma de'i tshig le'ur byas pa ni /🔽skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba yi //
analyzed: phyogs snga ma de'i tshig le'ur byas pa ni / skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba yi //
translated: The opponent’s verse is:🔽The arising of arising

original: skye ba 'ba' zhig skyed par byed //
analyzed: skye ba 'ba' zhig skyed par byed //
translated: Generates only the primary arising.

original: rtsa ba'i @103b skye bas skye ba yi //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i @103b skye bas skye ba yi //
translated: The primary arising

original: skye ba skyed par byed pas na //
analyzed: skye ba skyed par byed pas na //
translated: Generates the arising of arising.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to that is:

original: skye ba'i skye bas ni skye ba 'ba' zhig skyed par byed kyi /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye bas ni skye ba 'ba' zhig skyed par byed kyi /
translated: The arising of arising generates only the primary arising,

original: gzhan skyed par mi byed do //
analyzed: gzhan skyed par mi byed do //
translated: but it does not generate the other.

original: rtsa ba'i skye bas ni skye ba'i skye ba skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye bas ni skye ba'i skye ba skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: The primary arising generates the arising of arising.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: de ni mang po yang yin de ni sna tshogs kyang yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de ni mang po yang yin de ni sna tshogs kyang yin mod kyi /
translated: Although it is many and it is various,

original: de de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: it is not like that.

original: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skyes //
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skyes //
translated: If your arising of arising

original: rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed byed pa //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed byed pa //
translated: generates the primary arising,

original: khyod kyi rtsa bas ma bskyed de //
analyzed: khyod kyi rtsa bas ma bskyed de //
translated: your primary arising would not generate it.

original: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
translated: How could it generate that?

original: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par byed na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par byed na /
translated: If your arising of arising generates the basic arising,

original: khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bas ma bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye ba de ji ltar skyed par byed /
analyzed: khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bas ma bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye ba de ji ltar skyed par byed /
translated: how could that arising of arising, which is not generated by your basic arising, generate that basic arising?

original: skyed par mi byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: skyed par mi byed pa nyid de /
translated: It could not generate it.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir sngon bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir sngon bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because it is not generated, it is just like before.🔽If you think that the basic arising generates the arising of arising,

original: gal te rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa kho na'i skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa kho na'i skye ba'i skye bas rtsa ba'i skye ba skyed par byed do zhe na /
translated: and that arising of arising generates the basic arising,

original: 'dir bshad pa /🔽gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba yis //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba yis //
translated: then in response to that Candrakīrti explains:🔽If that which is generated by your basic arising

original: bskyed pa de yis rtsa skyed na //🔽des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba des //
analyzed: bskyed pa de yis rtsa skyed na // des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba des //
translated: generates the basic arising,🔽how could that basic arising,

original: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
analyzed: de ni ji ltar skyed par byed //
translated: which is not generated by it, generate it?

original: gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par byed na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye bas bskyed pa'i skye ba'i skye ba des rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par byed na /
translated: If that arising of arising, which is generated by your basic arising, generates that basic arising,

original: skye ba'i skye ba des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i skye ba des skye ba'i skye ba de ji ltar skyed bar byed /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye ba des ma bskyed pa'i rtsa ba'i skye ba des skye ba'i skye ba de ji ltar skyed bar byed /
translated: How could the primary arising not generated by the arising of arising generate the arising of arising?

original: skyed par mi byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: skyed par mi byed pa nyid de /
translated: It does not generate it.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir sngon bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir sngon bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because it is not arisen, it is just as before.

original: gal te rtsa ba'i skye ba dang skye ba'i skye ba dag skyed bzhin pa na rang gi bya ba byed pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rtsa ba'i skye ba dang skye ba'i skye ba dag skyed bzhin pa na rang gi bya ba byed pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that there is no error because the primary arising and the arising of arising perform their own functions while arising,

original: bshad pa / khyod kyi de ni skye bzhin pa //🔽ma skyes de yis gal te ni //
analyzed: bshad pa / khyod kyi de ni skye bzhin pa // ma skyes de yis gal te ni //
translated: Nāgārjuna responds:🔽If that arising of arising🔽Could generate that

original: de ni skyed par byed nus na //
analyzed: de ni skyed par byed nus na //
translated: Which is not yet arisen,

original: de skyed par ni 'dod la rag / khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye ba'am //🔽skye ba'i skye ba de skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des gal te skye ba'i skye ba'am /
analyzed: de skyed par ni 'dod la rag / khyod kyi rtsa ba'i skye ba'am // skye ba'i skye ba de skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des gal te skye ba'i skye ba'am /
translated: Then it would be tenable to assert that it generates that.

original: rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par byed nus na ni /🔽skye ba'i skye ba'am /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par byed nus na ni / skye ba'i skye ba'am /
translated: If that primary arising or arising of arising which is arising but not yet arisen could generate that arising of arising or primary arising,

original: rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par 'dod la rag na /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par 'dod la rag na /
translated: then it would be tenable to assert that it generates that arising of arising or primary arising.

original: rtsa ba'i skye ba'am skye ba'i skye ba skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des skye ba'i skye ba'am /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye ba'am skye ba'i skye ba skye bzhin pa rang nyid ma skyes pa des skye ba'i skye ba'am /
translated: The arising of arising, or basic arising, that is not itself arisen cannot give rise to the arising of arising, or basic arising,🔽because it is not arisen,

original: rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par mi nus te /🔽ma skyes pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i skye ba de skyed par mi nus te / ma skyes pa'i phyir ram /
translated: like that which is not a producer, like that which is not arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,

original: skye bzhin pa'i phyir sngon bzhin nam ;🔽skye bar 'dod pa'i dngos po bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽gal te lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyus skye bzhin pa yang skyed pa'i mthu yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye bzhin pa'i phyir sngon bzhin nam ; skye bar 'dod pa'i dngos po bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so // gal te lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyus skye bzhin pa yang skyed pa'i mthu yod pa'i phyir /
translated: or because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen.🔽If you think that the arising of arising is not like that which is not a producer, like that which is not arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,

original: lhan cig 'byung ba ma skyes pa dag gam /
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba ma skyes pa dag gam /
translated: because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,

original: skye bzhin pa dag gis ma skyes pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: skye bzhin pa dag gis ma skyes pa'i phyir ram /
translated: because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,🔽because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,

original: skye bzhin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi @104a * //🔽don ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: skye bzhin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi @104a * // don ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,🔽because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,🔽because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,🔽because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like that which is past, like that which is present, like that which is other, or like that which is not arisen,

original: lhan cig 'byung ba dag kyang 'dod chags dang chags pa dag lhan cig tu skye ba dgag pa'i skabs su bkag pa'i phyir dang / byed pa'i rgyu yang bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba dag kyang 'dod chags dang chags pa dag lhan cig tu skye ba dgag pa'i skabs su bkag pa'i phyir dang / byed pa'i rgyu yang bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is arising, like that which is arising, like that which is arisen, like

original: sgrub pa de ma nges pa nyid du bstan par mi nus pas /
analyzed: sgrub pa de ma nges pa nyid du bstan par mi nus pas /
translated: But it cannot be shown that that practice is not definite.

original: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog pa med do //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog pa med do //
translated: Therefore, the consequence of an infinite regress cannot be avoided.

original: gzhan dag gi thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog pa'i phyir smras pa /🔽ji lta mar mes rang dang gzhan //
analyzed: gzhan dag gi thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba bzlog pa'i phyir smras pa / ji lta mar mes rang dang gzhan //
translated: In order to avoid the consequence of an infinite regress for others, it is said:🔽Just as a lamp illuminates itself and others,

original: snang bar byed pa de bzhin du //🔽skye ba 'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos //
analyzed: snang bar byed pa de bzhin du // skye ba 'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos //
translated: so too

original: gnyi ga skyed par byed pa yin //
analyzed: gnyi ga skyed par byed pa yin //
translated: arising causes the generation of itself and others.

original: de'i phyir thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, there is no infinite regress.

original: 'dir don go sla ba dang rnam par bshad zin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bshad par mi bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir don go sla ba dang rnam par bshad zin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par bshad par mi bya ste /
translated: Here, what is easy to understand and what has already been explained is not explained again,

original: tshig mangs su dogs pa'i phyir dang / don grags pa dang / don rnam par bshad zin pa la 'bad pa don med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig mangs su dogs pa'i phyir dang / don grags pa dang / don rnam par bshad zin pa la 'bad pa don med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of fear of verbosity and because it is pointless to strive after a well-known meaning or one that has already been explained.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni bshad par bya ste /
translated: Here, inference should be explained.

original: skye ba ni rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyi yul dag la bya ba byed de /
analyzed: skye ba ni rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyi yul dag la bya ba byed de /
translated: Arising causes activity in regard to itself and other things.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dper na mar me snang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas rang dang / gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dper na mar me snang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas rang dang / gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: For example, a lamp illuminates itself and other things, because it is the essence of illumination.🔽In response to that, we say: Ultimately, arising is the essence of that which generates itself.

original: de la bshad pa don dam par skye ba ni skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na'o zhes bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba bzhin du ma grub par brjod pa'i phyir dang
analyzed: de la bshad pa don dam par skye ba ni skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na'o zhes bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba bzhin du ma grub par brjod pa'i phyir dang
translated: The reason “because it is the essence of that” is like the thesis itself, unestablished.

original: / dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig pa yin pa'i phyir /🔽dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: / dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig pa yin pa'i phyir / dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: And because it is a partial aspect of the meaning of the thesis.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bzhin pas de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bzhin pas de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying, “Sound is impermanent, because it is impermanent.”🔽Therefore this is illogical.

original: yang bshad pa /
analyzed: yang bshad pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: 'di la don dam par mar me ni rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag gzung ba la bar du bco dpa'i  mun pa sel ba'i phyir snang bar byed pa yin no zhes brjod par bya grang na /
analyzed: 'di la don dam par mar me ni rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag gzung ba la bar du bco dpa'i  mun pa sel ba'i phyir snang bar byed pa yin no zhes brjod par bya grang na /
translated: Here, one might say that ultimately, since the lamp dispels the darkness that obstructs the apprehension of itself and others, it is illuminating.

original: 'di la ji skad smos pa'i sgrub pa de mi srid do //
analyzed: 'di la ji skad smos pa'i sgrub pa de mi srid do //
translated: But here, the proof as stated is impossible.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: de'i phyir 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Therefore, here it is said:

original: mar me dang ni gang dag na //
analyzed: mar me dang ni gang dag na //
translated: The lamp and that which is

original: de 'dug pa na mun pa med //
analyzed: de 'dug pa na mun pa med //
translated: not darkness when it is present,

original: mar mes ci zhig snang bar byed //
analyzed: mar mes ci zhig snang bar byed //
translated: what does the lamp illuminate?

original: ci yang snang bar mi byed do //
analyzed: ci yang snang bar mi byed do //
translated: It does not illuminate anything at all.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the words.

original: de ltar na 'dir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mar me snang bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa dang / sgrub pa'i chos mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la mun pa med pa nyid bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mar me snang bar byed pa nyid ma yin pa dang / sgrub pa'i chos mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la mun pa med pa nyid bstan to //
translated: Thus, here the property of the thesis, the lamp is not illuminating, and the proving property, the lamp does not have darkness with regard to itself and others, are taught.

original: de'i phyir 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar @104b me ni mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar @104b me ni mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, here the inference is: ultimately, a lamp does not illuminate itself and others,

original: mun pa med pa'i phyir dper na nyi ma 'od zer gsal zhing 'jibs ba dang ldan pa'i snang ba bzhin no //🔽yang na / mar me dang ni gang dag na //
analyzed: mun pa med pa'i phyir dper na nyi ma 'od zer gsal zhing 'jibs ba dang ldan pa'i snang ba bzhin no // yang na / mar me dang ni gang dag na //
translated: because it is devoid of darkness, like the light of the sun, which is clear and bright.🔽Or,

original: de 'dug pa na mun pa med //
analyzed: de 'dug pa na mun pa med //
translated: where a lamp is placed, there is no darkness.

original: ces bya ba ni snang bar byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni snang bar byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because it illuminates.

original: 'dis ni mar me'i chos ni snang bar byed pa nyid yin par ston to //
analyzed: 'dis ni mar me'i chos ni snang bar byed pa nyid yin par ston to //
translated: This shows that the property of a lamp is illumination.

original: de'i phyir 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me ni mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa ma yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me ni mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa ma yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, here the inference is: ultimately, a lamp does not illuminate itself and others,

original: snang bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir dper na nyi ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snang bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir dper na nyi ma bzhin no //
translated: because it is illumination, like the sun.

original: de bzhin du mar me ni snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mar me ni snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, a lamp does not illuminate,🔽because it is devoid of darkness, like a pot.

original: gtan tshigs 'byung ba nyid dang / phan gdags par bya ba nyid dang / byas pa nyid dang / rkyen gyi dbye bas tha dad pa nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir sa la sogs pa dag bzhin no zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'byung ba nyid dang / phan gdags par bya ba nyid dang / byas pa nyid dang / rkyen gyi dbye bas tha dad pa nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir sa la sogs pa dag bzhin no zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: and because of the differentiation of the elements, the objects to be benefited, the products, and the conditions, etc., it is like earth, etc.

original: de'i phyir dpe med pas sgrub pa ma tshang ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpe med pas sgrub pa ma tshang ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: Therefore, the fault of the incompleteness of the proof is due to the absence of an example.

original: 'dir smras pa /🔽mun pa sel bas snang byed yin //
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / mun pa sel bas snang byed yin //
translated: Here, the opponent says:🔽It illuminates because it dispels darkness.

original: mar me skye bzhin pas mun pa sel bar byed de /
analyzed: mar me skye bzhin pas mun pa sel bar byed de /
translated: The arising of the lamp dispels darkness,

original: gang gi phyir des snang bar bya ba'i dngos po la mun pa med pa dang / snang bar byed pas snang ba yin pa de'i phyir mun pa sel bas snang bar byed pa yin no zhes smras par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir des snang bar bya ba'i dngos po la mun pa med pa dang / snang bar byed pas snang ba yin pa de'i phyir mun pa sel bas snang bar byed pa yin no zhes smras par 'gyur ro //
translated: because it is the absence of darkness in the things that it illuminates and because it is illumination by the illuminator. Therefore, it is said that it illuminates because it dispels darkness.

original: de'i mun pa med pa'i phyir zhes gang smras pa de ma grub pas des na gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i mun pa med pa'i phyir zhes gang smras pa de ma grub pas des na gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: But since it has not been established that it is the absence of darkness, the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: dpe med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there an absence of an example.

original: mar mes snang bar bya ba'i don dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mar mes snang bar bya ba'i don dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object to be illuminated is perceived.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:🔽How can a lamp

original: ji ltar mar me skye bzhin pas //🔽mun pa sel bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: ji ltar mar me skye bzhin pas // mun pa sel bar byed pa yin //
translated: that is arising illuminate?

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mi srid pa la snyegs te /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mi srid pa la snyegs te /
translated: “How” is used in the sense of impossibility.

original: ji ltar sel bar byed de /
analyzed: ji ltar sel bar byed de /
translated: How can it illuminate?

original: sel bar mi byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: sel bar mi byed pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: It cannot illuminate. This is the meaning of the sentence.

original: mar me skye bzhin pa'i zhes bya ba 'dis ni skye bzhin pa'i chos skye bzhin pa nyid bstan te /
analyzed: mar me skye bzhin pa'i zhes bya ba 'dis ni skye bzhin pa'i chos skye bzhin pa nyid bstan te /
translated: “A lamp that is arising” indicates that the property of arising is arising.

original: de ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
translated: This is the statement of the property to be proven and the proof.

original: gang tshe mar me skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: gang tshe mar me skye bzhin pa //
translated: When a lamp that is arising

original: mun pa dang ni phrad pa med //
analyzed: mun pa dang ni phrad pa med //
translated: does not make contact with darkness,

original: ces bya ba ni chos mthun pa'i dpe nye bar gzhag pa yin te /🔽dper na sgra byas pa ji ltar rtag ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni chos mthun pa'i dpe nye bar gzhag pa yin te / dper na sgra byas pa ji ltar rtag ste /
translated: This is the statement of the example that is similar to the property to be proven.🔽For example, just as sound is permanent because it is produced,

original: bum pa byas pa mi rtag pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: bum pa byas pa mi rtag pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: a pot is impermanent because it is produced.

original: de la 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the inference is: A lamp does not remove darkness ultimately,

original: skye bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir dper na mun pas @105a * //🔽mar me bzhin no //
analyzed: skye bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir dper na mun pas @105a * // mar me bzhin no //
translated: because it is in the process of arising, like darkness.

original: gal te shes pa dang shes pa ma yin pa dag gis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te shes pa dang shes pa ma yin pa dag gis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is not conclusive because of the possibility of cognition and non-cognition,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i khongs su gtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: then it is not conclusive because it is included in the probandum.

original: de bzhin du bkag pas ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du bkag pas ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, it is not inconclusive because it is negated.

original: yang na skye bzhin pa ni mngon par ma grub pa ste /🔽mar me ni snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na skye bzhin pa ni mngon par ma grub pa ste / mar me ni snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, that which is in the process of arising is non-accomplished.

original: mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir /
translated: A lamp does not illuminate because it is non-accomplished.

original: dper na bu ma skyes pas bya ba mi nus pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na bu ma skyes pas bya ba mi nus pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, an unborn son cannot perform an action.🔽Or,

original: yang na / ji ltar mar me skye bzhin pas //
analyzed: yang na / ji ltar mar me skye bzhin pas //
translated: How does a lamp that is🔽in the process of arising

original: mun pa sel bar byed pa yin //
analyzed: mun pa sel bar byed pa yin //
translated: remove darkness?

original: zhes bya bas ni dpe la phrad pa med pa brjod pa'i phyir mar me'i chos phrad pa med pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya bas ni dpe la phrad pa med pa brjod pa'i phyir mar me'i chos phrad pa med pa yin par bstan to //
translated: This shows that the property of the example, the lamp, is the absence of contact, because it is said that there is no contact in the example.

original: gang tshe mar me skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: gang tshe mar me skye bzhin pa //
translated: When the lamp is in the process of arising,

original: mun pa dang ni phrad pa med //
analyzed: mun pa dang ni phrad pa med //
translated: it does not make contact with darkness.

original: ces bya ba ni chos mthun pa'i dpe'i tshig yin no //🔽'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me skye bzhin pa ni mun pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni chos mthun pa'i dpe'i tshig yin no // 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me skye bzhin pa ni mun pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: This is the statement of the example that is similar to the property-possessor.

original: phrad pa med pa'i phyir dper na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun nag snang ba med pa bzhin no //🔽yang na don dam par mar me ni mun pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phrad pa med pa'i phyir dper na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun nag snang ba med pa bzhin no // yang na don dam par mar me ni mun pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Here the inference is: ultimately, the lamp in the process of arising does not remove darkness because it does not make contact with it, like the darkness of the intervening space between worlds.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang phrad pa med pa'i phyir dper na mun pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang phrad pa med pa'i phyir dper na mun pa bzhin no //
translated: Or, ultimately, the lamp does not remove darkness because it does not make contact with its opposite, like darkness.

original: gal te mngon spyod kyi las bzhin du phrad pa med par yang snang bas mun pa sel ba'i phyir ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mngon spyod kyi las bzhin du phrad pa med par yang snang bas mun pa sel ba'i phyir ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is not definite that the lamp does not remove darkness because it removes darkness without making contact, like the rite of sorcery,

original: de la yang las la snang ba med pa'i phyir dang / dgra bo'i phyir las byas pas rig sngags kyi lha dag gis phrad pa kho nas mi 'dod pa byed pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de la yang las la snang ba med pa'i phyir dang / dgra bo'i phyir las byas pas rig sngags kyi lha dag gis phrad pa kho nas mi 'dod pa byed pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that the result is uncertain, because the karma does not appear to the karma, and because the mantras of the gods do not desire to harm the one who has committed the karma against them.

original: ci ste yang /
analyzed: ci ste yang /
translated: But if you say,

original: rang gi phyogs la chags pas mig khebs par gyur pa nyid kyis 'di skad ces /
analyzed: rang gi phyogs la chags pas mig khebs par gyur pa nyid kyis 'di skad ces /
translated: “Because of attachment to our own position, we see that

original: mar mes phrad pa med par snang bar byed pa mthong gi / mun pas phrad pa med par snang bar byed pa ni ma mthong ngo zhes zer na /
analyzed: mar mes phrad pa med par snang bar byed pa mthong gi / mun pas phrad pa med par snang bar byed pa ni ma mthong ngo zhes zer na /
translated: the butterlamp illuminates without contact, but we do not see darkness that does not make contact and illuminates,”

original: dpe bsgrub pa'i phyir de ni mi gnod do //
analyzed: dpe bsgrub pa'i phyir de ni mi gnod do //
translated: then that does not undermine the establishment of the example.

original: de nyid brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid brtag par bya ste /
translated: This should be investigated:

original: ci mthong ba de ji ltar mthong ba bzhin nam /
analyzed: ci mthong ba de ji ltar mthong ba bzhin nam /
translated: Is what is seen as it is seen,

original: 'on te gzhan zhig yin /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan zhig yin /
translated: or is it otherwise?

original: mar mes phrad pa med par snang bar byed pa mthong ba ni de ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: mar mes phrad pa med par snang bar byed pa mthong ba ni de ltar ma yin te /
translated: The butterlamp illuminates without contact is not as it is seen.

original: ci ste mar mes phrad pa med par yang mun pa sel bar 'dod na ni 'di yang 'dod par gyis shig / mar me phrad pa med pa yang //
analyzed: ci ste mar mes phrad pa med par yang mun pa sel bar 'dod na ni 'di yang 'dod par gyis shig / mar me phrad pa med pa yang //
translated: But if you maintain that a butterlamp clears darkness without contacting it, then you should also maintain this:

original: gal te mun pa sel byed na //🔽'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun //
analyzed: gal te mun pa sel byed na // 'jig rten kun na gnas pa'i mun //
translated: If a butterlamp clears darkness🔽Without contacting it,

original: 'di na 'dug pa nges bsal 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di na 'dug pa nges bsal 'gyur //
translated: Then darkness would also clear itself.

original: de ni mi 'dod pas de'i phyir mar mes phrad pa med par mun pa sel bar byed do zhes bya ba de yang 'dod par ma byed cig / yang gzhan @105b yang /
analyzed: de ni mi 'dod pas de'i phyir mar mes phrad pa med par mun pa sel bar byed do zhes bya ba de yang 'dod par ma byed cig / yang gzhan @105b yang /
translated: But that is unacceptable. Therefore, do not maintain that a butterlamp clears darkness without contacting it.

original: khyod 'dod pa ltar mun pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyod 'dod pa ltar mun pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, if you maintain that a butterlamp clears darkness

original: mar me rang dang gzhan gyi dngos //🔽gal te snang bar byed gyur na //🔽mun pa'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos //
analyzed: mar me rang dang gzhan gyi dngos // gal te snang bar byed gyur na // mun pa'ang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos //
translated: Because it illuminates itself and others,🔽Then darkness would also clear itself and others,

original: sgrib par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
analyzed: sgrib par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
translated: Because it obscures itself and others.

original: de ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: de ni mi 'dod do //
translated: But that is unacceptable.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag sgrib par mi byed par 'dod de /
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag sgrib par mi byed par 'dod de /
translated: You maintain that it does not obscure itself and others.

original: de'i phyir de ni chos mthun pa'i dpe'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni chos mthun pa'i dpe'i tshig yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is a statement of an example that is similar to the property of the position.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me ni rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la yod pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par mar me ni rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la yod pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the inference is: A lamp ultimately does not remove the darkness that is an incompatible object of illumination with regard to itself and others,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it has an incompatible object,

original: dper na mun pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mun pa bzhin no //
translated: like darkness.

original: yang na don dam par mar me ni mun pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na don dam par mar me ni mun pa sel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Or, a lamp ultimately does not remove darkness,

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it has an incompatible object,

original: dper na grib ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na grib ma bzhin no //
translated: like a shadow.

original: de'i phyir de ltar mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa gsal bas dpe med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar mar me rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid dag snang bar byed pa gsal bas dpe med do //
translated: Therefore, since a lamp does not illuminate itself and others, there is no example.

original: des na pha rol pos mar me bzhin du skye ba yang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag skyed par byed pas thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de de bzhin du gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na pha rol pos mar me bzhin du skye ba yang rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po dag skyed par byed pas thug pa med par thal bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa de de bzhin du gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the opponent’s argument, “Just as a lamp illuminates itself and others, so too arising causes the generation of itself and others, and therefore the error of infinite regress does not arise,” is just so much verbiage.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover:

original: skye bas ji ltar rang gi bdag nyid skyed par 'dod /🔽ji skyes pas sam /
analyzed: skye bas ji ltar rang gi bdag nyid skyed par 'dod / ji skyes pas sam /
translated: How could arising cause the generation of itself?🔽Would it cause the generation of itself through having arisen?

original: 'on te ma skyes pas skyed par byed /
analyzed: 'on te ma skyes pas skyed par byed /
translated: Or would it cause the generation of itself through not having arisen?

original: des cir 'gyur /🔽gal te ma skyes pas so zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur / gal te ma skyes pas so zhe na /
translated: What is the problem?

original: skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
analyzed: skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
translated: If you say it causes the generation of itself through not having arisen,🔽then how could this non-arisen

original: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar skyed //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar skyed //
translated: arising cause the generation of itself?

original: skye ba ma skyes pas rang gi bdag nyid skyed par mi byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: skye ba ma skyes pas rang gi bdag nyid skyed par mi byed pa nyid de /
translated: Arising that has not arisen does not cause the generation of itself,

original: med pa'i phyir sngon bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽ji ste skyes pas so zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir sngon bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so // ji ste skyes pas so zhe na /
translated: because it does not exist, just like before.

original: ci ste skyes pas skyed byed na //
analyzed: ci ste skyes pas skyed byed na //
translated: If you say it causes the generation of itself through having arisen,🔽then if arising causes the generation of itself through having arisen,

original: skyes na ci zhig skyed du yod //
analyzed: skyes na ci zhig skyed du yod //
translated: what is there to be generated that has arisen?

original: skyes pa la skye ba'i bya ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: skyes pa la skye ba'i bya ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The thought is that the activity of arising is meaningless with respect to that which has arisen.

original: de'i phyir de ltar brtags na skye bas rang gi bdag nyid skyed par byed pa nyid mi srid pas thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba ldog pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar brtags na skye bas rang gi bdag nyid skyed par byed pa nyid mi srid pas thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba ldog pa med do //
translated: Therefore, since it is impossible for arising to cause the generation of itself when analyzed in this way, the consequence that there is an infinite regress cannot be averted.

original: skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus ma byas nyid yin na yang 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir /🔽de dag 'dus byas min zhes bya ba de de bzhin du gnas pa nyid yin pas /
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa dag 'dus ma byas nyid yin na yang 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir / de dag 'dus byas min zhes bya ba de de bzhin du gnas pa nyid yin pas /
translated: If arising and so on are unconditioned, then the error arises that the meaning of the reason is not established, because they are unconditioned,

original: skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon yod do //
analyzed: skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dag dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon yod do //
translated: just like space, which is not a conditioned phenomenon.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: skye bar smra ba dag la ji skye bas skyes pa'am /
analyzed: skye bar smra ba dag la ji skye bas skyes pa'am /
translated: to those who assert arising, one should ask, “What arises?🔽Does that which has arisen,

original: ma skyes pa'am /🔽skye bzhin pa'am /🔽ci @106a * //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'am / skye bzhin pa'am / ci @106a * //
translated: that which has not arisen,🔽or that which is in the process of arising arise?

original: zhig skyed par byed ces dri bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhig skyed par byed ces dri bar bya ste /
translated: What is it that causes arising?”

original: rnam pa thams cad kyang rigs pa ma yin pa nyid du dgongs nas bshad pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyang rigs pa ma yin pa nyid du dgongs nas bshad pa /
translated: Thinking that all of these are illogical, the master Nāgārjuna explained:

original: skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
translated: That which has arisen, that which has not arisen, and that arising

original: ji lta bur yang skyed mi byed //
analyzed: ji lta bur yang skyed mi byed //
translated: do not cause the generation of that which is arising.

original: ji lta zhe na /🔽song dang ma song bgom pa yis //
analyzed: ji lta zhe na / song dang ma song bgom pa yis //
translated: How is that?

original: de dag rnam par bshad pa yin //
analyzed: de dag rnam par bshad pa yin //
translated: The explanation is by means of that gone over, not gone over, and that being gone over.

original: ji ltar der rjes su dpag pa rgyas par bstan pa bzhin du 'dir yang brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: ji ltar der rjes su dpag pa rgyas par bstan pa bzhin du 'dir yang brjod par bya ste /
translated: Just as inference is extensively taught there, so it should be stated here.

original: don dam par skye bzhin pa skyed par mi byed de /
analyzed: don dam par skye bzhin pa skyed par mi byed de /
translated: Ultimately, that now arising does not cause the generation of that now arising,

original: ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir /
translated: because its nature is not ascertained.

original: dper na 'gag bzhin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na 'gag bzhin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like that now ceasing.

original: yang na don dam par skye bzhin pa skyed par mi byed de /
analyzed: yang na don dam par skye bzhin pa skyed par mi byed de /
translated: Or, ultimately, that now arising does not cause the generation of that now arising,

original: dus gzhan du 'pho ba la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyir dper na 'gag bzhin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dus gzhan du 'pho ba la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyir dper na 'gag bzhin pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is directed to the transition to another time, for example, like that now ceasing.

original: ci ste skye bzhin pa zhes bya ba de cung zad ni skyes cung zad ni ma skyes pa'o zhes bya bar rtog na /
analyzed: ci ste skye bzhin pa zhes bya ba de cung zad ni skyes cung zad ni ma skyes pa'o zhes bya bar rtog na /
translated: But if you imagine that what is called that now arising is partly arisen and partly not yet arisen,

original: de lta na yang de'i gang cung zad skyes pa de ni skyed par mi byed de /
analyzed: de lta na yang de'i gang cung zad skyes pa de ni skyed par mi byed de /
translated: then in that case also, that which is partly arisen does not cause the generation of that which is partly arisen,

original: de'i skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because its arising would be pointless.

original: de ni gang cung zad ma skyes pa de yang skyed par mi byed de /
analyzed: de ni gang cung zad ma skyes pa de yang skyed par mi byed de /
translated: And that which is partly not yet arisen also does not cause the generation of that which is partly not yet arisen,

original: skye bas stong pa'i phyir dper na ma 'ongs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: skye bas stong pa'i phyir dper na ma 'ongs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is empty of arising, for example, like the future.

original: gal te skye bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba la mngon par phyogs pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te skye bzhin pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba la mngon par phyogs pa'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that that now arising is that which is approaching arising,

original: brgal zhing brtag pa ni de gang zhig yin /🔽skyes pa zhig gam /
analyzed: brgal zhing brtag pa ni de gang zhig yin / skyes pa zhig gam /
translated: the objection and analysis is just this:

original: 'on te ma skyes pa zhig yin zhes bya ba de nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on te ma skyes pa zhig yin zhes bya ba de nyid yin no //
translated: Is it that which has arisen or is it that which has not arisen?

original: lan kyang skyes pa ni skyed par mi byed de /
analyzed: lan kyang skyes pa ni skyed par mi byed de /
translated: The response is just this: That which has arisen does not cause the generation of that which is now arising,

original: de'i skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //🔽ma skyes pa yang skyed par mi byed de /
analyzed: de'i skye ba don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // ma skyes pa yang skyed par mi byed de /
translated: because its arising would be pointless.🔽Nor does that which has not arisen cause the generation of that which is now arising,

original: skye bas stong pa'i phyir dper na ma 'ongs pa'i bzhin no zhes bya ba de nyid yin no //
analyzed: skye bas stong pa'i phyir dper na ma 'ongs pa'i bzhin no zhes bya ba de nyid yin no //
translated: because it is empty of arising, like the future.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, the opponent says:

original: ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de'i don gang yin ci mngon sum gyis ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de'i don gang yin ci mngon sum gyis ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir ram /
translated: What is the meaning of the reason, “because the nature is not ascertained”? Is it because the nature is not ascertained by direct perception?

original: 'on te rjes su dpag pas ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir yin /
analyzed: 'on te rjes su dpag pas ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir yin /
translated: Or is it because the nature is not ascertained by inference?

original: de la brtag pa snga ma ltar na ni ma nges pa nyid de /
analyzed: de la brtag pa snga ma ltar na ni ma nges pa nyid de /
translated: In the former case, it is not ascertained,

original: mngon sum gyis ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i dngos po la yang skye bzhin pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i dngos po la yang skye bzhin pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the existent entity that is not ascertained by direct perception also has arising.

original: brtag pa phyi ma ltar na ni ma grub pa nyid de skye ba la brten nas skye zhing skye bas skye bzhin pa rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtag pa phyi ma ltar na ni ma grub pa nyid de skye ba la brten nas skye zhing skye bas skye bzhin pa rjes su dpag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the latter case, it is not established, because arising is inferred from the arising of arising.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du smra ba rnams la mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa'i dngos po'i yod pa nyid med pas mi mthun pa'i @106b phyogs med pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du smra ba rnams la mngon sum dang / rjes su dpag pas dmigs pa'i dngos po'i yod pa nyid med pas mi mthun pa'i @106b phyogs med pa'i phyir ma nges pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: For those who advocate that the nature of all things is essencelessness, there is no countering of the existence of things that are perceived by direct perception and inference, and therefore it is not the case that it is not ascertained.

original: don ma grub pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: don ma grub pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that the meaning is not established.

original: gal te ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji lta zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: gang tshe skye ba yod pas ni //
analyzed: gang tshe skye ba yod pas ni //
translated: it is because when there is arising,

original: skye bzhin 'di 'byung med pa'i tshe //
analyzed: skye bzhin 'di 'byung med pa'i tshe //
translated: this arising of arising does not occur when there is no arising.

original: khyed na re /
analyzed: khyed na re /
translated: You say:

original: skye ba la brten nas skye bzhin pa skye bas skye bzhin pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes zer ba de nyid 'dir brtag par bya ste /🔽ci ste yod pa'am /
analyzed: skye ba la brten nas skye bzhin pa skye bas skye bzhin pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes zer ba de nyid 'dir brtag par bya ste / ci ste yod pa'am /
translated: Is that now arising that which exists,

original: med pa'am / yod med cig yin grang na /
analyzed: med pa'am / yod med cig yin grang na /
translated: or that which does not exist, or that which is both existent and nonexistent?

original: de dag dgag pa yang rgyas par bstan zin pas /🔽ji ltar skye la brten nas ni //
analyzed: de dag dgag pa yang rgyas par bstan zin pas / ji ltar skye la brten nas ni //
translated: And their refutation has already been extensively explained.🔽How could it be said that

original: skye bzhin zhes ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: skye bzhin zhes ni brjod par bya //
translated: “That now arising is said to arise in dependence on arising”?

original: de'i tshe ji ltar skye ba la brten nas skye bzhin pa skyed do zhes brjod par bya /
analyzed: de'i tshe ji ltar skye ba la brten nas skye bzhin pa skyed do zhes brjod par bya /
translated: At that time, how could it be said that “That now arising is caused to arise in dependence on arising”?

original: de lta bas na rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bas na rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, because there is no inference,

original: ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid nges par ma zin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: the meaning of the reason “because the nature is not ascertained” is not unestablished.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone says:

original: dper na mi mkhas pa la la zhig mtshon thabs mkhas pas mi gsod cing /
analyzed: dper na mi mkhas pa la la zhig mtshon thabs mkhas pas mi gsod cing /
translated: For example, an unskilled person kills a man with a weapon

original: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i spyad pa kun du spyod par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i spyad pa kun du spyod par byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: and engages in the conduct of an ignoble person.

original: khyod kyang rtog ge la mkhas pas drang srong mchog gis gsungs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyed ma sun 'byin cing /
analyzed: khyod kyang rtog ge la mkhas pas drang srong mchog gis gsungs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyed ma sun 'byin cing /
translated: You are also skilled in logic, and you refute the way dependent origination was taught by the supreme sage, the mother of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i spyad pa rjes su sgrub pas sngar khas blangs pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i spyad pa rjes su sgrub pas sngar khas blangs pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: You practice the conduct of one who is not an ārya, and you contradict your earlier assertions.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:
