original: gdul ba rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa lta ba ngan pa dge ba'i phyogs rtsa nas 'byin pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi lta ba ngan pa'i dri ma bkru ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gdul ba rgyu dang 'bras bu la skur pa 'debs pa lta ba ngan pa dge ba'i phyogs rtsa nas 'byin pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi lta ba ngan pa'i dri ma bkru ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to wash away the stains of bad views of those who deny causes and effects, who are endowed with bad views, and who uproot the side of virtue,

original: 'di skad ces 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di skad ces 'di lta ste /
translated: it is said, “It is like this:

original: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la /
analyzed: 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la /
translated: Because this exists, that arises.

original: 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba 'di lta ste /
translated: Because this was produced, that is produced. It is like this:

original: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa de kun rdzob tu gsungs kyi /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa de kun rdzob tu gsungs kyi /
translated: With ignorance as a condition, there are the karmic processes.”

original: don dam par ma gsungs par khas len pas khas blangs pa'i gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam par ma gsungs par khas len pas khas blangs pa'i gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since we accept that the Buddha did not teach ultimate reality, we are not harmed by the contradiction of our acceptance.

original: 'di yang bstan zin te /
analyzed: 'di yang bstan zin te /
translated: This has already been explained.

original: gang du ci bstan zhe na /🔽dngos po rang bzhin med rnams kyi //
analyzed: gang du ci bstan zhe na / dngos po rang bzhin med rnams kyi //
translated: Where was it explained?🔽In the passage that goes:🔽Since the existence of things that lack essence

original: yod pa gang phyir yod min na //
analyzed: yod pa gang phyir yod min na //
translated: Does not exist,

original: 'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung zhes //
analyzed: 'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung zhes //
translated: The statement, “Because this exists, that exists”

original: bya ba de ni 'thad ma yin //
analyzed: bya ba de ni 'thad ma yin //
translated: Is not tenable.

original: zhes bya ba der de bstan zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba der de bstan zin to //
translated: This is where it was explained.

original: 'dir yang bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir yang bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: rten cing 'byung ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: rten cing 'byung ba gang yin pa //
translated: Whatever is dependently arisen

original: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis zhi //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo nyid kyis zhi //
translated: Is, by nature, peaceful.

original: dngos po rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa /
analyzed: dngos po rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa /
translated: Whatever is a thing that is dependently arisen

original: de ni don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis zhi ba ste /
analyzed: de ni don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis zhi ba ste /
translated: Is, ultimately, peaceful by nature.

original: skye ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skye ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “peaceful” is that it is non-arisen.

original: bcom ldan 'das @107a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @107a * //
translated: The Bhagavān said:

original: kyis / gang zig rkyen las skye bde ma skyes //
analyzed: kyis / gang zig rkyen las skye bde ma skyes //
translated: That which is arisen from conditions is not arisen.

original: de la ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med //
analyzed: de la ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med //
translated: It is not arisen by virtue of its essential nature.

original: gang zhig rkyen la ltos pa de stong gsungs //
analyzed: gang zhig rkyen la ltos pa de stong gsungs //
translated: That which is dependent on conditions is empty.

original: gang gis stong nyid shes de bag yod yin //
analyzed: gang gis stong nyid shes de bag yod yin //
translated: One who knows emptiness is heedful.

original: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: gang dag brten nas skye ba ni //
analyzed: gang dag brten nas skye ba ni //
translated: Whatever arises dependently

original: de dag dngos nyid gang yang med //
analyzed: de dag dngos nyid gang yang med //
translated: Has no intrinsic reality.

original: gang dag ngo bo nyid med pa //
analyzed: gang dag ngo bo nyid med pa //
translated: Whatever has no intrinsic reality

original: de dag gar yang 'byung mi 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du blo gros chen po ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa las dgongs nas /
analyzed: de dag gar yang 'byung mi 'gyur // zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du blo gros chen po ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa las dgongs nas /
translated: Does not arise or cease.

original: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par bstan to zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par bstan to zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: And similarly, “Mahāmati, intending non-arising by intrinsic reality, I teach that all phenomena have no intrinsic reality.”

original: de'i phyir de ltar pha rol po dag zhe 'gras pa'i blo nyid kyis sun 'byin pa nye bar 'jog pas rjes su sgrub pa ni dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa la dri ma can du bya ba'i phyir thal ba spar gang 'thor ba dang🔽'dra'o // de'i phyir skye bzhin nyid dang ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar pha rol po dag zhe 'gras pa'i blo nyid kyis sun 'byin pa nye bar 'jog pas rjes su sgrub pa ni dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa la dri ma can du bya ba'i phyir thal ba spar gang 'thor ba dang 'dra'o // de'i phyir skye bzhin nyid dang ni //
translated: Therefore, in this way, the opponent’s refutation is just a display of hostility, like throwing a handful of dust at the stainless orb of the moon.🔽Arising itself and

original: skye ba yang ni zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: skye ba yang ni zhi ba nyid //
translated: arising are both pacified.

original: de ltar gang gi phyir yang dag par brtags na /
analyzed: de ltar gang gi phyir yang dag par brtags na /
translated: Thus, when properly examined,

original: rten cing 'byung ba la skye ba med de sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de'i phyir skye bzhin pa nyid dang / skye ba yang zhi ba nyid yin no //🔽de la pha rol pos skye ba la brten nas /
analyzed: rten cing 'byung ba la skye ba med de sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de'i phyir skye bzhin pa nyid dang / skye ba yang zhi ba nyid yin no // de la pha rol pos skye ba la brten nas /
translated: dependent origination is non-arisen, like an illusion. Therefore, that now arising and arising are pacified.🔽In this regard, the opponent says, “Infer the ultimate arising of that now arising in dependence on arising.”

original: don dam par skye bzhin pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang dag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par skye bzhin pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes gang smras pa de yang dag pa ma yin no //
translated: That is not correct.

original: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
translated: Others say,

original: rgyu dang rkyen de dang de dag la brten na bum pa skye ba dang / snam bu skye ba de dag mthong ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen de dang de dag la brten na bum pa skye ba dang / snam bu skye ba de dag mthong ste /
translated: “We see that a vase arises and a cloth arises in dependence on such and such causes and conditions.

original: mthong ba las lhag pa'i tshad ma gzhan med pas //🔽skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: mthong ba las lhag pa'i tshad ma gzhan med pas // skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
translated: Since there is no valid cognition higher than seeing,

original: ji lta bur yang skyed mi byed //
analyzed: ji lta bur yang skyed mi byed //
translated: “That now arising and the arisen do not cause the arising of that now arising in any way,”

original: ces gang smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ces gang smras pa de ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: that is illogical.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we reply:

original: tshul khrims la sogs pa tshogs kyi rjes su mthun pa dag mthong ba la su zhig 'gal bar byed de /
analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs pa tshogs kyi rjes su mthun pa dag mthong ba la su zhig 'gal bar byed de /
translated: Who would contradict the perception of the conformity of the aggregates such as morality, etc.?

original: de dag tha snyad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de dag tha snyad pa yin gyi /
translated: They are conventional,

original: don dam pa pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but not ultimate.

original: de bas na de dag la sogs pa la mngon par pa zhen pa spang bar 'dod pas bstan bcos brtsams pas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de bas na de dag la sogs pa la mngon par pa zhen pa spang bar 'dod pas bstan bcos brtsams pas nyes pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in composing the treatise in order to abandon attachment, etc., to those aggregates, etc.

original: ci ste bum pa skye'o zhes bya ba dang / snam bu skye'o zhes bya ba de dag tha snyad pa yin gyi don dam pa ma yin par ji ltar nges par gzung bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste bum pa skye'o zhes bya ba dang / snam bu skye'o zhes bya ba de dag tha snyad pa yin gyi don dam pa ma yin par ji ltar nges par gzung bar bya zhe na /
translated: But how can it be ascertained that “a pot arises” and “a cloth arises” are conventional, but not ultimate?

original: de nyon cig 'di la skyes na bum pa dang / snam bu yin gyi ma skyes na ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyon cig 'di la skyes na bum pa dang / snam bu yin gyi ma skyes na ni ma yin no //
translated: Listen to this: if it arises here, it is a pot or a cloth, but if it does not arise, it is not.

original: skyes pa la ni yang skye ba med pa'i phyir bum pa dang snam bu skye'o zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do //
analyzed: skyes pa la ni yang skye ba med pa'i phyir bum pa dang snam bu skye'o zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do //
translated: Since that which has arisen does not arise again, it is untenable to say “a pot arises” and “a cloth arises.”

original: ci ste ma skyes kyang bum pa blo la @107b bzhag nas ming sgro btags te bum pa skye'o zhes brjod na ni tha snyad tsam du zad de /
analyzed: ci ste ma skyes kyang bum pa blo la @107b bzhag nas ming sgro btags te bum pa skye'o zhes brjod na ni tha snyad tsam du zad de /
translated: But if you say that a vase is posited in the mind and the term is imputed to it and then say that the vase arises, that is just a convention.

original: blo la bzhag pa'i bum pa la ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo la bzhag pa'i bum pa la ni skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the vase posited in the mind does not arise.

original: bye brag tu smra ba rnams gang dag gzugs la sogs pa dang bum pa la sogs dag dus 'pho ba'i phyir yod pa kho na las skye bar rtog na de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba rnams gang dag gzugs la sogs pa dang bum pa la sogs dag dus 'pho ba'i phyir yod pa kho na las skye bar rtog na de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: If the Vaibhāṣikas think that only existent things arise because form and so on and vases and so forth are transferred from one time to another, that is illogical.

original: gal te dngos po ma skyes pa //
analyzed: gal te dngos po ma skyes pa //
translated: If an unarisen thing

original: 'ga' zhig gang na yod gyur na //🔽gal te bum pa dang / snam bu la sogs pa dngos po ma skyes pa 'ga' zhig rkyen rnams sam /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gang na yod gyur na // gal te bum pa dang / snam bu la sogs pa dngos po ma skyes pa 'ga' zhig rkyen rnams sam /
translated: existed somewhere,

original: de dag 'dus pa'i gzhan la yod par gyur na /🔽de ni ci phyir der skye 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag 'dus pa'i gzhan la yod par gyur na / de ni ci phyir der skye 'gyur //
translated: If an unarisen thing, such as a vase or a cloth, existed in another, such as its conditions or their assembly,🔽why would it arise there?

original: yod pa de ci'i phyir dus der skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: yod pa de ci'i phyir dus der skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Why would that which exists arise at that time?

original: yod pa skye ba ni don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: yod pa skye ba ni don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: because it would be pointless for an existent to arise.

original: de'i phyir yod na skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod na skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “If it exists, it would not arise.”

original: de ltar na 'di sa ni skye ba'i sngon rol na /🔽dngos po ma skyes pa yod par smra ba rnams kyi dam bcas pa ni yod pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas skye ba med pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis skye ba bsal ba'i phyir yod pa smra ba rnams kyi rjes su dpag pa la gnod pa'i skyon
analyzed: de ltar na 'di sa ni skye ba'i sngon rol na / dngos po ma skyes pa yod par smra ba rnams kyi dam bcas pa ni yod pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas skye ba med pa dang ldan pa nyid kyis skye ba bsal ba'i phyir yod pa smra ba rnams kyi rjes su dpag pa la gnod pa'i skyon
translated: Thus, this is the refutation of arising because of the absence of arising,🔽as a consequence of the inference of existence prior to arising.🔽Since the assertion of those who advocate the existence of an unarisen entity is that it exists, the reductio argument demonstrates the fault of contradicting their inference.

original: bstan to // dus 'pho bar smra ba rnams la yang yod pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas da ltar gyi dus su 'pho ba med pa nyid kyis da ltar gyi dus su 'pho ba bsal ba'i phyir skyon de nyid yod do //
analyzed: bstan to // dus 'pho bar smra ba rnams la yang yod pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas da ltar gyi dus su 'pho ba med pa nyid kyis da ltar gyi dus su 'pho ba bsal ba'i phyir skyon de nyid yod do //
translated: For those who advocate the transference of time, since the existence of the entity is inferred, the fault is that it contradicts their assertion that it is transferred to the present, because it is not transferred to the present.

original: 'dis ni dngos po dang mtshan nyid dang gnas skabs dang gzhan pa gzhan du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dag gi lan btab pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni dngos po dang mtshan nyid dang gnas skabs dang gzhan pa gzhan du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dag gi lan btab pa yin no //
translated: This response also applies to the assertions of “thing,” “defining characteristic,” “state,” and “transformation into another.”

original: gal te grangs can dag dngos po dag yod pa nyid gsal bar byed pas skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te grangs can dag dngos po dag yod pa nyid gsal bar byed pas skyon med do zhe na /
translated: If the Sāṃkhya say, “There is no fault because we clarify the existence of things,”

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is illogical.

original: gsal bar bkag zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar bkag zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we have already refuted clarification.

original: ma skyes pa yod pa ji ltar shes par byar nus /
analyzed: ma skyes pa yod pa ji ltar shes par byar nus /
translated: How can one know that which is unborn?

original: grangs can dang / bye brag tu smra ba dag na re ma skyes pa ni yod pa kho nar shes par byar nus te /
analyzed: grangs can dang / bye brag tu smra ba dag na re ma skyes pa ni yod pa kho nar shes par byar nus te /
translated: The Sāṃkhya and Vaibhāṣika say, “Unborn things can be known to exist,

original: dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir de ltar gyi dngos po bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dus kyis bsdus pa'i phyir de ltar gyi dngos po bzhin no zhe na /
translated: because they are included in time, like things that are so.”

original: don dam par de ltar gyi dngos po yang ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid du ma grub pas dpe med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam par de ltar gyi dngos po yang ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid du ma grub pas dpe med pa'i phyir /
translated: But because things that are so are not established as having intrinsic reality in an ultimate sense, there is no example.

original: 'dod pa'i don mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don mi 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, the intended meaning is not established.

original: 'dis ni gzugs la sogs pa dag snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa nyid sgrub pa la yang /
analyzed: 'dis ni gzugs la sogs pa dag snga na med pa dang zhig nas med pa nyid sgrub pa la yang /
translated: This also establishes that form and so on do not exist prior to being perceived and do not exist after disintegrating.

original: skyon gyi lan btab par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skyon gyi lan btab par rig par bya'o //
translated: The reply to the objection should be understood.

original: tha snyad kyi bden pa la yang gnon par yang mi 'gyur te /🔽da ltar gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po dag sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin @108a * //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi bden pa la yang gnon par yang mi 'gyur te / da ltar gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po dag sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin @108a * //
translated: Nor does it follow that the conventional truth is repudiated,🔽because it is accepted that present things such as form exist like illusions,

original: du yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / tha snyad du gzugs la sogs pa dag brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: du yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / tha snyad du gzugs la sogs pa dag brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it is accepted that conventionally form and so on exist as imputed things.🔽This digression is sufficient.

original: zhar la bshad pas chog gi / skabs 'dir bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhar la bshad pas chog gi / skabs 'dir bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: Now we return to the topic at hand.🔽As it was said,

original: de ltar de zhig / skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: de ltar de zhig / skyes dang ma skyes skye bzhin pa //
translated: The past, the future, and the present

original: ji lta bur yang skye mi byed //
analyzed: ji lta bur yang skye mi byed //
translated: Are not produced in any way.

original: ces bya ba de bzhad zin to //
analyzed: ces bya ba de bzhad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: yang bshad pa /🔽gal te skye ba de yis ni //
analyzed: yang bshad pa / gal te skye ba de yis ni //
translated: Again it is said:🔽If that arising causes

original: skye bzhin pa ni skyed byed na //
analyzed: skye bzhin pa ni skyed byed na //
translated: The generation of that now arising,

original: gal te khyod 'dod pa ltar skye ba des skye bzhin pa skyed par byed na //
analyzed: gal te khyod 'dod pa ltar skye ba des skye bzhin pa skyed par byed na //
translated: If, as you maintain, that arising causes the generation of that now arising,

original: 'o na des na /
analyzed: 'o na des na /
translated: then🔽That arising would cause the generation

original: skye ba de ni skyed byed pa //
analyzed: skye ba de ni skyed byed pa //
translated: Of that arising.

original: yin te skyed par byed pa ni skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: yin te skyed par byed pa ni skye ba ma yin te /
translated: For that which is the producer is not the production,

original: skyed par byed pa po yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa po yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the producer.

original: dper na pha bu'i skye ba ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na pha bu'i skye ba ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the father is not the son.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: skye ba yang ni gang zhig yin //
analyzed: skye ba yang ni gang zhig yin //
translated: what is the production?🔽The meaning is that production does not have the nature of production.

original: skye ba la skye ba'i ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / de lta na yang rgol ba skye bas skyed par byed do zhes zer ba'i dam bca' ba las chos can gyi ngo bo nyid bzlog pa'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: skye ba la skye ba'i ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go / de lta na yang rgol ba skye bas skyed par byed do zhes zer ba'i dam bca' ba las chos can gyi ngo bo nyid bzlog pa'i skyon yod do //
translated: Even so, the opponent’s thesis that production produces production has the fault of contradicting the nature of the subject.

original: de gzhan gyis skyed par byed do zhes kyang brjod par mi nus pas de skad brjod na 'di ltar nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de gzhan gyis skyed par byed do zhes kyang brjod par mi nus pas de skad brjod na 'di ltar nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: And it cannot be said that another production produces it.

original: gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: gal te skye ba gzhan zhig gis //
translated: If another production produces it,

original: de skyed thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: de skyed thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: there is the fault of an infinite regress.

original: yang na thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir skye ba la skyed pa med pa nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir skye ba la skyed pa med pa nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Or else, in order to avoid the fault of an infinite regress, you should accept that production is not produced.

original: gal te de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is so,

original: de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: then Nāgārjuna explains:

original: ci ste skye ba med skyes na //
analyzed: ci ste skye ba med skyes na //
translated: If the unarisen were to arise,

original: thams cad de bzhin skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad de bzhin skye bar 'gyur //
translated: then everything would arise in that way.🔽Since that is unacceptable, therefore do not conceive of arising.

original: de ni mi 'dod pas de'i phyir skye bar rtog par ma byed cig / yang gzhan yang 'di la skye ba can rnams kyi skye ba yod pa'am /
analyzed: de ni mi 'dod pas de'i phyir skye bar rtog par ma byed cig / yang gzhan yang 'di la skye ba can rnams kyi skye ba yod pa'am /
translated: Moreover, in this regard, does the arising of those that possess arising exist,

original: med pa'am / yod med cig skye bar 'gyur grang na /🔽de la / re zhig yod dang med pa yang //🔽skye bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa'am / yod med cig skye bar 'gyur grang na / de la / re zhig yod dang med pa yang // skye bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: or does it not exist, or does it both exist and not exist?🔽First, it is not tenable🔽that the existent or the nonexistent arises.

original: yod med nyid kyang ma yin te //
analyzed: yod med nyid kyang ma yin te //
translated: Nor is it the case that it both exists and does not exist,

original: gong du bstan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gong du bstan pa nyid yin no //
translated: because this has already been explained above.

original: skye ba med pa'i rab byed par //🔽med dam yod pa'i don la yang //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i rab byed par // med dam yod pa'i don la yang //
translated: In the Chapter on the Absence of Arising🔽it is said:🔽Conditions are not tenable

original: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te //
analyzed: rkyen ni rung ba ma yin te //
translated: for a nonexistent or an existent object.🔽And it is said:🔽When a phenomenon is not established as existent,

original: zhes bya ba dang / gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang // med dang yod med mi sgrub pa //🔽zhes bya ba dag bstan pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir yang 'bad par bya mi dgos so //🔽yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / gang tshe chos ni yod pa dang // med dang yod med mi sgrub pa //🔽zhes bya ba dag bstan pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir yang 'bad par bya mi dgos so //🔽yang gzhan yang /
translated: nonexistent, or as both existent and nonexistent,

original: dngos po 'gag bzhin nyid la ni //
analyzed: dngos po 'gag bzhin nyid la ni //
translated: For an entity that is ceasing

original: skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: arising is not tenable.

original: 'gag bzhin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dper na 'chi bzhin pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gag bzhin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir dper na 'chi bzhin pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: Because it is ceasing, just like one who is dying.

original: gal te @108b 'gag bzhin pa nyid ma yin pa skye bas nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te @108b 'gag bzhin pa nyid ma yin pa skye bas nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because that which is not ceasing arises,

original: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //
translated: then that which is not ceasing

original: de ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
translated: is not tenable as an entity.

original: dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it does not possess the characteristics of an entity,

original: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: like a sky flower.

original: gal te gnas pa nyid kyis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gnas pa nyid kyis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not definite because it endures,

original: de yang mi rtag pa nyid dang / rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pas skyon med de /
analyzed: de yang mi rtag pa nyid dang / rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pas skyon med de /
translated: then because it is related to impermanence, it is not established as not ceasing.

original: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The error is the same as before.

original: 'dir smras pa /🔽skye ba ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / skye ba ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Here someone might say,

original: de yod na 'byung ba'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Arising definitely exists because if it exists, the phenomenon of origination exists.”

original: 'di na gang med pa de la ni de yod na 'byung ba'i chos med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang med pa de la ni de yod na 'byung ba'i chos med de /
translated: But that which does not exist here, if it existed, would not have the property of arising.

original: dper na rus sbal gyi sbu med pa la de'i gos 'byung ba med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rus sbal gyi sbu med pa la de'i gos 'byung ba med pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, if the hair of a tortoise does not exist, the arising of its shell does not exist.

original: skye ba yod pa la ni gnas pa'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba'i chos yod pas de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smod pa'i 'thad pas skye ba yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: skye ba yod pa la ni gnas pa'i mtshan nyid 'byung ba'i chos yod pas de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smod pa'i 'thad pas skye ba yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: But since that which exists as arising has the property of arising, which is the characteristic of enduring, therefore, arising exists just because of the validity of the reason stated.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: skye ba med pa kho nas de rab tu ma grub pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: skye ba med pa kho nas de rab tu ma grub pa yin mod kyi /
translated: It is certainly not established by nonarising alone.

original: 'on kyang tha snyad du grags pa'i skye ba khas blangs nas don dam par gnas pa kho nas brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang tha snyad du grags pa'i skye ba khas blangs nas don dam par gnas pa kho nas brtag par bya'o //
translated: But having accepted arising that is renowned conventionally, one should investigate it only in terms of enduring ultimately.

original: 'di la don dam par dngos po de gnas pa'am mi gnas pa'am gnas bzhin pa zhig gnas grang na /
analyzed: 'di la don dam par dngos po de gnas pa'am mi gnas pa'am gnas bzhin pa zhig gnas grang na /
translated: Here, does that thing endure ultimately, or does it not endure, or does it endure while enduring?

original: de la / dngos po gnas pa mi gnas te //
analyzed: de la / dngos po gnas pa mi gnas te //
translated: In that regard: A thing that endures does not endure.

original: da ltar dang 'das pa'i dus gnas gcig tu tshogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir dper na shi ba dang / ma skyes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: da ltar dang 'das pa'i dus gnas gcig tu tshogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir dper na shi ba dang / ma skyes pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it is impossible for the present and past to be assembled in one place, like the dead and unborn.

original: yang na gnas pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas par mi byed do //
analyzed: yang na gnas pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir gnas par mi byed do //
translated: Or else, it is because abiding would be pointless that it does not cause abiding.

original: dngos po mi gnas gnas pa min //🔽mi gnas pa'i phyir dper na /
analyzed: dngos po mi gnas gnas pa min // mi gnas pa'i phyir dper na /
translated: A nonabiding thing does not abide.

original: 'gag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gag pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it does not abide, like that which has ceased.

original: gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te /
analyzed: gnas bzhin pa yang mi gnas te /
translated: That which is in the process of abiding does not abide.

original: gnas pa dang mi gnas pa ma gtogs par de mi srid pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gnas pa dang mi gnas pa ma gtogs par de mi srid pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is impossible apart from that which abides and that which does not abide.

original: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The extensive explanation is the same as before.

original: gang gi tshe don dam par dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i tshul gyis dngos po thams cad kyi skye ba brtsal ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe don dam par dngos po 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin par bstan pa'i tshul gyis dngos po thams cad kyi skye ba brtsal ba de'i tshe /
translated: When the arising of all things is refuted by the method of teaching that ultimately nothing exists,

original: ma skyes gang zhig gnas par byed //🔽skye ba khas blangs sam /
analyzed: ma skyes gang zhig gnas par byed // skye ba khas blangs sam /
translated: then what unarisen thing would abide?

original: khas ma blangs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: khas ma blangs kyang rung ste /
translated: Whether one accepts arising or not,🔽no thing whatsoever abides.

original: dngos po 'ga' yang gnas par mi byed do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dngos po 'ga' yang gnas par mi byed do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: des na de yod na 'byung ba'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
analyzed: des na de yod na 'byung ba'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dam /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the reason “because if it exists, the phenomenon that arises exists” is not established,

original: don 'gal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: don 'gal ba nyid yin no //
translated: or else it is contradictory.

original: yang gzhan yang /🔽dngos po 'gag bzhin nyid la ni //
analyzed: yang gzhan yang / dngos po 'gag bzhin nyid la ni //
translated: Moreover,🔽Regarding a thing that is in the process of ceasing,

original: gnas pa @109a * //
analyzed: gnas pa @109a * //
translated: its🔽endurance

original: 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: is not tenable.

original: mi mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi mthun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are incompatible.

original: gang zhig gang dang mi mthun pa de ni yod na 'byung ba med do //
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang mi mthun pa de ni yod na 'byung ba med do //
translated: That which is incompatible with something does not occur when it exists.

original: dper na snang ba gsal ba dang / mun pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dper na snang ba gsal ba dang / mun pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: For example, it is like the incompatibility between light and darkness.

original: gal te 'gag bzhin pa nyid ma yin pa gnas pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'gag bzhin pa nyid ma yin pa gnas pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no error because it endures without being in the process of ceasing,🔽then we reply:

original: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gag bzhin ma yin pa //
translated: That which is not in the process of ceasing

original: de ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de ni dngos por mi 'thad do //
translated: is not tenable as a thing.

original: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs so //
translated: Because all conditioned phenomena are related to impermanence.

original: yang na de ni dngos po nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na de ni dngos po nyid ma yin te /
translated: Or else, it is not a thing.

original: 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because it is not in the process of ceasing, like a sky flower.

original: ci ste skye ba'i 'og tu gnas pa'i bya ba mthu che ba'i phyir 'gag bzhin pa yang ma yin la dngos po yang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste skye ba'i 'og tu gnas pa'i bya ba mthu che ba'i phyir 'gag bzhin pa yang ma yin la dngos po yang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But if you say that because the activity of enduring is stronger than the activity of arising, it is not in the process of ceasing, nor is it a thing, nor is it permanent,

original: gnas pa'i 'og tu rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gnas pa'i 'og tu rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because aging and impermanence occur after enduring,

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is illogical.

original: gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po 'di dag gi gnas pa'i skad cig ma la mi rtag pa nyid med par gyur na phyis kyang de dang ldan par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po 'di dag gi gnas pa'i skad cig ma la mi rtag pa nyid med par gyur na phyis kyang de dang ldan par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the state of impermanence did not exist in the moment of enduring of these things such as form, it would not be possessed later,

original: de med par 'byung ba'i phyir dper na me ni chu med kyang 'byung ba'i tshul can yin pas nam yang chu'i dngos por mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de med par 'byung ba'i phyir dper na me ni chu med kyang 'byung ba'i tshul can yin pas nam yang chu'i dngos por mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: because it would arise without it, just as fire, which has the mode of arising without water, never becomes water.

original: gal te mthong ba'i phyir dgag tu mi rung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba'i phyir dgag tu mi rung ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not tenable to refute it because it is seen,

original: de'i phyir de nyid brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid brtag par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, that should be investigated.

original: ci 'jig pa mthong ba de de dang 'brel pa nyid la 'am 'on te de med pa la mthong /
analyzed: ci 'jig pa mthong ba de de dang 'brel pa nyid la 'am 'on te de med pa la mthong /
translated: Is the destruction that is seen seen in relation to that which is enduring or is it seen in relation to that which is not enduring?

original: de la brtag pa snga ma la ni gnas pa mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de la brtag pa snga ma la ni gnas pa mi 'grub bo //
translated: In the former case, endurance is not established.

original: brtag pa gnyis pa la ni dngos po 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa nyid mi 'grub pas de gnyi ga la yang 'dod pa'i don nyams so //
analyzed: brtag pa gnyis pa la ni dngos po 'gag bzhin pa ma yin pa nyid mi 'grub pas de gnyi ga la yang 'dod pa'i don nyams so //
translated: In the latter case, since an entity that is not in the process of ceasing is not established, in both cases the intended meaning is undermined.

original: gang dag mkhas su re ba nyid kyis dper na snga na sangs rgyas nyid med pa yang phyis sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du snga na 'jig pa med pa yang phyis 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag mkhas su re ba nyid kyis dper na snga na sangs rgyas nyid med pa yang phyis sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du snga na 'jig pa med pa yang phyis 'jig pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Those who hope to be wise say, “For example, although buddhahood did not exist previously, later it becomes buddhahood. So too, although destruction did not exist previously, later it becomes destruction.”

original: sgrub pa de ni tha snyad du yang mig nod de shes pa'i skad cig ma gang la sangs rgyas nyid med pa de ni phyis kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sgrub pa de ni tha snyad du yang mig nod de shes pa'i skad cig ma gang la sangs rgyas nyid med pa de ni phyis kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir te /
translated: That proof is not accepted even conventionally, because it is not accepted that any moment of consciousness that lacks buddhahood will later become buddhahood.

original: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i shes pa'i skad cig ma la sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrar brjod par bya zhing de la ni sangs rgyas nyid med na mi 'byung ba med pas de ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i shes pa'i skad cig ma la sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrar brjod par bya zhing de la ni sangs rgyas nyid med na mi 'byung ba med pas de ni gyi na'o //
translated: Thus, the moment of consciousness that abandons the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience should be called “buddhahood,” and since it does not occur without buddhahood, it is not tenable.

original: de bzhin du rga ba nyid la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rga ba nyid la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Aging itself should be applied in the same way.

original: gang gi @109b phyir de ltar rga shi med pa'i dngos po yod pa nyid mi 'thad pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir slob dpon gyis bshad pa /
analyzed: gang gi @109b phyir de ltar rga shi med pa'i dngos po yod pa nyid mi 'thad pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir slob dpon gyis bshad pa /
translated: Because in that way, the existence of a thing that is not subject to aging and death is not tenable, the master said:

original: dngos po thams cad dus kun du //🔽rga dang 'chi ba'i chos yin na //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad dus kun du // rga dang 'chi ba'i chos yin na //
translated: All things at all times

original: gang dag rga dang 'chi med par //
analyzed: gang dag rga dang 'chi med par //
translated: Are subject to aging and death.

original: gnas pa'i dngos po gang zhig yin //
analyzed: gnas pa'i dngos po gang zhig yin //
translated: What thing is there that abides🔽Without aging and death?

original: gang la skye ba yod na gnas pa 'byung bar mthong ba'i skye ba ma grub pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang la skye ba yod na gnas pa 'byung bar mthong ba'i skye ba ma grub pas de'i phyir /
translated: Since arising, which is seen to be the origin of endurance when it exists, is not established, therefore:

original: don ma grub pa nyid nyams pa med pa 'am don 'gal ba nyid nyams pa med do //
analyzed: don ma grub pa nyid nyams pa med pa 'am don 'gal ba nyid nyams pa med do //
translated: The meaning is not established, and the meaning is contradictory.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover:

original: 'di la khyed gnas pa la yang gnas pa yod par 'dod pa de la yang gnas pa de gnas pa gzhan gyis sam /
analyzed: 'di la khyed gnas pa la yang gnas pa yod par 'dod pa de la yang gnas pa de gnas pa gzhan gyis sam /
translated: Here, you assert that that which endures endures.

original: de nyid kyis gnas par 'dod grang na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis gnas par 'dod grang na /
translated: But in that regard, is that endurance due to another endurance, or is it due to that very endurance itself?

original: de gnyis gang yang mi rigs pas de'i phyir bshad pa /🔽gnas pa gnas pa gzhan dang ni //
analyzed: de gnyis gang yang mi rigs pas de'i phyir bshad pa / gnas pa gnas pa gzhan dang ni //
translated: Since neither is logical, it is said:🔽Endurance is not tenable🔽Due to another endurance,

original: de nyid kyis kyang gnas mi rigs //
analyzed: de nyid kyis kyang gnas mi rigs //
translated: Or due to that very endurance itself.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽ji ltar skye ba rang dang ni //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / ji ltar skye ba rang dang ni //
translated: How is that?🔽Just as arising does not give rise to itself

original: gzhan gyis skyed pa ma yin bzhin //🔽ji ltar skye ba rang nyid kyis //
analyzed: gzhan gyis skyed pa ma yin bzhin // ji ltar skye ba rang nyid kyis //
translated: Or to another.

original: skyed par mi rigs shen /
analyzed: skyed par mi rigs shen /
translated: How is it that arising does not give rise to itself?

original: ji skad du /🔽skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
analyzed: ji skad du / skye ba 'di ni ma skyes pas //
translated: As it is said:🔽How could this nonarisen arising

original: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar skyed //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar skyed //
translated: Give rise to itself?

original: ci ste skyes pa skyed byed na //
analyzed: ci ste skyes pa skyed byed na //
translated: But if the arisen gives rise to itself,

original: skyes na ci zhig bskyed du yod //🔽ces smras pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes na ci zhig bskyed du yod // ces smras pa'i phyir ro //
translated: What arisen thing is there that is given rise to?

original: ji ltar skye ba gzhan gyis skyed par mi rigs she na /
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba gzhan gyis skyed par mi rigs she na /
translated: How is it that arising does not give rise to another?

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: gal te skyed pa gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: gal te skyed pa gzhan zhig gis //
translated: If another arising gives rise to it,

original: de skyed thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: de skyed thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: There would be an infinite regress.

original: ci ste skye ba med skyes na //
analyzed: ci ste skye ba med skyes na //
translated: If that which is not arisen were to arise,

original: thams cad de bzhin skye bar 'gyur //🔽zhes smras pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad de bzhin skye bar 'gyur // zhes smras pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then everything would arise in this way.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang /
translated: In the same way, here also:

original: gnas pa 'di ni ma gnas pas //
analyzed: gnas pa 'di ni ma gnas pas //
translated: How could this enduring, not enduring,

original: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar gnas //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ji ltar gnas //
translated: endure through its own self?

original: ci ste gnas pas gnas byed na //
analyzed: ci ste gnas pas gnas byed na //
translated: But if enduring endures through enduring,

original: gnas na ci zhig gnas su yod //🔽ces bya ba rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le 'ur byas pas skye ba rang gi bdag nyid kyis skyed par dgag pa'i rjes su 'brang bas gnas pa rang gi bdag nyid kyis /
analyzed: gnas na ci zhig gnas su yod // ces bya ba rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le 'ur byas pas skye ba rang gi bdag nyid kyis skyed par dgag pa'i rjes su 'brang bas gnas pa rang gi bdag nyid kyis /
translated: what is enduring that endures?

original: gnas pa dgag pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas pa dgag pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Through the composition of these verses explaining this, one should also state the refutation of enduring enduring through its own self, following the refutation of arising arising through its own self.

original: gal te gnas pa gzhan zhig gis //
analyzed: gal te gnas pa gzhan zhig gis //
translated: If enduring were to endure through another enduring,

original: de gnas thug pa med par 'gyur //
analyzed: de gnas thug pa med par 'gyur //
translated: there would be an infinite regress.

original: ci ste gnas pa med gnas na //
analyzed: ci ste gnas pa med gnas na //
translated: But if enduring were to endure without another enduring,

original: thams cad de bzhin gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad de bzhin gnas par 'gyur //
translated: then everything would endure in this way.

original: zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pas /
translated: Through the composition of these verses explaining this,

original: 'dir yang skye ba gzhan gyis skyed pa dgag pa'i rjes su 'brang bas gnas pa gzhan gyis gnas pa dgag pa yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang skye ba gzhan gyis skyed pa dgag pa'i rjes su 'brang bas gnas pa gzhan gyis gnas pa dgag pa yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here, since the refutation of production by another is being pursued, the refutation of endurance by another should also be stated.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gnas pa med @110a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gnas pa med @110a * //
translated: Therefore, since endurance does not exist in this way,🔽production does exist.

original: pas / skye ba ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: pas / skye ba ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Since it exists, the phenomenon of arising exists.

original: de yod na 'byung ba'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi lan gdab dka'o /🔽// / dbu ma'i tsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma bam po bdun pa /
analyzed: de yod na 'byung ba'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid kyi lan gdab dka'o / // / dbu ma'i tsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma bam po bdun pa /
translated: It is difficult to respond to the argument that the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: don dam par dngos po rnams kyi skye ba dang / gnas pa dag ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: don dam par dngos po rnams kyi skye ba dang / gnas pa dag ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: “Ultimately, the production and endurance of things do exist.

original: de dag dang lhan cig spyod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag dang lhan cig spyod pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because phenomena that coexist with them exist.

original: 'di na gang med pa de la ni de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i chos med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang med pa de la ni de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i chos med de /
translated: In this context, if something does not exist, phenomena that coexist with it do not exist.

original: dper na rta'i rva la 'gag pa med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rta'i rva la 'gag pa med pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the cessation of a rabbit’s horns.

original: skye ba dang / gnas pa dag la ni lhan cig spyod pa'i chos 'gag pa yod pas /
analyzed: skye ba dang / gnas pa dag la ni lhan cig spyod pa'i chos 'gag pa yod pas /
translated: And for arising and enduring, there is cessation of the co-occurring phenomena.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pa'i mthus don dam par skye ba dang / gnas pa dag yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pa'i mthus don dam par skye ba dang / gnas pa dag yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, by the power of the reason stated, arising and enduring exist in reality.

original: 'dir bshad pa /🔽dngos po'i 'gag pa yang 'gags pa 'am /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / dngos po'i 'gag pa yang 'gags pa 'am /
translated: Here we say:🔽The cessation of a thing🔽Would be the cessation of that which has ceased

original: 'gag bzhin pa zhig 'gag par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'gag bzhin pa zhig 'gag par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Or that which is in the process of ceasing.

original: de rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad pas de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de rnam pa thams cad du mi 'thad pas de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: But since that is untenable in any way, therefore it is said:

original: 'gags pa 'gag par mi byed de //
analyzed: 'gags pa 'gag par mi byed de //
translated: That which has ceased does not cause cessation.

original: shi ba yang 'chi bar 'gyur na mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shi ba yang 'chi bar 'gyur na mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is illogical that the dead should die.

original: ma 'gags pa yang 'gag mi byed //
analyzed: ma 'gags pa yang 'gag mi byed //
translated: That which has not ceased does not cause cessation.

original: 'gags pas stong pa ni 'gag par mi byed de 'gag pa med pa'i phyir gnas pa bzhin no //🔽'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min //
analyzed: 'gags pas stong pa ni 'gag par mi byed de 'gag pa med pa'i phyir gnas pa bzhin no // 'gag bzhin pa yang de bzhin min //
translated: That which is empty of cessation does not cause cessation because it is devoid of cessation, like enduring.

original: 'gag par mi byed de /
analyzed: 'gag par mi byed de /
translated: That which is in the process of ceasing does not cause cessation.🔽That which is in the process of ceasing does not cause cessation.

original: 'gags pa dang / ma 'gags pa ma gtogs par 'gag bzhin pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang / skyon gnyi gar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gags pa dang / ma 'gags pa ma gtogs par 'gag bzhin pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang / skyon gnyi gar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because apart from that which has ceased and that which has not ceased, that which is in the process of ceasing is impossible, and because both errors would ensue.

original: yang na don dam par 'gag bzhin pa ni 'gag par mi byed de /
analyzed: yang na don dam par 'gag bzhin pa ni 'gag par mi byed de /
translated: Moreover, in an ultimate sense, that which is in the process of ceasing does not cause cessation.

original: dus su 'pho ba la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyir skye bar 'dod pa bzhin nam /
analyzed: dus su 'pho ba la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyir skye bar 'dod pa bzhin nam /
translated: Because it is directed toward the time of transition, like that which is asserted to be arising,

original: da ltar bzhin no //
analyzed: da ltar bzhin no //
translated: or like the present.

original: yang na dngos po thams cad kyi skye ba bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na dngos po thams cad kyi skye ba bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because the arising of all things is refuted,

original: ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma skyes gang zhig 'gag par 'gyur //
translated: How could that which has not arisen cease?

original: ma skyes pa la ni 'gag pa mi srid de /
analyzed: ma skyes pa la ni 'gag pa mi srid de /
translated: Cessation is impossible for that which has not arisen,

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no //🔽de'i phyir de ltar skye ba khas blangs sam /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no // de'i phyir de ltar skye ba khas blangs sam /
translated: because it has not arisen, like the son of a barren woman.

original: khas ma blangs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: khas ma blangs kyang rung ste /
translated: Therefore, in this way, whether one asserts arising or does not assert arising,

original: 'gag pa ji ltar yang mi 'grub po //
analyzed: 'gag pa ji ltar yang mi 'grub po //
translated: cessation is not established in any way.

original: yang gzhan yang /🔽'di la 'gag pa ni gnas pa 'am /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang / 'di la 'gag pa ni gnas pa 'am /
translated: Moreover:🔽Here, cessation should be investigated with respect to that which endures

original: mi gnas pa la brtag grang na /
analyzed: mi gnas pa la brtag grang na /
translated: or that which does not endure.

original: de ni gnyi ga la yang mi rung ste de la /
analyzed: de ni gnyi ga la yang mi rung ste de la /
translated: That is untenable in both cases.

original: re zhig dngos po gnas pa la //
analyzed: re zhig dngos po gnas pa la //
translated: First, it is not tenable

original: 'gag @110b pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag @110b pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That cessation exists for a thing that endures.

original: gnas pa'i bya ba skyes pa la /
analyzed: gnas pa'i bya ba skyes pa la /
translated: With regard to the activity of enduring that has arisen,

original: gnas pa dang / mi mthun pa'i 'gag pa mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gnas pa dang / mi mthun pa'i 'gag pa mi 'thad de /
translated: It is not tenable that cessation exists, because it is incompatible with enduring.

original: gnas pa'i phyir de ni grags pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa'i phyir de ni grags pa yin no //
translated: This is well known.

original: gal te mi gnas pa la 'gag pa yod pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mi gnas pa la 'gag pa yod pas nyes pa med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that it is not a fault because cessation exists for that which does not endure,

original: dngos po mi gnas pa la yang //
analyzed: dngos po mi gnas pa la yang //
translated: Then for a thing that does not endure,

original: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Cessation is not tenable.

original: mi gnas pa'i phyir dper na 'gags pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i phyir dper na 'gags pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it does not endure, like that which has already ceased.

original: zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: 'di la gnas skabs 'di gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas pa 'gag gam /
analyzed: 'di la gnas skabs 'di gnas skabs de nyid kyis gnas pa 'gag gam /
translated: Does this state cease by means of this very state?
